    16                                  ;Note: This code is a part of Retro DOS 4.0 kernel source code
    17                                  ;     (as included binary, 'IOSYS5.BIN') 
    18                                  ;     Equivalent of MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSCODE and BIOSDATA and SYSINIT
    19                                  ;						        (except MSLOAD code)  
    20                                        
    21                                  ;------ Retro DOS v2 (v3) boot sector loads RETRODOS.SYS (MSDOS.SYS)
    22                                  ;	at 1000h:0000h and loader (initialization) part of RETRODOS kernel
    23                                  ;	moves IO.SYS (DOSBIOSCODE & DOSBIOSDATA, 'IOSYS5.BIN') to 70h:0000h.
    24                                  ;	Then SYSINIT code to the next segment (46Dh for original MSDOS 5.0)..
    25                                  ;	SYSINIT code relocates itself and DOSBIOSCODE and MSDOS.SYS
    26                                  ;	(MSDOS5.BIN) according to request/setting in 'config.sys' file.
    27                                  
    28                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
    29                                  
    30                                  ;bpbx		struc ;	(sizeof=0x19)	
    31                                  ;
    32                                  ;bytespersec	dw ?			; base 10
    33                                  ;secperclust	db ?			; base 10
    34                                  ;rsvdsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    35                                  ;numfats	db ?			; base 10
    36                                  ;rootdirents	dw ?			; base 10
    37                                  ;totalsize16	dw ?			; base 10
    38                                  ;mediaid	db ?
    39                                  ;fatsecs	dw ?			; base 10
    40                                  ;secpertrack	dw ?			; base 10
    41                                  ;heads		dw ?			; base 10
    42                                  ;hiddensecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    43                                  ;hiddensecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    44                                  ;totalsecs_lw	dw ?			; base 10
    45                                  ;totalsecs_hw	dw ?			; base 10
    46                                  ;
    47                                  ;bpbx		ends

   142                                  ;============================================================================
   143                                  ;
   144                                  ;     for dos 4.00, msload program has been changed to allow:
   145                                  ;	  1. 32 bit calculation,
   146                                  ;	  2. reading a fat sector when needed, instead of reading the whole
   147                                  ;	     fat sectors at once. this will make the boot time faster,
   148                                  ;	     and eliminate the memory size limitation problem,
   149                                  ;	  3. solving the limitation of the file size (29 kb) of io.sys0,
   150                                  ;	  4. adding the boot error message. show the same boot error message
   151                                  ;	     and do the same behavior when the read operation of io.sys
   152                                  ;	     fails as the msboot program, since msload program is the

   271                                  ;   TotalSectorsL = maximum sector number in this media ;j.k.

   494                                  ; Relocate
   495                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   496                                  ;
   497                                  ; NOTES:
   498                                  ;
   499                                  ;   Relocates the loader code to top-of-memory.
   500                                  ;
   501                                  ; INPUT:     none
   502                                  ;
   503                                  ; OUTPUT:    code and data relocated.
   504                                  ;	     AX,CX,SI,DI destroyed
   505                                  ;
   506                                  ; calls:     none
   507                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   508                                  ;
   509                                  ; Determine the number of paragraphs (16 byte blocks) of memory.
   510                                  ; this involves invoking the memory size determination interrupt,
   511                                  ; which returns the number of 1k blocks of memory, and then
   512                                  ; converting this to the number of paragraphs.
   513                                  ; Find out whether RPL code is present at top of memory and modify the
   514                                  ; available amount of memory in AX
   515                                  ; leave the number of paragraphs of memory in ax.
   516                                  ;
   517                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   518                                  ; copy code from start to top of memory.
   519                                  ;
   520                                  ; the length to copy is EndOfLoader
   521                                  ;
   522                                  ; jump to relocated code
   523                                  ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------
   524                                  
   525                                  		; 14/09/2023

   648                                  ; FindClusterSize
   649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   650                                  ;
   651                                  ; INPUT:     bpb information in loaded boot record at 0:7c00h
   652                                  ;

   693                                  ;   Determine if fat is 12 or 16 bit fat. 12 bit fat if floppy, read mbr
   694                                  ;   to find out what system id byte is.
   695                                  ;
   696                                  ; INPUT:
   697                                  ;
   698                                  ; OUTPUT:
   699                                  ;

   701                                  ;   all other registers destroyed

   705                                  CalcFatSize:
   706                                  		; 14/09/2023

   715                                  		;;;

   765                                  
   766                                  ; ReadInFirstCluster
   767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   768                                  ;
   769                                  ; NOTES: read the start of the clusters that covers at least IbmLoadSize
   770                                  ;	 fully.  for example, if sector/cluster = 2, and IbmLoadSize=3
   771                                  ;	 then we are going to re-read the second cluster to fully cover
   772                                  ;	 msload program in the cluster boundary.
   773                                  ;
   774                                  ; INPUT:
   775                                  ;   IbmLoadSize - make sure this value is the same as the one in
   776                                  ;		  msboot program when you build the new version!!!!!
   777                                  ;
   778                                  ;   SecPerCluster
   779                                  ;   ClusterSize
   780                                  ;   FirstSectorL
   781                                  ;   FirstSectorH
   782                                  ;
   783                                  ; OUTPUT: msload program is fully covered in a cluster boundary.
   784                                  ;	  ax = # of clusters we read in so far.
   785                                  ;
   786                                  ; calls:     ReadSectors
   787                                  ; logic:
   788                                  ;	ax; dx = IbmLoadSize / # of sector in a cluster.
   789                                  ;	if dx = 0 then ok. (msload is in a cluster boundary.)
   790                                  ;      else		   (has to read (ax+1)th cluster to cover msload)
   791                                  ;	read (ax+1)th cluster into the address after the clusters we
   792                                  ;	read in so far.
   793                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   794                                  
   795                                  ; 09/12/2022
   796                                  ; BiosStart equ 51Ah ; AX = IO.SYS starting cluster
   797                                  ; IbmLoadSize equ 3  ; AX = Number sectors in MSLOAD
   798                                  ; BiosOffset equ 700h ; Address where loader was read in
   799                                  	
   800                                  ReadInFirstCluster:
   801                                  		; 24/12/2022
   802                                  		;;mov	ax, [BioSStart]
   803                                  		;mov	ax, [51Ah]	; IO.SYS First Cluster
   804                                  		;dec	ax		; Root dir buffer at 500h (segment=0)
   805                                  		;			; IO.SYS first cluster ptr at 51Ah
   806                                  		;dec	ax		; AX = word [51Ah] - 2

   818                                  		;;div	byte [cs:SecPerCluster]

   820                                  					; AH = remaining sectors in last cluster

   823                                  		; If cluster size = 2, al = 1, ah = 1
   824                                  		; If cluster size = 1, al = 3, ah = 0
   825                                  		; If ah = 0, nothing remaining in last cluster

   831

   834                                  		;cmp	ah, 0
   835 00000160 743A                    		jz	short SetNextClusterNum	; next cluster

   837                                  %if 0
   838                                  		; 06/10/2023

   840                                  		;push	ax		; AX = total clusters in the loader
   841                                  					; already read in

   845                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], cx    ; area in StartSecH:StartSecL
   846                                  		mov	cx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
   847                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], cx

   849                                  		add	[cs:StartSecL], ax ; Add number of sectors already loaded
   850                                  		adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0 ; to start sector
   851                                  		;mov	ax, [BiosStart]
   852                                  		mov	ax, [51Ah] ; AX = [51Ah] = IO.SYS 1st clust
   853                                  		dec	ax
   854                                  		dec	ax

   861                                  					; the rest of the last loader cluster

   870                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]
   871                                  					; Read in the entire last cluster

   874                                  		pop	ax		; AX = total clust read	by boot	loader
   875                                  		inc	ax		; AX = total clust read	in now
   876                                  SetNextClusterNum:			; ...

   986                                  ; SaveLoadedBios
   987                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
   988                                  ;
   989                                  ; NOTES:
   990                                  ;
   991                                  ;   Determine how much of iosys was loaded in when the loader was loaded
   992                                  ;   by the boot record (only the portion that is guaranteed to be contiguous)
   993                                  ;
   994                                  ; INPUT:
   995                                  ;   AX:Total cluster already read in (loader & bios)
   996                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster = number of clusters used for loader+2
   997                                  ;
   998                                  ; OUTPUT:
   999                                  ;	ES = 70h
  1000                                  ;	DI = next offset to load iosys code
  1001                                  ;	AX,BX,CX,DX,SI destroyed
  1002                                  ;
  1003                                  ;	CS:NextBioLocation = di on output
  1004                                  ;	CS:last_cluster = last cluster loaded
  1005                                  ;
  1006                                  ; calls:     none
  1007                                  ;
  1008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1009                                  ;
  1010                                  ; Multiply cluster * cluster size in bytes to get total loaded for msload
  1011                                  ;
  1012                                  ; Subtract total_loaded - (EndOfLoader) to get loaded io.sys in last cluster
  1013                                  ;
  1014                                  ; Relocate this piece of iosys down to 70:0
  1015                                  ;
  1016                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1017                                  
  1018                                  SaveLoadedBios:
  1019                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1020                                  		;push	ds
  1021                                  		
  1022                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1023                                  		; ds = cs
  1024                                  		; ax = number of loaded clusters

  1026                                  		;mul	word [cs:ClusterSize]
  1027                                  					; Get total bytes loaded by
  1028                                  					; this is always < 64k, so
  1029                                  					; lower 16 bits ok
  1030                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1031                                  		; ax = [clusterSize] * (loaded cluster count)
  1032                                  SaveLoadedBios2:
  1033                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1034 000001A6 1E                      		push	ds
  1035                                  
  1036                                  		;sub	ax, EndOfLoader ; (OFFSET EndOfLoader)-(OFFSET Start)

  1053                                  		;mov	[NextBioLocation], di

  1055                                  
  1056                                  		; es:di = (the next) buffer address for next read
  1057                                  
  1058 000001B4 1F                      		pop	ds		; Save where location for next read
  1059                                  
  1060                                  ; GetContigClusters
  1061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1062                                  ;
  1063                                  ; NOTES: go find clusters as long as they are contiguous
  1064                                  ;
  1065                                  ;
  1066                                  ; INPUT:
  1067                                  ;   CS:NextBioLocation
  1068                                  ;   CS:
  1069                                  ;
  1070                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1071                                  ;
  1072                                  ; calls: GetNextFatEntry
  1073                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1074                                  ;
  1075                                  ;Set CS:SectorCount to sectors per cluster
  1076                                  ;
  1077                                  ;Call GetNextFatEntry to get next cluster in file
  1078                                  ;
  1079                                  ;Call check_for_eof
  1080                                  ;
  1081                                  ;if (nc returned)
  1082                                  ;
  1083                                  ;   {call GetNextFatEntry
  1084                                  ;
  1085                                  ;    if (new cluster is contig to old cluster)
  1086                                  ;	{add sectors per cluster to CS:SectorCount
  1087                                  ;
  1088                                  ;	 call check_for_eof
  1089                                  ;
  1090                                  ;	 if (nc returned)

  1092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  1094                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1095                                  ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1096                                  ; DosLoadSeg equ 70h

  1098                                  GetContigClusters:
  1099                                  
  1100                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1101                                  %if 0	
  1102                                  		xor	ah, ah
  1103                                  		mov	al, [cs:SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1104                                  		mov	[cs:SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1105                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]

  1107                                  		pop	word [cs:SectorCount]
  1108                                  		mov	word [cs:CurrentCluster], ax ; Update the last one found
  1109                                  		cmp	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; END_OF_FILE
  1110                                  		jz	short GoToBioInit
  1111                                  		xor	dx, dx
  1112                                  		;sub	ax, 2			; Zero base the cluster
  1113                                  		; 10/12/2022
  1114                                  		dec	ax
  1115                                  		dec	ax
  1116                                  		xor	ch, ch
  1117                                  		mov	cl, [cs:SecPerCluster]
  1118                                  		mul	cx			; How many sectors (before next cluster) 
  1119                                  		add	ax, [cs:FirstSectorL]	; See where the data sector starts
  1120                                  		adc	dx, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1121                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax	; Save it (used by ReadSectors)
  1122                                  		mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx
  1123                                  		mov	di, [cs:NextBioLocation] ; Get where to put code
  1124                                  		push	word [cs:SectorCount]	; Save how many sectors
  1125                                  		;mov	ax, DosLoadSeg
  1126                                  		mov	ax, 70h
  1127                                  		mov	es, ax
  1128                                  		call	ReadSectors
  1129                                  		pop	ax			; Get back total sectors read in
  1130                                  		mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]	; Get number of bytes we loaded
  1131                                  		add	[cs:NextBioLocation], ax ; Point to where to load next	
  1132                                  		jmp	short GetContigClusters
  1133                                  %endif
  1134                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1135                                  		; ds = cs
  1136 000001B5 A1[1200]                		mov	ax, [SecPerCluster]	; Assume we will get one cluster
  1137 000001B8 A3[0C00]                		mov	[SectorCount], ax	; Sector count = sectors in 1 cluster
  1138                                  		;push	word [SectorCount]

  1140 000001BC E8D400                  		call	GetNextFatEntry		; Returns next cluster to read in AX	
  1141 000001BF 8F06[0C00]              		pop	word [SectorCount]

  1143

  1145 000001CB 741A                    		je	short GoToBioInit ; 23/12/2022

  1163

  1166

  1169                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1170                                  
  1171                                  ; GoToBiosInit
  1172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1173                                  ;
  1174                                  ; NOTES:
  1175                                  ;
  1176                                  ;  Set up required registers for iosys, then jump to it (70:0)
  1177                                  ;
  1178                                  ; INPUT:     none
  1179                                  ;
  1180                                  ;   CS:MediaByte = media byte
  1181                                  ;   CS:BootDrive = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1182                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorL = first data sector on disk (low) (0-based)
  1183                                  ;   CS:FirstSectorH = first data sector on disk (high)
  1184                                  ;
  1185                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1186                                  ;
  1187                                  ;   required by msinit
  1188                                  ;   DL = int 13 drive number we booted from
  1189                                  ;   CH = media byte
  1190                                  ;   BX = first data sector on disk (0-based)
  1191                                  ;   AX = first data sector on disk (high)
  1192                                  ;   DI = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  1193                                  ;
  1194                                  ; calls:     none
  1195                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1196                                  ;
  1197                                  ; set up registers for msinit then do far jmp
  1198                                  ;
  1199                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1200                                  
  1201                                  GoToBioInit:	
  1202                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1203                                  		; ds = cs	
  1204                                  		;mov	ch, [cs:MediaByte]
  1205                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]
  1206                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:FirstSectorL]
  1207                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FirstSectorH]
  1208                                  
  1209 000001E7 8A2E[2800]              		mov	ch, [MediaByte] ; Restore regs required for msint
  1210 000001EB 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive] ; Physical drv number we booted from.
  1211 000001EF 8B1E[2200]              		mov	bx, [FirstSectorL] ; AX:BX = first data sector of disk
  1212 000001F3 A1[2400]                		mov	ax, [FirstSectorH]
  1213                                  
  1214                                  		; 15/09/2023 (retrodos 4.s, retrodos41.s, retrodos42.s)
  1215                                  		; (This is not necessary but BP value will be 7C00h
  1216                                  		; when the RetroDOS boot sector code starts the kernel.
  1217                                  		; Retro DOS 4 Kernel source code contains a comment that
  1218                                  		; 'bp = 7C00h' at the init stage. But RetroDOS kernel
  1219                                  		; doesn't use it later. However, i want to leave BP
  1220                                  		; as equal to SP here.) ---rd4load.s---
  1221                                  		;
  1222                                  		; 15/09/2023 (iosys5.s, iosys51.s, iosys6.s)
  1223                                  		; (The BP value here will not be used by IO.SYS later.
  1224                                  		;  It is not necessary to set.) 
  1225                                  		;
  1226                                  		;mov	bp, sp	; 7C00h ; 15/09/2023
  1227                                  
  1228 000001F6 EA00007000              		jmp	70h:0	; Far jump to IoSysAddr	(DOSBIOS)
  1229                                  
  1230                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1231                                  
  1232                                  ; ReadSectors
  1233                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1234                                  ; notES:
  1235                                  ;
  1236                                  ;  read in the CS:SectorCount number of sectors at ES:di
  1237                                  ;
  1238                                  ;
  1239                                  ; INPUT:
  1240                                  ;
  1241                                  ;   DI = OFFSET of start of read
  1242                                  ;   ES = segment of read
  1243                                  ;   CS:SectorCount = number of sectors to read
  1244                                  ;   CS:StartSecL = starting sector (low)
  1245                                  ;   CS:StartSecH = starting sector (high)
  1246                                  ;   following is bpb info that must be setup prior to call
  1247                                  ;   CS:NumHeads
  1248                                  ;   CS:number_of_sectors
  1249                                  ;   CS:BootDrive
  1250                                  ;   CS:SecPerTrack
  1251                                  ;
  1252                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1253                                  ;
  1254                                  ;   AX,BX,CX,DX,SI,DI destroyed
  1255                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1256                                  ; divide start sector by sectors per track
  1257                                  ; the remainder is the actual sector number, 0 based
  1258                                  ;
  1259                                  ; increment actual sector number to get 1 based
  1260                                  ;
  1261                                  ; the quotient is the number of tracks - divide by heads to get the cyl
  1262                                  ;
  1263                                  ; the remainder is actual head, the quotient is cylinder
  1264                                  ;
  1265                                  ; figure the number of sectors in that track, set al to this
  1266                                  ;
  1267                                  ; do the read
  1268                                  ;
  1269                                  ; if error, do reset, then redo the int 13h
  1270                                  ;
  1271                                  ; if successful read, subtract # sectors read from SectorCount, add to logical
  1272                                  ; sector, add #sectors read * BytesPerSec to bx;
  1273                                  ;
  1274                                  ; if SectorCount <> 0 do next read
  1275                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1276                                  
  1277                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1278                                  ReadSectors:
  1279                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1280                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1281                                  ReadSectors:
  1282 000001FB B90500                  		mov	cx, 5			; 5 retries
  1283                                  
  1284                                  		; Convert a logical sector into track/sector/head. AX has the
  1285                                  		; logical sector number
  1286                                  TryRead:
  1287                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1288                                  		; ds = cs
  1289 000001FE 51                      		push	cx
  1290                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:StartSecL]	; Get starting sector
  1291                                  		;mov	dx, [cs:StartSecH]
  1292                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1293                                  		;mov	ax, [StartSecL]	; *	; Get starting sector
  1294                                  		;mov	dx, [StartSecH]
  1295                                  		;push	ax ; *
  1296                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1297 000001FF A1[0800]                		mov	ax, [StartSecH]
  1298 00000202 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1299                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]
  1300                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1301                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1302 00000204 8B1E[1600]              		mov	bx, [SecPerTrack]
  1303 00000208 F7F3                    		div	bx
  1304                                  
  1305                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1306                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1307                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1308 0000020A 89C5                    		mov	bp, ax ; [TempH]
  1309                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  1310 0000020C A1[0600]                		mov	ax, [StartSecL] ; *
  1311 0000020F F7F3                    		div	bx
  1312                                  		;div	word [SecPerTrack]
  1313                                  		;;div	word [cs:SecPerTrack]	; [TempH]:ax = track,
  1314                                  						; dx = sector number
  1315                                  
  1316                                  		;mov	bx, [cs:SecPerTrack]	; Get number of sectors we can
  1317                                  						; read in this track
  1318 00000211 29D3                    		sub	bx, dx
  1319                                  		;mov	si, bx
  1320 00000213 8B36[0C00]              		mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1321                                  
  1322 00000217 39DE                    		cmp	si, bx
  1323 00000219 7602                    		jna	short GotLength
  1324                                  		;cmp	[SectorCount], si
  1325                                  		;;cmp	[cs:SectorCount], si	; Is possible sectors in track more
  1326                                  		;jnb	short GotLength		; than what we need to read?
  1327 0000021B 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  1328                                  		;mov	si, [SectorCount]
  1329                                  		;;mov	si, [cs:SectorCount]	; Yes, only read what we need to
  1330                                  ;GotLength:
  1331                                  
  1332                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1333                                  		; IO.SYS < 40KB (segment override is not possible)
  1334                                  		; 700h+0F8FFh < 64KB address 
  1335                                  		;	(there is not an override risk up to 63743 bytes)
  1336                                  ; 24/12/2022
  1337                                  %if 0
  1338                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1339                                  		; dma boundary check for >64KB reads
  1340                                  		; Also, Segment Override risk !
  1341                                  		or	di, di
  1342                                  		jz	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for the 1st read
  1343                                  		;cmp	byte [BootDrive], 80h
  1344                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:BootDrive], 80h
  1345                                  		;jnb	short dma_boundary_ok ; no problem for hard disks
  1346                                  dma_boundary_chk:
  1347                                  		cmp	si, 1
  1348                                  		jna	short dma_boundary_ok 
  1349                                  				; 1 sector read will not cause a boundary error			
  1350                                  		push	dx
  1351                                  		push	ax
  1352                                  		mov	ax, si
  1353                                  		sub	dx, dx
  1354                                  		mul	word [BytesPerSec]
  1355                                  		mov	bx, es
  1356                                  		mov	cl, 4
  1357                                  		shl	bx, cl	; convert paragraphs to bytes
  1358                                  		; bx = segment start position (for 64K memory sections)
  1359                                  		add	bx, ax	; byte count to read
  1360                                  		pop	ax
  1361                                  		pop	dx
  1362                                  		add	bx, di	; add current buffer offset to byte count
  1363                                  		jnc	short dma_boundary_ok
  1364                                  		
  1365                                  		; Sector count must be decreased to prevent
  1366                                  		; DMA boundary error or segment override risk!
  1367                                  		dec	si
  1368                                  		jmp	short dma_boundary_chk
  1369                                  dma_boundary_ok:
  1370                                  %endif
  1371                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1372                                  GotLength:
  1373                                  		;inc	dl			; Sector numbers are 1-based
  1374                                  		; 18/12/2022
  1375 0000021D 42                      		inc	dx
  1376 0000021E 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl			; Start sector in BL
  1377                                  		
  1378                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1379                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1380                                  		;mov	dx, [TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1381                                  		;;mov	dx, [cs:TempH]		; DX:AX = Track
  1382                                  		
  1383 00000220 50                      		push	ax
  1384                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  1385                                  		; 15/09/2023
  1386 00000221 89E8                    		mov	ax, bp ; [TempH]
  1387 00000223 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1388                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1389 00000225 F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1390                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; Start cyl in AX, head in dl
  1391                                  		;mov	[TempH], ax
  1392                                  		;;mov	[cs:TempH], ax
  1393 00000229 58                      		pop	ax
  1394 0000022A F736[1800]              		div	word [NumHeads]
  1395                                  		;div	word [cs:NumHeads]	; [TempH]:AX = Cylinder, DX = Head
  1396                                  
  1397                                  			; At this moment, we assume that TempH = 0,
  1398                                  			; ax <= 1024, dx <= 255
  1399                                  
  1400 0000022E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
  1401                                  		
  1402 00000230 B106                    		mov	cl, 6
  1403 00000232 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl			; Shift cyl high bits up
  1404 00000234 08DC                    		or	ah, bl			; Mix in with sector bits
  1405 00000236 88C5                    		mov	ch, al			; Setup cyl low
  1406 00000238 88E1                    		mov	cl, ah			; Setup cyl/high - sector
  1407 0000023A 89FB                    		mov	bx, di			; Get back OFFSET
  1408                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1409 0000023C 8A16[2600]              		mov	dl, [BootDrive]		; Get drive
  1410                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:BootDrive]	; Get drive
  1411 00000240 89F0                    		mov	ax, si			; Get number of sectors to read (al)
  1412 00000242 B402                    		mov	ah, 2			; Read sectors
  1413                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1414                                  		;push	ax
  1415                                  		;push	di
  1416                                  
  1417                                  			; Issue one read request. ES:BX have the transfer address,
  1418                                  			; AL is the number of sectors.	
  1419                                  
  1420 00000244 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  1421                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  1422                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  1423                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  1424                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1425                                  		;pop	di
  1426                                  		;pop	ax
  1427                                  
  1428                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1429 00000246 B400                    		mov	ah, 0
  1430                                  		
  1431 00000248 59                      		pop	cx		; Get retry count back
  1432 00000249 7307                    		jnc	short ReadOk	; 23/12/2022
  1433                                  		
  1434                                  		; 23/12/2022

  1474                                  		;mul	word [cs:BytesPerSec]

  1476                                  
  1477                                  		; 24/12/2022

  1500                                  		;adc	word [cs:StartSecH], 0
  1501 00000269 EB90                    		jmp	ReadSectors
  1502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1503

  1507                                  		; 24/12/2022

  1509                                  		;push	cs
  1510                                  		;pop	ds
  1511                                  		
  1512 0000026B BE[3403]                		mov	si, NonSystemDiskMsg ; "\r\nNon-System disk or disk error\r\nRe"...
  1513 0000026E E81500                  		call	WriteTTY
  1514                                  
  1515                                  		; Wait for a keypress on the keyboard.
  1516                                  		; Use the bios keyboard interrupt.
  1517                                  
  1518 00000271 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  1519 00000273 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  1520                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  1521                                  
  1522                                  		; We have to restore the address of the original rom disk
  1523                                  		; parameter table to the location at [0:DskAddr]. The address
  1524                                  		; of this original table has been saved previously in
  1525                                  		; 0:OrgDasdPtr and 0:OrgDasdPtr+2. After this table address
  1526                                  		; has been restored we can reboot by invoking the bootstrap
  1527                                  		; loader bios interrupt.

  1534 00000275 C41E[2A00]              		les	bx, [OrgDasdPtr] ; Correct DS segment = CS
  1535

  1539 0000027A 1F                      		pop	ds
  1540                                  		; 07/10/2023

  1542                                  		;mov	ds, si

  1547 00000280 8C4402                  		mov	[si+2], es	; restore segment
  1548                                  
  1549 00000283 CD19                    		int	19h		; reboot

  1591                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1592                                  
  1593                                  ; GetNextFatEntry
  1594                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1595                                  ;
  1596                                  ; NOTES:
  1597                                  ;
  1598                                  ;   given the last cluster found, this will return the next cluster of
  1599                                  ;   iosys. if the last cluster is (f)ff8 - (f)fff, then the final cluster
  1600                                  ;   of iosys has been loaded, and control is passed to goto_iosys
  1601                                  ;   msload can handle maximum fat area size of 128 kb.
  1602                                  ;
  1603                                  ; INPUT:
  1604                                  ;
  1605                                  ;    CS:CurrentCluster
  1606                                  ;    CS:FatSize
  1607                                  ;
  1608                                  ; OUTPUT:
  1609                                  ;
  1610                                  ;   CS:CurrentCluster (updated)
  1611                                  ;
  1612                                  ; calls:  GetFatSector
  1613                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1614                                  ; get CurrentCluster
  1615                                  ;
  1616                                  ; if (16 bit fat)
  1617                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = fff8 - ffff)
  1618                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1619                                  ;     else
  1620                                  ;	{get OFFSET by multiply cluster by 2}
  1621                                  ;
  1622                                  ; else
  1623                                  ;    {if (CurrentCluster = ff8 - fff)
  1624                                  ;	 {jmp goto_iosys}
  1625                                  ;     else
  1626                                  ;	{get OFFSET by	- multiply cluster by 3
  1627                                  ;
  1628                                  ;	 rotate right to divide by 2
  1629                                  ;
  1630                                  ;	 if (cy set - means odd number)
  1631                                  ;	    {shr 4 times to keep high twelve bits}
  1632                                  ;
  1633                                  ;	 else
  1634                                  ;	    {and with 0fffh to keep low 12 bits}
  1635                                  ;	}
  1636                                  ;    }
  1637                                  ;
  1638                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1639                                  
  1640                                  ; 09/12/2022
  1641                                  ; FAT_12_BIT equ 1
  1642                                  ; NOT_END_OF_FILE equ 0  ; ~END_OF_FILE ; END_OF_FILE equ 0FFh
  1643                                  
  1644                                  GetNextFatEntry:
  1645 00000293 06                      		push	es
  1646                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1647                                  		; ds = cs
  1648                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:FatSegment]
  1649 00000294 A1[3200]                		mov	ax, [FatSegment]
  1650 00000297 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax		; ES-> FAT area segment
  1651                                  		; 09/12/2022
  1652                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], END_OF_FILE
  1653                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1654                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1655                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1656                                  		; ds = cs
  1657 00000299 C606[2900]FF            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0FFh ; Assume last cluster
  1658 0000029E A1[0E00]                		mov	ax, [CurrentCluster] ; Get last cluster
  1659                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1660 000002A1 29D2                    		sub	dx, dx
  1661                                  		; dx = 0
  1662 000002A3 803E[2700]01            		cmp	byte [Fatsize], 1
  1663                                  		;;cmp	byte [cs:FatSize], FAT_12_BIT
  1664                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:Fatsize], 1
  1665 000002A8 7539                    		jne	short Got16Bit	; 23/12/2022
  1666                                  Got12Bit:
  1667 000002AA 89C6                    		mov	si, ax
  1668 000002AC D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  1669 000002AE 01C6                    		add	si, ax		; SI = AX * 1.5 = AX + AX/2
  1670                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1671 000002B0 56                      		push	si ; (**)
  1672                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1673                                  		;push	dx
  1674                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1675                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1676                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1677 000002B1 E84700                  		call	GetFatSector
  1678                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1679 000002B4 5E                      		pop	si ; (**)
  1680                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1681                                  		;pop	dx
  1682 000002B5 7512                    		jnz	short ClusterOk
  1683 000002B7 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]
  1684                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1685                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster], al
  1686                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1687 000002BA 50                      		push	ax ; (*)
  1688 000002BB 46                      		inc	si
  1689                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1690                                  		;push	dx
  1691 000002BC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1692 000002BE E83A00                  		call	GetFatSector	; Read next fat sector
  1693                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1694                                  		;pop	dx
  1695                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1696                                  		;mov	al, [es:0]
  1697                                  		;mov	[cs:TempCluster+1], al
  1698                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:TempCluster]
  1699                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1700                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1701 000002C1 58                      		pop	ax ; (*) 
  1702 000002C2 268A260000              		mov	ah, [es:0]
  1703 000002C7 EB03                    		jmp	short EvenOdd
  1704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1705                                  
  1706                                  ClusterOk:				
  1707 000002C9 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1708                                  EvenOdd:	
  1709                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1710                                  		; ds = cs
  1711 000002CC F606[0E00]01            		test	byte [CurrentCluster], 1
  1712                                  		; 10/12/2022		
  1713                                  		;test	byte [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; 09/12/2022
  1714                                  		;;test	word [cs:CurrentCluster], 1 ; Was last cluster odd?
  1715 000002D1 7505                    		jnz	short OddResult		; If not zero it was odd
  1716 000002D3 25FF0F                  		and	ax, 0FFFh		; Keep low 12 bits
  1717 000002D6 EB04                    		jmp	short TestEOF
  1718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1719                                  
  1720                                  OddResult:				
  1721 000002D8 B104                    		mov	cl, 4			; Keep high 12 bits for odd
  1722 000002DA D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl
  1723                                  TestEOF:				
  1724 000002DC 3DF80F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF8h		; Is it last cluster?
  1725 000002DF 7318                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone	; Yep, all done here
  1726 000002E1 EB11                    		jmp	short NotLastCluster
  1727                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1728                                  
  1729                                  Got16Bit:
  1730                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1731                                  		;push	dx
  1732                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  1733                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1734                                  		; ax = cluster number
  1735                                  		; dx = 0
  1736                                  		;sub	dx, dx ; 23/12/2022
  1737 000002E3 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1			; Multiply cluster by 2
  1738                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1739                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1740 000002E5 11D2                    		adc	dx, dx ; 0
  1741 000002E7 89C6                    		mov	si, ax			; Get the final buffer OFFSET
  1742 000002E9 E80F00                  		call	GetFatSector
  1743                                  		; 23/12/2022
  1744                                  		;pop	dx
  1745 000002EC 268B07                  		mov	ax, [es:bx]
  1746 000002EF 83F8F8                  		cmp	ax, 0FFF8h
  1747 000002F2 7305                    		jnb	short GotClusterDone
  1748                                  NotLastCluster:	
  1749                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1750                                  		; ds = cs			
  1751                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], NOT_END_OF_FILE ; ~END_OF_FILE
  1752                                  		;mov	byte [cs:EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1753 000002F4 C606[2900]00            		mov	byte [EndOfFile], 0	; Assume not last cluster
  1754                                  GotClusterDone:				
  1755 000002F9 07                      		pop	es
  1756                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1757                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1758                                  ;EndRead:
  1759 000002FA C3                      		retn
  1760                                  
  1761                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  1762                                  
  1763                                  ; GetFatSector
  1764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1765                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ES:0
  1766                                  ;
  1767                                  ;in). SI = offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find.
  1768                                  ;     ES = fat sector segment
  1769                                  ;     CS:BytesPerSec
  1770                                  ;
  1771                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  1772                                  ;      BX = offset value of the corresponding fat entry in the fat sector.
  1773                                  ;      CX destroyed.
  1774                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e. when 12 bit fat entry
  1775                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  1776                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  1777                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat).
  1778                                  ;
  1779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1780                                  
  1781                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1782                                  		; 22/12/2022
  1783                                  GetFatSector:
  1784                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1785                                  		;push	ax
  1786                                  		;push	si
  1787 000002FB 57                      		push	di
  1788 000002FC 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  1789                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1790                                  		; ds = cs
  1791                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1792                                  		;div	cx			; AX = Sector number, DX = Offset
  1793 000002FE F736[1000]              		div	word [BytesPerSec]
  1794 00000302 3B06[0A00]              		cmp	ax, [LastFatSector]
  1795                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:LastFatSector]	; The same fat sector?
  1796 00000306 7421                    		je	short SplitChk		; Don't need to read it again.
  1797 00000308 A3[0A00]                		mov	[LastFatSector], ax
  1798                                  		;mov	[cs:LastFatSector], ax
  1799 0000030B 52                      		push	dx
  1800                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1801 0000030C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  1802                                  		;add	ax, [cs:HiddenSectorsL]
  1803                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:HiddenSectorsH]
  1804                                  		;add	ax, [cs:ReservSectors]
  1805                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  1806                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1807                                  		; ds = cs
  1808 0000030E 0306[2E00]              		add	ax, [FatStartSecL]
  1809 00000312 1316[3000]              		adc	dx, [FatStartSecH]
  1810 00000316 A3[0600]                		mov	[StartSecL], ax
  1811 00000319 8916[0800]              		mov	[StartSecH], dx		; Set up for ReadSectors
  1812                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecL], ax
  1813                                  		;mov	[cs:StartSecH], dx	; Set up for ReadSectors
  1814                                  		
  1815 0000031D C706[0C00]0100          		mov	word [SectorCount], 1	; 1 sector
  1816                                  		;mov	word [cs:SectorCount], 1 ; 1 sector
  1817 00000323 31FF                    		xor	di, di ; 0
  1818                                  		; es:di = FATSEGMENT:0000h
  1819 00000325 E8D3FE                  		call	ReadSectors
  1820 00000328 5A                      		pop	dx
  1821                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1822                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:BytesPerSec]
  1823                                  SplitChk:
  1824                                  		; 24/12/2022
  1825 00000329 8B0E[1000]              		mov	cx, [BytesPerSec]
  1826 0000032D 49                      		dec	cx			; CX = SECTOR SIZE - 1
  1827 0000032E 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx			; If last byte of sector, splitted entry.
  1828 00000330 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx			; set bx to dx
  1829 00000332 5F                      		pop	di
  1830                                  		; 06/10/2023
  1831                                  		;pop	si
  1832                                  		;pop	ax
  1833                                  		; 07/10/2023
  1834                                  ;EndWrite:		; 10/12/2022
  1835 00000333 C3                      		retn
  1836                                  
  1837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1838                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1839

  1846                                  		;db 0	; (word alignment)
  1847                                  NonSystemDiskMsg:
  1848 00000334 0D0A                    		db 0Dh,0Ah		; ...
  1849 00000336 4E6F6E2D5379737465-     		db 'Non-System disk or disk error',0Dh,0Ah
  1849 0000033F 6D206469736B206F72-
  1849 00000348 206469736B20657272-
  1849 00000351 6F720D0A           
  1850 00000355 5265706C6163652061-     		db 'Replace and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah,0
  1850 0000035E 6E6420707265737320-
  1850 00000367 616E79206B65792077-
  1850 00000370 68656E207265616479-
  1850 00000379 0D0A00             
  1851                                  ; 25/12/2022

  1857                                  number0mod	equ (number0div % 16)
  1858

  1861                                  %endif

  1868                                  ;=============================================================================
  1869                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) DATA SEGMENT 
  1870                                  ;=============================================================================
  1871                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  1872                                  
  1873                                  section .BIOSDATA vstart=0
  1874                                  
  1875                                  ;--- DOSBIOS data segment ----------------------------------------------------
  1876                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1877                                  
  1878                                  ;Bios_Data segment
  1879                                  
  1880                                  BData_start:				
  1881 00000000 E96F17                  hdrv_pat:	jmp	init		; MSBIO1.ASM, MSSBDATA.INC
  1882                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  1883                                  
  1884 00000003 0000                    DosDataSg:	dw 0
  1885                                  
  1886                                  ; DOS's int 2f handler will exit via a jump through here.
  1887                                  ; This is how the BIOS hooks int2f
  1888                                  			
  1889 00000005 EA                      bios_i2f:	db 0EAh			; far jump to int_2f (segment may not be at 70h)
  1890 00000006 [9108]                  off_706:	dw int_2f
  1891 00000008 7000                    word_708:	dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  1892                                  
  1893 0000000A 0000                    romstartaddr:	dw 0			; The start address for the romfind routines
  1894                                  					; This is to maintain binary compatibility
  1895                                  					; with DISK based DOS 5.0
  1896                                  
  1897                                  ; This is a byte used for special key handling in the resident
  1898                                  ; console device driver. It must be here so that it can be included
  1899                                  ; in the WIN386 instance table (in INC\LMSTUB.ASM).
  1900                                  
  1901 0000000C 00                      altah:		db 0			; special key handling
  1902

  2047 00000119 [4E03]                  start_bds:	dw bds1			; Start	of linked list of BDS's
  2048 0000011B 7000                    		dw 70h			; KERNEL_SEGMENT
  2049                                  
  2050                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2051                                  ; Some floppy drives do not have changeline support. The result is a
  2052                                  ; large amount of inefficiency in the code. A media-check always returns
  2053                                  ; "I don`t know". This cause DOS to reread the FAT on every access and
  2054                                  ; always discard any cached data.
  2055                                  ;    We get around this inefficiency by implementing a "Logical Door Latch".
  2056                                  ; The following three items are used to do this. The logical door latch is
  2057                                  ; based on the premise that it is not physically possible to change floppy
  2058                                  ; disks in a drive in under two seconds (most people take about 10). The
  2059                                  ; logical door latch is implemented by saving the time of the last successful
  2060                                  ; disk operation (in the value TIM_DRV). When a new request is made the
  2061                                  ; current time is compared to the saved time. If less than two seconds have
  2062                                  ; passed then the value "No Change" is returned. If more than two seconds
  2063                                  ; have passed the value "Don't Know" is returned.
  2064                                  ;    There is one complecation to this algorithm. Some programs change the
  2065                                  ; value of the timer. In this unfortunate case we have an invalid timer.
  2066                                  ; This possibility is detected by counting the number of disk operations
  2067                                  ; which occur without any time passing. If this count exceeds the value of
  2068                                  ; "AccessMax" we assume the counter is invalid and always return "Don't
  2069                                  ; Know". The variable "AccessCount" is used to keep track of the number
  2070                                  ; of disk operation which occur without the time changing.
  2071                                  
  2072 0000011D 00                      accesscount:	db 0			
  2073 0000011E FF                      tim_drv:	db 0FFh			
  2074 0000011F 00                      medbyt:		db 0
  2075                                  wrtverify:	; 15/10/2022			
  2076 00000120 02                      rflag:		db 2			; 2 for	read, 3	for write
  2077 00000121 00                      verify:		db 0			; 1 if verify after write
  2078 00000122 0000                    seccnt:		dw 0			
  2079 00000124 00                      		db 0			; -- pad where hardnum was
  2080 00000125 01                      dsktnum:	db 1			; number of diskette drives			
  2081                                  
  2082                                  ; (MSDOS 3.3) NOTE:
  2083                                  ; Some of the older versions of the IBM rom-bios always assumed a seek would
  2084                                  ; have to be made to read the diskette. Consequently a large head settle
  2085                                  ; time was always used in the I/O operations. To get around this problem
  2086                                  ; we need to continually adjust the head settle time. The following
  2087                                  ; algorithm is used:
  2088                                  ;
  2089                                  ;   Get the current head settle value.
  2090                                  ;   If it is 1, then
  2091                                  ;	set slow = 15
  2092                                  ;   else
  2093                                  ;	set slow = value
  2094                                  ;   ...
  2095                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing then
  2096                                  ;	use slow
  2097                                  ;   else
  2098                                  ;	use fast
  2099                                  ;   ...
  2100                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  2101                                  
  2102 00000126 00                      motorstartup:	db 0			; value from table
  2103 00000127 00                      settlecurrent:	db 0			; value	from table
  2104 00000128 00                      settleslow:	db 0			; slow settle value
  2105 00000129 00                      nextspeed:	db 0			; value	of speed to be used
  2106 0000012A 00                      save_head_sttl:	db 0			; used by read_sector routine
  2107 0000012B 00                      save_eot:	db 0			; saved	eot from the default DPT
  2108 0000012C 09                      eot:		db 9			
  2109 0000012D 00000000                dpt:		dd 0			; pointer to Disk Parameter Table			
  2110 00000131 00                      cursec:		db 0			; current sector
  2111 00000132 00                      curhd:		db 0			; current head
  2112 00000133 0000                    curtrk:		dw 0			; current track
  2113 00000135 0000                    spsav:		dw 0			; save the stack pointer
  2114 00000137 08                      formt_eot:	db 8			; eot used for format
  2115 00000138 00                      hdnum:		db 0			; head number
  2116 00000139 0000                    trknum:		dw 0			; track	being manipulated
  2117 0000013B 50                      gap_patch:	db 50h			; format gap patched into dpt

  2527                                  ;************************************************************************
  2528                                  ;*									*
  2529                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2530                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2531                                  ;*									*
  2532                                  ;************************************************************************
  2533                                  
  2534                                  strategy:	; proc far

  2536                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2537 000006FA 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2538 000006FF CB                      		retf

  2540                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2541                                  
  2542                                  ;************************************************************************
  2543                                  ;*									*
  2544                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2545                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2546                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2547                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2548                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2549                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2550                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2551                                  ;*									*
  2552                                  ;************************************************************************
  2553                                  
  2554                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2555                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2556                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2557                                  
  2558                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2559                                  
  2560                                  con_entry:

  2661                                  
  2662                                  ;************************************************************************
  2663                                  ;*									*
  2664                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2665                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2666                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2667                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2668                                  ;*									*
  2669                                  ;************************************************************************
  2670                                  
  2671                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2672 00000743 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2673 00000749 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2674                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2675 0000074B 50                      		push	ax
  2676 0000074C 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2677 00000750 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2678 00000755 58                      		pop	ax
  2679 00000756 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2680                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2681                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2682                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2683 00000758 2EFF2E[DE06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2684                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2685                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2686                                  
  2687                                  not_from_dos:				
  2688 0000075D E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2689 00000760 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2690                                  
  2691                                  ;************************************************************************
  2692                                  ;*									*
  2693                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2694                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2695                                  ;*									*
  2696                                  ;************************************************************************
  2697                                  
  2698                                  outchr:					
  2699 00000762 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2700 00000763 56                      		push	si
  2701 00000764 57                      		push	di
  2702 00000765 55                      		push	bp
  2703 00000766 53                      		push	bx
  2704 00000767 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2705 00000769 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2706 0000076C CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2707                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2708                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2709 0000076E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2710 0000076F 5D                      		pop	bp
  2711 00000770 5F                      		pop	di
  2712 00000771 5E                      		pop	si
  2713 00000772 58                      		pop	ax
  2714 00000773 CF                      		iret
  2715                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2716                                  
  2717                                  ;************************************************************************
  2718                                  ;*									*
  2719                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2720                                  ;*									*
  2721                                  ;************************************************************************
  2722                                  
  2723                                  block13:				
  2724 00000774 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2725 0000077A 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2726 0000077C E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2727 0000077F 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2728 00000781 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2729                                  
  2730                                  skipa20:				
  2731 00000784 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2732 00000789 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2733 0000078A 2EFF1E[EA06]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2734                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2735                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2736 0000078F 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2737 00000794 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2738                                  
  2739                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2740                                  
  2741                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2742                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2743                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2744                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2745                                  
  2746                                  call_orig13:	; proc far

  2748 0000079B 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2749 0000079C 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2750                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2751 000007A1 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2752 000007A6 0E                      		push	cs
  2753 000007A7 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2754                                  
  2755 000007A8 9C                      		pushf
  2756                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2757                                  		; ds = cs
  2758 000007A9 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2759                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2760 000007AE 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2761 000007B0 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2762 000007B3 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2763 000007B5 E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2764                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2765 000007B8 9D                      		popf
  2766 000007B9 CB                      		retf

  2819 000007DD 2EC43E[BE07]            		les	di, [cs:LoMem]
