  2843                                  ;************************************************************************
  2844                                  ;*									*
  2845                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2846                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2847                                  ;*									*
  2848                                  ;************************************************************************
  2849                                  
  2850                                  int19:					
  2851 000007F9 0E                      		push	cs
  2852 000007FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2853 000007FB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022
  2854 000007FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  2855                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2856 00000802 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2857                                  next_int:				
  2858 00000805 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2859 00000806 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2860 00000807 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2861 00000809 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2862 0000080B 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2863 0000080D AD                      		lodsw
  2864 0000080E AB                      		stosw
  2865 0000080F AD                      		lodsw
  2866 00000810 AB                      		stosw			; install the saved vector
  2867 00000811 E2F2                    		loop	next_int
  2868 00000813 803E[4006]00            		cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  2869 00000818 7422                    		jz	short doint19
  2870 0000081A BE[4106]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2871                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2872 0000081D B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2873                                  
  2874                                  i19_restore_loop:			
  2875 00000820 AC                      		lodsb			; get interrupt	number
  2876 00000821 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2877 00000822 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2878 00000824 AD                      		lodsw			; get original vector offset
  2879 00000825 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2880 00000827 AD                      		lodsw
  2881 00000828 83FBFF                  		cmp	bx, 0FFFFh	; check	for 0ffffh (unlikely segment)
  2882 0000082B 740D                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too
  2883 0000082D 83F8FF                  		cmp	ax, 0FFFFh	; opt 0ffffh is	unlikely offset
  2884 00000830 7408                    		jz	short i19_restor_1
  2885 00000832 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2886 00000834 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2887 00000836 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2888 00000837 AB                      		stosw
  2889 00000838 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2890 00000839 AB                      		stosw			; put the vector back
  2891                                  
  2892                                  i19_restor_1:				
  2893 0000083A E2E4                    		loop	i19_restore_loop
  2894                                  
  2895                                  doint19:				
  2896 0000083C 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; ; Is dos running from	HMA
  2897 00000841 7403                    		jz	short SkipVDisk
  2898 00000843 E83000                  		call	EraseVDiskHead	; Then erase our VDISK header at 1MB boundary
  2899                                  					; Some m/c's (AST 386 & HP QS/16 do not clear
  2900                                  					; the memory above 1MB during a	warm boot.

  2903                                  					; causes reboot	of disk	system

  2909                                  ; procedure : int15
  2910                                  ;
  2911                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2912                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2913                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2914                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2915                                  ;
  2916                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2917                                  
  2918                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2919                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2920                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2921                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2922                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2923                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2924                                  
  2925                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2926                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2927 00000848 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2928 0000084B 7405                    		jz	short int15_1
  2929 0000084D 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2930                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2931                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2932                                  
  2933                                  int15_1:				
  2934 00000852 1E                      		push	ds
  2935 00000853 50                      		push	ax

  2937 00000857 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2938                                  		;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2939                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2940 00000859 A01700                  		mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2941 0000085C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2942 0000085E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2943 00000860 750C                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2944 00000862 0E                      		push	cs
  2945 00000863 1F                      		pop	ds
  2946 00000864 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2947 00000869 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2948 0000086B E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2949                                  int15_2:				
  2950 0000086E 58                      		pop	ax
  2951 0000086F 1F                      		pop	ds
  2952 00000870 F9                      		stc
  2953 00000871 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2954                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2955

  2963                                  ;

  2966                                  EraseVDiskHead:	; proc near		
  2967 00000876 50                      		push	ax

  2975 00000885 B91000                  		mov	cx, 10h		; size of vdisk	header
  2976 00000888 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax

  2978 0000088C 07                      		pop	es
  2979 0000088D 5F                      		pop	di

  3027                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  3028                                  
  3029                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  3030                                  ;
  3031                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  3032                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  3033                                  
  3034 0000089A 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  3035                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  3036 0000089C 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  3037 000008A0 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  3038 000008A4 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  3039 000008A8 [AC08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  3040 000008AA 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  3041                                  
  3042                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  3043                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  3044                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  3045                                  
  3046 000008AC 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  3047 000008B0 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  3048 000008B2 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  3049 000008B6 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  3050 000008B8 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  3051 000008BA 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  3052 000008BC 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  3053                                  
  3054                                  NextStack:
  3055                                  
  3056                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  3057                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  3058                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  3059                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  3060                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  3061                                  
  3062 000008BE 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  3063 000008C2 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  3064 000008C4 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  3065 000008C8 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  3066 000008CA 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  3067                                  
  3068                                  					;SR;
  3069 000008CE 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  3070                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  3071                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3072                                  
  3073                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  3074                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  3075                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  3076                                  
  3077                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  3078 000008CF 57                      		push	di
  3079 000008D0 06                      		push	es
  3080 000008D1 53                      		push	bx
  3081 000008D2 50                      		push	ax
  3082 000008D3 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  3083 000008D5 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  3084 000008D7 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  3085 000008DA B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  3086 000008DD CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  3087                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  3088                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  3089 000008DF 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3090 000008E1 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  3091 000008E3 740A                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  3092                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  3093 000008E5 0E                      		push	cs
  3094                                  		;;mov	ax,offset Skip
  3095                                  		;mov	ax,Skip
  3096                                  		;push	ax
  3097                                  		; 08/10/2023
  3098 000008E6 68[EF08]                		push	Skip
  3099 000008E9 06                      		push	es
  3100 000008EA 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  3101 000008EB B80100                  		mov	ax,1		; SetFocus function number
  3102 000008EE CB                      		retf			; do the call
  3103                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3104                                  
  3105                                  Skip:					
  3106 000008EF 58                      		pop	ax
  3107 000008F0 5B                      		pop	bx
  3108 000008F1 07                      		pop	es
  3109 000008F2 5F                      		pop	di
  3110 000008F3 CB                      		retf
  3111

  3384                                  
  3385                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3386                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3387                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3388                                  
  3389                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3390                                  
  3391                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3392                                  ;
  3393                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3394                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3395                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3396                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3397                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3398                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3399                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3400                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3401                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3402                                  ;
  3403                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3404                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3405                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3406                                  ;
  3407                                  ;	uses:	
  3408                                  ;
  3409                                  ;
  3410                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3411                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3412                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3413                                  ;
  3414                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3415                                  
  3416                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3417                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3418                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3419                                  
  3420                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3421                                  
  3422                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3423                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3424                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3425                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3426                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3427                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3428                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3429                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3430                                  
  3431                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3432                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3433                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3434                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3435                                  
  3436                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3437 000012DB 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3438 000012DE 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3439 000012E0 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3440 000012E3 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3441 000012E5 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3442 000012E8 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3443                                  atd1:
  3444 000012EA 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3445                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3446                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3447                                  
  3448                                  atd2:					
  3449 000012EF 53                      		push	bx
  3450 000012F0 51                      		push	cx
  3451 000012F1 52                      		push	dx
  3452 000012F2 57                      		push	di
  3453 000012F3 1E                      		push	ds
  3454 000012F4 06                      		push	es
  3455 000012F5 50                      		push	ax
  3456 000012F6 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3457                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3458 000012F9 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3459                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3460 000012FB C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3461                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3462                                  					; initially no error code.
  3463 00001300 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3464 00001303 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3465                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3466 00001307 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3467                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3468 00001309 C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3469 0000130E EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3470                                  					; return
  3471                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3472                                  
  3473                                  atd3:					
  3474 00001310 53                      		push	bx
  3475 00001311 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3476 00001313 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3477 00001316 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3478 00001318 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3479 0000131A 5B                      		pop	bx
  3480 0000131B 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3481 0000131E 0E                      		push	cs
  3482 0000131F E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3483 00001322 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3484 00001324 58                      		pop	ax
  3485 00001325 50                      		push	ax
  3486 00001326 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3487 00001329 BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3488 0000132C EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3489 0000132D E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3490                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3491                                  
  3492                                  atd4:	
  3493                                  
  3494                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3495                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3496                                  				
  3497 00001330 58                      		pop	ax
  3498                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3499 00001331 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3500 00001335 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3501 00001337 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3502 00001339 F9                      		stc
  3503                                  atd5:					
  3504 0000133A 07                      		pop	es
  3505 0000133B 1F                      		pop	ds
  3506 0000133C 5F                      		pop	di
  3507 0000133D 5A                      		pop	dx
  3508 0000133E 59                      		pop	cx
  3509 0000133F 5B                      		pop	bx
  3510 00001340 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3511                                  
  3512                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3513                                  
  3514                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3515                                  ;
  3516                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3517                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3518                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3519                                  ;	
  3520                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3521                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3522                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3523                                  ;
  3524                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3525                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3526                                  ;
  3527                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3528                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3529                                  
  3530                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3531                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3532                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3533 00001343 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3534                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3535 00001346 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3536 0000134B 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3537 0000134E 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3538 00001350 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3539                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3540                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3541                                  setc1:					
  3542 00001355 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3543 00001357 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3544                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3545                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3546 00001359 A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3547 0000135C 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3548 00001360 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3549 00001362 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3550                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3551 00001365 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3552 00001368 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3553 0000136A C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3554 0000136D 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3555 00001370 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3556 00001372 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3557                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3558 00001374 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3559 00001377 06                      		push	es
  3560 00001378 53                      		push	bx
  3561 00001379 0E                      		push	cs
  3562 0000137A E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3563 0000137D 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3564                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3565 00001381 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3566                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3567 00001384 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3568                                  					; only use low part
  3569 00001387 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3570                                  					; control byte modifier
  3571 0000138B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3572 0000138C 07                      		pop	es
  3573                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3574 0000138D 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3575 00001391 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3576 00001394 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3577                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3578 00001396 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3579 0000139A C3                      		retn
  3580                                  
  3581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3582                                  
  3583                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3584                                  ;
  3585                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3586                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3587                                  ;
  3588                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3589                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3590                                  ;
  3591                                  ;	
  3592                                  ;
  3593                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3594                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3595                                  ;
  3596                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3597                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3598                                  
  3599                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3600 0000139B 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3601 0000139D 0E                      		push	cs
  3602 0000139E E84000                  		call	command
  3603 000013A1 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3604                                  doc1:					
  3605 000013A3 0E                      		push	cs
  3606 000013A4 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3607 000013A7 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3608 000013A9 B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3609 000013AC BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3610 000013AF FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3611 000013B0 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3612                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3613                                  
  3614                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3615                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3616                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3617                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3618                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3619                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3620                                  ;
  3621                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3622                                  
  3623                                  rsct_loop:				
  3624 000013B1 6D                      		insw
  3625 000013B2 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3626 000013B4 FB                      		sti
  3627                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3628 000013B5 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3629                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3630                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3631 000013BA 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3632 000013BC 0E                      		push	cs
  3633 000013BD E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3634 000013C0 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3635 000013C2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3636 000013C5 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3637 000013C8 FA                      		cli
  3638 000013C9 F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3639 000013CB FB                      		sti
  3640                                  doc2:					
  3641 000013CC 0E                      		push	cs
  3642 000013CD E82900                  		call	check_status
  3643 000013D0 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3644                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3645 000013D2 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3646 000013D6 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3647                                  doc3:					
  3648 000013D8 C3                      		retn
  3649                                  
  3650                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3651                                  
  3652                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3653                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3654                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3655                                  
  3656                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3657                                  
  3658                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3659                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3660                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3661                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3662                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3663                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3664                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3665                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3666                                  
  3667                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3668                                  ;
  3669                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3670                                  ;
  3671                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3672                                  ;
  3673                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3674                                  ;
  3675                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3676                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3677                                  ;	
  3678                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3679                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3680                                  
  3681                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3682                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3683                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3684                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3685 000013D9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3686 000013DC EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3687                                  
  3688                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3689                                  
  3690                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3691                                  ;
  3692                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3693                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3694                                  ;
  3695                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3696                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3697                                  ;
  3698                                  ;
  3699                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3700                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3701                                  ;
  3702                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3703                                  
  3704                                  command:	; proc near		
  3705                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3706                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3707                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3708 000013E1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3709 000013E4 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3710                                  
  3711                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3712                                  
  3713                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3714                                  ;
  3715                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3716                                  ;
  3717                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3718                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3719                                  ;
  3720                                  ;
  3721                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3722                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3723                                  ;		
  3724                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3725                                  
  3726                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3727                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3728                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3729                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3730 000013E9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3731 000013EC EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3732                                  
  3733                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3734                                  
  3735                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3736                                  ;
  3737                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3738                                  ;
  3739                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3740                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3741                                  ;
  3742                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3743                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3744                                  
  3745                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3746                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3747                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3748                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3749 000013F1 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3750 000013F4 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3751                                  
  3752                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3753                                  
  3754                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3755                                  ;
  3756                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3757                                  ;
  3758                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3759                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3760                                  ;
  3761                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3762                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3763                                  
  3764                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3765                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3766                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3767                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3768 000013F9 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3769 000013FC EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3770                                  
  3771                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3772                                  
  3773                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3774                                  ;
  3775                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3776                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3777                                  ;
  3778                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3779                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3780                                  ;
  3781                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3782                                  
  3783                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3784                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3785                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3786                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3787 00001401 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3788 00001404 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3789                                  
  3790                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3791                                  
  3792                                  endatrom:
  3793                                  
  3794                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3795                                  
  3796                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3797                                  ;;
  3798                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3799                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3800                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3801                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3802                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3803                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3804                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3805                                  
  3806                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3807 00001409 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3808                                  					;
  3809                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3810                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3811                                  					;
  3812                                  					; warning!!!
  3813                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3814 0000140C 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3815                                  no_hookit:				
  3816                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3817                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3818 0000140E 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3819                                  
  3820                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3821                                  
  3822                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3823 00001413 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3824 00001416 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3825 00001418 1E                      		push	ds
  3826 00001419 50                      		push	ax
  3827 0000141A B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3828 0000141D 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3829 0000141F 58                      		pop	ax
  3830 00001420 9C                      		pushf
  3831                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3832                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3833 00001421 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3834 00001426 1F                      		pop	ds
  3835 00001427 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3836                                  
  3837                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3838                                  
  3839 0000142A 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3840                                  
  3841                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3842                                  
  3843                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3844                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3845                                  
  3846                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3847                                  
  3848                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3849                                  ;
  3850                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3851                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3852                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3853                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3854                                  
  3855                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3856 0000142B 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3857 00001430 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3858                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3859 00001437 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3860 00001439 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3861 0000143F 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3862 00001445 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3863                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3864                                  		
  3865                                  century20:				
  3866 00001447 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3867 0000144D 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3868 00001453 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3869                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3870                                  years:					
  3871 0000145A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3872 0000145C 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3873 00001460 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3874                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3875 00001463 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3876 00001465 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3877 0000146A B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3878 0000146C F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3879 0000146E 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3880 00001473 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3881 00001478 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3882 0000147F 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3883 00001481 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3884 00001486 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3885 0000148D B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3886                                  regularyear:				
  3887 00001490 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3888 00001497 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3889 00001499 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3890 0000149E 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3891 000014A5 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3892                                  					;
  3893                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3894                                  leapyear:				
  3895 000014A7 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3896                                  					; change month table.
  3897                                  yeardone:				
  3898 000014AD 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3899 000014AF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3900 000014B1 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3901                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3902 000014B5 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3903 000014B8 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3904                                  months:					
  3905 000014BB FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3906                                  
  3907                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3908                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3909                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3910                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3911                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3912                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3913                                  		
  3914 000014BD 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3915 000014BF 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3916                                  					; dh=0
  3917 000014C1 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3918 000014C3 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3919 000014C4 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3920 000014C6 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3921                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3922                                  month_done:				
  3923 000014C8 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3924                                  					; restore month table value
  3925 000014CE 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3926 000014D0 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3927 000014D5 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3928 000014DA 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3929                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3930                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3931 000014DF 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3932 000014E1 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3933                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3934 000014E6 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3935 000014E8 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3936                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3937 000014ED 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3938 000014EF 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3939                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3940 000014F4 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3941 000014F6 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3942 000014FB CB                      		retf
  3943                                  
  3944                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3945                                  
  3946                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3947                                  
  3948                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3949                                  
  3950                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3951                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3952                                  		
  3953 000014FC 51                      		push	cx		
  3954 000014FD D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3955 000014FF B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3956 00001501 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3957 00001503 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3958 00001505 59                      		pop	cx
  3959 00001506 CB                      		retf
  3960                                  
  3961                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3962                                  
  3963                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3964                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3965                                  
  3966                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3967                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3968                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3969                                  
  3970                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3971                                  
  3972                                  int6c:					
  3973 00001507 0E                      		push	cs
  3974 00001508 1F                      		pop	ds
  3975 00001509 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3976 0000150D 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3977 00001511 9D                      		popf
  3978 00001512 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3979 00001515 FA                      		cli
  3980 00001516 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3981 0000151A FB                      		sti
  3982 0000151B E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3983 0000151E FA                      		cli
  3984 0000151F B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3985 00001521 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3986                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3987                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3988 00001523 FB                      		sti
  3989                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3990                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3991 00001524 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3992                                  
  3993                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3994                                  
  3995                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3996                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3997                                  
  3998                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3999 00001528 50                      		push	ax
  4000 00001529 51                      		push	cx
  4001 0000152A 52                      		push	dx
  4002 0000152B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  4003 0000152D CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  4004                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  4005                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  4006                                  					; midnight
  4007                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  4008 0000152F 5A                      		pop	dx
  4009 00001530 59                      		pop	cx
  4010 00001531 58                      		pop	ax
  4011 00001532 50                      		push	ax
  4012 00001533 53                      		push	bx
  4013 00001534 51                      		push	cx
  4014 00001535 52                      		push	dx
  4015 00001536 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  4016                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  4017 0000153D B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  4018 0000153F CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4019                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  4020                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  4021                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  4022                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  4023 00001541 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  4024 00001543 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  4025                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4026                                  
  4027                                  read_ok:				
  4028 00001546 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  4029 0000154A 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  4030 0000154E 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  4031 00001552 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  4032 00001556 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  4033 0000155D E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  4034 00001560 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  4035 00001562 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  4036 00001569 E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  4037 0000156C 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  4038 0000156E 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  4039 00001575 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  4040 00001578 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  4041 0000157B 98                      		cbw
  4042 0000157C 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  4043 00001581 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  4044 00001583 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  4045                                  
  4046                                  century_19:				
  4047 00001586 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  4048 00001589 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  4049 0000158B F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  4050 0000158D 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  4051 0000158F 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  4052 00001590 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  4053                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  4054 00001593 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4055 00001595 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  4056 00001599 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  4057 0000159B 98                      		cbw
  4058 0000159C 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  4059 0000159E 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  4060 000015A0 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  4061 000015A3 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  4062 000015A5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  4063 000015AA EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  4064                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  4065                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4066                                  
  4067                                  leap_year:				
  4068 000015AC 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  4069 000015B1 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  4070                                  leap_adjustment:			
  4071 000015B3 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  4072                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  4073 000015B8 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  4074 000015BC 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4075 000015BE 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  4076 000015BF 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  4077 000015C4 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  4078 000015C8 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  4079 000015CA 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  4080 000015CB D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  4081 000015CD BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  4082 000015D0 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  4083                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4084                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  4085                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  4086                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  4087                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  4088 000015D2 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  4089                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  4090 000015D4 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  4091                                  r_d_ret:				
  4092 000015D9 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  4093 000015DE 5A                      		pop	dx
  4094 000015DF 59                      		pop	cx
  4095 000015E0 5B                      		pop	bx
  4096 000015E1 58                      		pop	ax
  4097 000015E2 C3                      		retn
  4098                                  
  4099                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4100                                  
  4101                                  r_t_retj:				
  4102 000015E3 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4103 000015E5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  4104 000015E7 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  4105                                  
  4106                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4107                                  
  4108                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  4109                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  4110                                  
  4111                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  4112 000015E9 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  4113 000015EB CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4114                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  4115                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  4116                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  4117 000015ED 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4118 000015EF 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  4119 000015F3 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  4120 000015F7 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  4121 000015FB C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  4122 00001600 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  4123 00001603 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4124 00001605 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  4125 00001608 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  4126 0000160A E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  4127 0000160D 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  4128 00001611 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  4129 00001615 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  4130 00001619 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  4131                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4132                                  		; 17/09/2022
  4133                                  		; 31/05/2019
  4134 0000161D FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  4135                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  4136                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  4137                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  4138                                  r_t_ret:				
  4139 00001621 C3                      		retn
  4140                                  
  4141                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4142                                  
  4143                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  4144                                  
  4145                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  4146 00001622 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  4147 00001625 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4148 00001628 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  4149 0000162B A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  4150 0000162E E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4151 00001631 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  4152 00001634 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4153 00001637 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4154 0000163A A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4155 0000163D A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4156 00001640 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4157 00001643 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4158 00001646 C3                      		retn
  4159                                  
  4160                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4161                                  
  4162                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4163                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4164                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4165                                  
  4166                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4167 00001647 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4168 00001649 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4169 0000164B B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4170 0000164D D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4171 0000164F D50A                    		aad
  4172 00001651 C3                      		retn
  4173                                  
  4174                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4175                                  
  4176                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4177                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4178                                  
  4179                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4180 00001652 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4181 00001657 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4182 00001659 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4183 0000165B 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4184                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4185                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4186 00001660 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4187 00001662 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4188                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4189                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4190 00001667 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4191                                  century_20:				
  4192 00001669 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4193 0000166E 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4194 00001670 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4195 00001675 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4196 00001677 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4197                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4198 0000167C 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4199 0000167E 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4200 00001683 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4201                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4202                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4203                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4204                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4205                                  		; cf=0
  4206                                  		;clc
  4207                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4208 00001685 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4209 0000168A C3                      		retn
  4210                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4211                                  
  4212                                  date_error:				
  4213 0000168B F9                      		stc
  4214                                  date_err2:
  4215 0000168C C3                      		retn
  4216                                  
  4217                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4218                                  
  4219                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4220                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4221                                  
  4222                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4223 0000168D 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4224 00001692 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4225 00001694 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4226 00001699 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4227                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4228                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4229                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4230                                  		;clc
  4231                                  		;retn
  4232                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4233 0000169B 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4234                                  time_error:
  4235                                  bv_error:	
  4236 000016A0 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4237 000016A1 C3                      		retn
  4238                                  
  4239                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4240                                  
  4241                                  ;time_error:				
  4242                                  		;stc
  4243                                  		;retn
  4244                                  
  4245                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4246                                  
  4247                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4248                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4249                                  
  4250                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4251 000016A2 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4252 000016A5 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4253                                  bv_loop:				
  4254 000016A8 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4255 000016AA 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4256 000016AC 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4257                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4258 000016AF 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4259 000016B1 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4260 000016B3 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4261 000016B5 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4262 000016B7 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4263 000016B9 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4264 000016BB 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4265 000016BE 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4266 000016C1 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4267 000016C3 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4268 000016C4 49                      		dec	cx
  4269 000016C5 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4270 000016C7 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4271 000016C8 C3                      		retn
  4272                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4273                                  
  4274                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4275                                  ;bv_error:				
  4276                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4277                                  		;retn
  4278                                  
  4279                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  4285                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4286                                  ;									:
  4287                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4288                                  ;									:
  4289                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4290                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4291                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4292                                  ;									:
  4293                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4294                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4295                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4296                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4297                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4298                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4299                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4300                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4301                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4302                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4303                                  ;		this program.						:
  4304                                  ;									:
  4305                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4306                                  
  4307                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4308                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4309

  4324 000016D8 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4325 000016DA 0000                    temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4326 000016DC FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.

  4390                                  ;   resb 1
  4391                                  ;   resw 1 ; 1

  4393                                  ;   resw 1
  4394                                  ;   resw 1
