  7242                                  set_recbpb:				
  7243 000020FD 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7244                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7245 00002100 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7246 00002103 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7247                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7248 00002105 5F                      		pop	di
  7249 00002106 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7250 00002107 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7251 0000210A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7252 0000210D 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7253 0000210F E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7254                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7255                                  
  7256                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7257                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7258                                  		;retn
  7259                                  
  7260                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7261                                  
  7262                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7263                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7264                                  
  7265                                  ; al = device number
  7266                                  
  7267                                  print_init:	
  7268 00002112 98                      		cbw
  7269 00002113 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7270 00002115 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7271 00002117 CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  7272                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7273                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7274                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7275 00002119 C3                      		retn
  7276                                  
  7277                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7278                                  
  7279                                  ; al = device number
  7280                                  
  7281                                  aux_init:
  7282 0000211A 98                      		cbw
  7283 0000211B 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7284                                  		;mov	al, 0A3h	; RSINIT ; 0A3h
  7285                                  					; 2400,n,1,8 (msequ.inc)
  7286                                  		;mov	ah, 0
  7287                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7288 0000211D B8A300                  		mov	ax, 00A3h
  7289 00002120 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - INITIALIZE USART
  7290                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7291                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7292                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7293                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7294 00002122 C3                      		retn
  7295

  7297                                  
  7298                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7299                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7300                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7301                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7302                                  
  7303                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7304                                  ;
  7305                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7306                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7307                                  ;
  7308                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7309                                  ;
  7310                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7311                                  ;   initialize it.
  7312                                  ;
  7313                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7314                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7315                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7316                                  ;
  7317                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7318                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7319                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7320                                  ;
  7321                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7322                                  ;   save coding.
  7323                                  ;
  7324                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7325                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7326                                  ;
  7327                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7328                                  ;
  7329                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7330                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7331                                  ;
  7332                                  ; called modules:
  7333                                  ;		  getboot
  7334                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7335                                  ;
  7336                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7337                                  ;
  7338                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7339                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7340                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7341                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7342                                  ;
  7343                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7344                                  
  7345                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7346                                  domini:	
  7347 00002123 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7348                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7349 00002127 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7350                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7351 00002129 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7352 0000212B B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7353                                  domini_loop:				
  7354 0000212D 52                      		push	dx
  7355 0000212E 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7356 00002132 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7357 00002134 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7358                                  					; DL = drive number
  7359                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7360                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7361                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7362 00002136 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7363 00002138 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7364 0000213A 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7365 0000213C A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7366 0000213F 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7367 00002142 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7368 00002144 A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7369 00002147 06                      		push	es
  7370 00002148 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7371 0000214C E87BFB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7372                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7373 0000214F 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7374 00002151 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7375                                  domininext:				
  7376 00002154 07                      		pop	es
  7377 00002155 5A                      		pop	dx
  7378 00002156 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7379 00002158 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7380 0000215A 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7381                                  dominiret:				
  7382 0000215C C3                      		retn
  7383                                  
  7384                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7385                                  
  7386                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7387                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7388                                  
  7389                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7390                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7391                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7392                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7393                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7394                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7395                                  ;
  7396                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7397                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7398                                  
  7399                                  
  7400                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7401 0000215D 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7402                                  fmpnext:				
  7403 00002161 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7404 00002165 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7405 00002167 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7406 0000216A 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7407 0000216E 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7408                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7409                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7410                                  fmpnextfound:
  7411 00002170 C3                      		retn
  7412                                  
  7413                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7414                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7415                                  ;fmpret:
  7416                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7417                                  
  7418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7419                                  
  7420                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7421                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7422 00002171 E89D00                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7423 00002174 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7424 00002176 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7425 0000217A C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7426                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7427 0000217F 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7428                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7429                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7430 00002183 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7431                                  					; ffHardFile
  7432 00002187 C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7433 0000218C A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7434 0000218F 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7435 00002192 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7436 00002195 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7437 00002198 A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7438 0000219B 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7439                                  					; set physical number
  7440 0000219E A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7441 000021A1 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7442                                  					; set logical number
  7443 000021A4 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7444 000021A9 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7445 000021AB 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7446                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7447 000021B0 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7448                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7449                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7450 000021B2 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7451 000021B5 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7452 000021B9 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7453 000021BC D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7454 000021BE D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7455 000021C0 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7456 000021C4 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7457                                  					; set hidden trks
  7458 000021C7 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7459 000021CB 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7460 000021CF 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7461 000021D3 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7462 000021D6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7463 000021D9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7464                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7465                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7466                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7467 000021DB 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7468 000021DD BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7469                                  
  7470                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7471                                  		;push	es
  7472 000021E0 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7473                                  					; bx value saved.
  7474                                  		;pop	es  ; 14/08/2023
  7475 000021E3 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7476 000021E5 E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7477                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7478 000021E8 E976FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7479                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7480                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7481                                  
  7482                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7483                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7484                                  		;retn
  7485                                  
  7486                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7487                                  
  7488                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7489                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7490                                  
  7491                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7492                                  	
  7493 000021EB 57                      		push	di
  7494 000021EC 53                      		push	bx
  7495                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7496                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  7497                                  		;push	ds
  7498 000021ED 06                      		push	es
  7499                                  setmini_1:				
  7500 000021EE 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7501 000021F2 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7502 000021F4 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7503 000021F8 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7504 000021FA 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7505 000021FE 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7506 00002200 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7507 00002203 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7508 00002207 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7509 00002209 F9                      		stc
  7510 0000220A 07                      		pop	es
  7511                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7512                                  		;pop	ds
  7513 0000220B 5B                      		pop	bx
  7514 0000220C 5F                      		pop	di
  7515 0000220D C3                      		retn
  7516                                  
  7517                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7518                                  setmini_2:				
  7519 0000220E E965FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7520                                  
  7521                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7522                                  
  7523                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7524                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7525                                  ;
  7526                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7527                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7528                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7529                                  ;
  7530                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7531                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7532                                  ;			trash ax
  7533                                  
  7534                                  dmax_check:	
  7535 00002211 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7536 00002216 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7537 00002218 06                      		push	es
  7538                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7539 00002219 B84F04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7540 0000221C 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7541                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7542 0000221E 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7543                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7544                                  					; set message flag
  7545                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  7546 00002224 07                      		pop	es
  7547                                  
  7548                                  		;;push	es
  7549                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7550                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7551                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7552                                  					; set message flag
  7553                                  		;;pop	es
  7554                                  		;
  7555                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7556                                  dmax_ok:				
  7557 00002225 C3                      		retn
  7558                                  
  7559                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7560                                  
  7561                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7562                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7563                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7564                                  ;								 
  7565                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7566                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7567                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7568                                  
  7569                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7570 00002226 56                      		push	si
  7571 00002227 53                      		push	bx
  7572 00002228 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7573                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7574 0000222C 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7575 0000222F 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7576                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7577 00002231 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7578 00002233 EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7579                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7580                                  
  7581                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7582                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7583 00002235 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7584                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7585 00002237 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7586                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7587 0000223A C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7588                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7589 0000223E 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7590                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7591                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7592 00002241 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7593 00002244 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7594 00002248 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7595 0000224A 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7596 0000224F FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7597 00002253 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7598 00002258 5B                      		pop	bx
  7599 00002259 5E                      		pop	si
  7600 0000225A C3                      		retn
  7601                                  
  7602                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7603                                  
  7604                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7605                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7606                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7607                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7608                                  
  7609                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7610 0000225B 50                      		push	ax
  7611 0000225C 51                      		push	cx
  7612 0000225D 52                      		push	dx
  7613 0000225E 55                      		push	bp
  7614 0000225F 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7615                                  loop_clock:				
  7616 00002261 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7617 00002263 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7618 00002265 B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7619 00002267 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7620                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7621                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7622                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7623 00002269 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7624 0000226C 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7625 0000226E 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7626 00002271 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7627 00002273 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7628 00002276 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7629 00002278 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7630 00002279 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7631                                  delay:					
  7632 0000227C E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7633 0000227E EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7634                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7635                                  
  7636                                  clock_present:				
  7637 00002280 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7638 00002286 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7639                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7640                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7641 00002289 56                      		push	si
  7642 0000228A E89BF2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7643 0000228D FA                      		cli
  7644                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7645 0000228E 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7646 00002292 FB                      		sti
  7647 00002293 5E                      		pop	si
  7648                                  
  7649                                  no_readdate:				
  7650 00002294 5D                      		pop	bp
  7651 00002295 5A                      		pop	dx
  7652 00002296 59                      		pop	cx
  7653 00002297 58                      		pop	ax
  7654 00002298 C3                      		retn
  7655                                  
  7656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7657                                  
  7658                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7659                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7660                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7661                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7662                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7663                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7664                                  ;
  7665                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7666                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7667                                  ;
  7668                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7669                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7670                                  ;
  7671                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7672                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7673                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7674                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7675                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7676                                  ;
  7677                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7678                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7679                                  
  7680                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7681                                  
  7682                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7683                                  
  7684                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7685                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7686                                  			
  7687 00002299 50                      		push	ax
  7688 0000229A 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7689 000022A0 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7690 000022A2 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7691                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7692 000022A8 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7693 000022AA 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7694                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7695 000022B0 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7696                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7697                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7698                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7699                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7700                                  cmosck4:				
  7701 000022B2 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7702                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7703 000022B4 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7704                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7705 000022B6 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7706 000022B9 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7707                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7708 000022BB E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7709 000022BE 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7710                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7711 000022C0 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7712 000022C2 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7713                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7714 000022C4 E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7715                                  cmosck9:				
  7716 000022C7 58                      		pop	ax
  7717 000022C8 C3                      		retn
  7718                                  
  7719                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7720                                  
  7721                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7722                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7723                                  ;									       :
  7724                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7725                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7726                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7727                                  ;									       :
  7728                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7729                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7730                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7731                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7732                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7733                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7734                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7735                                  
  7736                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7737 000022C9 9C                      		pushf
  7738 000022CA FA                      		cli
  7739 000022CB 53                      		push	bx
  7740 000022CC 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7741 000022CD 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7742 000022CF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7743                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7744 000022D1 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7745 000022D2 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7746 000022D4 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7747 000022D6 58                      		pop	ax
  7748 000022D7 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7749 000022D9 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7750 000022DB E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7751                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7752 000022DD 90                      		nop
  7753 000022DE E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7754 000022E0 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7755 000022E2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7756 000022E3 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7757 000022E4 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7758 000022E7 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7759                                  
  7760                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7761                                  
  7762                                  cmos_popf:				
  7763 000022E8 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7764                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7765                                  
  7766                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7767                                  
  7768                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7769                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7770                                  ;									       :
  7771                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7772                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7773                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7774                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7775                                  ;									       :
  7776                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7777                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7778                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7779                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7780                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7781                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7782                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7783                                  
  7784                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7785 000022E9 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7786 000022EA 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7787 000022EB FA                      		cli
  7788 000022EC 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7789 000022ED 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7790 000022EF E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7791                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7792 000022F1 90                      		nop
  7793 000022F2 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7794 000022F4 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7795 000022F6 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7796 000022F7 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7797 000022F9 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7798 000022FB E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7799                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7800 000022FD 90                      		nop
  7801 000022FE E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7802 00002300 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7803 00002301 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7804 00002302 E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7805 00002305 C3                      		retn
  7806                                  
  7807                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7808                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7810                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7812                                  
  7813                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7814                                  ;
  7815                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7816                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7817                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7818                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7819                                  
  7820                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7821                                  
  7822                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7823                                  ;
  7824                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7825                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7826                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7827                                  
  7828                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7829                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7830                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7831                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7832                                  
  7833                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7834                                  getclus:				
  7835 00002306 51                      		push	cx
  7836 00002307 57                      		push	di
  7837 00002308 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7838 0000230D 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7839 0000230F 48                      		dec	ax
  7840 00002310 48                      		dec	ax
  7841 00002311 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7842                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7843                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7844 00002313 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7845 00002318 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7846                                  unpack:					
  7847 0000231D 1E                      		push	ds
  7848 0000231E 50                      		push	ax
  7849 0000231F 53                      		push	bx
  7850 00002320 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7851 00002325 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7852 00002327 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7853 00002329 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7854                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7855 0000232F 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7856 00002331 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7857                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7858 00002333 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7859                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7860 00002335 52                      		push	dx
  7861 00002336 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7862 00002338 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7863 0000233B 5A                      		pop	dx
  7864 0000233C 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7865 0000233E 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7866                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7867                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7868 00002340 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7869 00002344 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7870 00002345 52                      		push	dx
  7871 00002346 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7872 00002348 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7873 0000234B 5A                      		pop	dx
  7874                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7875 0000234C A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7876 0000234F 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7877 00002353 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7878                                  even_odd:				
  7879 00002357 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7880 00002358 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7881 00002359 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7882 0000235B 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7883 0000235D D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7884                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7885 0000235F D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7886 00002361 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7887 00002363 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7888                                  havclus:				
  7889 00002365 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7890 00002367 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7891 0000236B EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7892                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7893                                  
  7894                                  unpack16:				
  7895 0000236D 52                      		push	dx
  7896 0000236E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7897 00002370 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7898 00002372 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7899 00002375 E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7900 00002378 5A                      		pop	dx
  7901 00002379 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7902                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7903                                  unpackx:				
  7904 0000237B 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7905 0000237C 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7906 0000237D 1F                      		pop	ds
  7907 0000237E 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7908 00002380 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7909 00002383 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7910 00002385 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7911 0000238A EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7912                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7913                                  
  7914                                  getcl2:					
  7915 0000238C 53                      		push	bx
  7916 0000238D 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7917 0000238E 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7918 0000238F 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7919 00002393 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7920 00002398 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7921 00002399 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7922                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7923 0000239E 1E                      		push	ds
  7924 0000239F 0E                      		push	cs
  7925 000023A0 1F                      		pop	ds
  7926 000023A1 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7927                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7928 000023A2 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7929                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7930                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7931 000023A5 E8BDF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7932 000023A8 1F                      		pop	ds
  7933 000023A9 5B                      		pop	bx
  7934 000023AA 5F                      		pop	di
  7935 000023AB 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7936 000023AF 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7937 000023B1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7938 000023B3 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7939 000023B5 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7940 000023B6 C3                      		retn
  7941                                  
  7942                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7943                                  
  7944                                  
  7945                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7946                                  ;
  7947                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7948                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7949                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7950                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7951                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7952                                  ;
  7953                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7954                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7955                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7956                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7957                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7958                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7959                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7960                                  
  7961                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7962                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7963 000023B7 50                      		push	ax
  7964 000023B8 51                      		push	cx
  7965 000023B9 57                      		push	di
  7966 000023BA 56                      		push	si
  7967 000023BB 06                      		push	es
  7968 000023BC 1E                      		push	ds
  7969 000023BD 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7970 000023BF 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7971 000023C4 F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7972 000023C6 90                      		nop
  7973                                  
  7974                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7975                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7976                                  
  7977 000023C7 06                      		push	es
  7978 000023C8 1E                      		push	ds
  7979 000023C9 57                      		push	di
  7980 000023CA 50                      		push	ax
  7981 000023CB 0E                      		push	cs
  7982 000023CC 1F                      		pop	ds
  7983                                  
  7984 000023CD 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7985 000023D1 BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7986                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7987                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7988 000023D4 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7989 000023D5 E88DF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7990 000023D8 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7991 000023D9 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7992                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7993 000023DD 5F                      		pop	di
  7994 000023DE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7995 000023DF 07                      		pop	es
  7996 000023E0 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7997 000023E5 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7998 000023E7 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7999                                  					; sector number
  8000                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8001 000023EB 52                      		push	dx
  8002 000023EC 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8003                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8004                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8005 000023F3 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8006 000023F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8007 000023F8 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8008 000023FC 1E                      		push	ds
  8009 000023FD 07                      		pop	es
  8010 000023FE 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8011 00002400 1E                      		push	ds
  8012 00002401 0E                      		push	cs
  8013 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  8014 00002403 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8015 00002404 BD[C308]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8016                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8017                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8018 00002407 E85BF3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8019 0000240A 1F                      		pop	ds
  8020 0000240B 5A                      		pop	dx
  8021 0000240C 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8022                                  
  8023                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  8024 00002411 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8025 00002412 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8026                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8027                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8028 00002414 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8029 00002416 1F                      		pop	ds
  8030 00002417 07                      		pop	es
  8031 00002418 5E                      		pop	si
  8032 00002419 5F                      		pop	di
  8033 0000241A 59                      		pop	cx
  8034 0000241B 58                      		pop	ax
  8035 0000241C C3                      		retn
  8036                                  
  8037                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8038                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8039                                  
  8040                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8041                                  
  8042                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8043                                  		;db 0
  8044                                  
  8045                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  8046                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8047                                  
  8048                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8049 0000241D 00<rep 3h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8050                                  %endif
  8051                                  
  8052                                  ;align 16
  8053                                  
  8054                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8055                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  8056                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  8057

  8059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8061                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  8062                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022

  8071                                  
  8072                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8073
