  8079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8080                                  
  8081                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8082 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8083 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8084                                  
  8085                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8086                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8087                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8088                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8089                                  
  8090                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8091                                  
  8092                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8093                                  
  8094                                  ;************************************************************************
  8095                                  ;*									*
  8096                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8097                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8098                                  ;*									*
  8099                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8100                                  ;*									*
  8101                                  ;************************************************************************
  8102                                  
  8103                                  _seg_reinit:
  8104 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8105                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8106                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8107 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8108 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8109                                  
  8110                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  8111 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8112 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8113 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8114 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8115 00000042 CB                      		retf
  8116                                  
  8117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8118                                  
  8119                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8120                                  
  8121                                  ;************************************************************************
  8122                                  ;*									*
  8123                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8124                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8125                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8126                                  ;*									*
  8127                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8128                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8129                                  ;*									*
  8130                                  ;************************************************************************
  8131                                  
  8132                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8133 00000043 56                      		push	si
  8134 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  8135 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  8136 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  8137 00000047 57                      		push	di
  8138 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  8139 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  8140 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  8141 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  8142 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8143 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8144                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8145                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8146 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8147 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8148 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8149 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8150 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8151 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8152 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8153 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8154 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8155 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8156                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8157 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8158                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8159                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8160 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8161                                  
  8162                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8163                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8164                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8165                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8166                                  ;
  8167                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8168                                  ;
  8169                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8170                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8171                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8172                                  ;
  8173                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8174                                  
  8175                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8176 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8177 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8178 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8179 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8180                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8181                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8182 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8183 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8184                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8185                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8186 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8187 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8188 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  8189 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  8190 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8191 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8192 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8193 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8194 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8195 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  8196                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8197 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8198                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8199 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8200 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8201                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8202                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  8203                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8204                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8205 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8206                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8207 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8208 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8209                                  					; mark operation complete
  8210 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  8211 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  8212 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  8213 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  8214 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  8215 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  8216 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  8217 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  8218 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  8219 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  8220                                  	
  8221                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  8222                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  8223                                  bc_retf:
  8224 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  8225                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8226                                  
  8227                                  command_error:				
  8228 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  8229 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  8230                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8231                                  ; 01/05/2019
  8232                                  
  8233                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8234                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  8235                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  8236                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  8237                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  8238                                  ; high.
  8239                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8240                                  
  8241                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  8242                                  
  8243                                  		; 15/10/2022
  8244                                  
  8245 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  8246                                  
  8247 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  8248                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  8249                                  		
  8250                                  
  8251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8252                                  
  8253                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  8254                                  
  8255                                  bc_cmderr:				
  8256 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8257                                  					; unknown command error
  8258                                  
  8259                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8260                                  
  8261                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  8262                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  8263                                  
  8264                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  8265                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  8266                                  
  8267                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  8268                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8269                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8270 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8271 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  8272                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  8273 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  8274 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  8275 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  8276                                  
  8277                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8282                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  8283                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8284                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8285                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ; 30/04/2019
  8288                                  
  8289                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  8290                                  
  8291                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  8292                                  
  8293                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8294                                  
  8295                                  ;************************************************************************
  8296                                  ;*									*
  8297                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8298                                  ;*									*
  8299                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8300                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8301                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8302                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8303                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8304                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8305                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8306                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8307                                  ;*									*
  8308                                  ;************************************************************************
  8309                                  
  8310                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8311                                  		;db 0
  8312                                  
  8313                                  		; 13/12/202
  8314 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8315                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8316 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8317                                  					; 00 init
  8318 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8319 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8320 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8321                                  					; 03
  8322 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8323                                  					; 04
  8324 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8325                                  					; 05
  8326 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8327 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8328                                  					; 07
  8329 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8330                                  					; 08
  8331 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8332 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8333                                  con_table_end:
  8334 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8335                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8336 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8337 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8338 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8339 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8340 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8341                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8342 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8343                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8344 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8345 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8346 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8347 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8348 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8349 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8350 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8351 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8352 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8353 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8354 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8355 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8356 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8357 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8358 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8359 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8360 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8361 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8362 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8363 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8364                                  prn_table_end:
  8365 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8366                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8367 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8368 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8369 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8370 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8371 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8372 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8373 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8374 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8375 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8376 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8377 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8378                                  aux_table_end:
  8379 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8380                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8381 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8382 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8383 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8384 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8385 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8386 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8387 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8388 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8389 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8390 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8391                                  tim_table_end:
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8394                                  
  8395                                  ;************************************************************************
  8396                                  ;*									*
  8397                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8398                                  ;*									*
  8399                                  ;************************************************************************
  8400                                  
  8401                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8402                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8403 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8404                                  con_loop:				
  8405 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8406 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8407 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8408                                  con_exit:				
  8409 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8410 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8411                                  
  8412                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8413                                  
  8414                                  ;************************************************************************
  8415                                  ;*									*
  8416                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8417                                  ;*									*
  8418                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8419                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8420                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8421                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8422                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8423                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8424                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8425                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8426                                  ;*									*
  8427                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8428                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8429                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8430                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8431                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8432                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8433                                  ;*									*
  8434                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8435                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8436                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8437                                  ;*									*
  8438                                  ;************************************************************************
  8439                                  
  8440                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8441                                  chrin:		
  8442 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8443 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8444 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8445 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8446 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8447 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8448 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8449 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8450 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8451 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8452 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8453 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8455                                  
  8456                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8457                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8458                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8459                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8460                                  ;      else
  8461                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8462                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8463                                  ;      endif
  8464                                  ;    endif
  8465                                  ;  endif
  8466                                  
  8467                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8468 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8469 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8470 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8471 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8472 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8473 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8474 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8475 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8477                                  
  8478                                  not_ext:				
  8479 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8480 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8481                                  alt_save:				
  8482 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8483                                  keyret:					
  8484 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8485                                  
  8486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ;************************************************************************
  8489                                  ;*									*
  8490                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8491                                  ;*									*
  8492                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8493                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8494                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8495                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8496                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8497                                  ;*									*
  8498                                  ;************************************************************************
  8499                                  
  8500                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8501                                  con_rdnd:				
  8502 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8503 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8504 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8505 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8506 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8507 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8508 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8509 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8510 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8511                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8512 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8513                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8514 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8515 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8516 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8517 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8518                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8519                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8520                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8521                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8522 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8523 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8524 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8525                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8526                                  
  8527                                  gotchr:					
  8528 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8529 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8530 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8531 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8532 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8533                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8534                                  
  8535                                  notbrk:					
  8536 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8537 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8538 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8539 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8541                                  
  8542                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8543 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8544 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8545 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8546 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8547 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8548 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8549 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8550                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8551                                  rdexit:					
  8552 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8553 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8554                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8555                                  bc_exvec:				
  8556 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8557                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8558 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8559                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8560                                  
  8561                                  ;************************************************************************
  8562                                  ;*									*
  8563                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8564                                  ;*									*
  8565                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8566                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8567                                  ;*									*
  8568                                  ;************************************************************************
  8569                                  
  8570                                  con_writ:
  8571                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8572 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8573                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8574                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8575                                  con_lp:					
  8576 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8577 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8578 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8579                                  					; AL = character to display
  8580 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8581                                  cc_ret:					
  8582 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8583 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8584                                  
  8585                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8586                                  
  8587                                  ;************************************************************************
  8588                                  ;*									*
  8589                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8590                                  ;*									*
  8591                                  ;************************************************************************
  8592                                  
  8593                                  con_flush:
  8594 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8595                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8596 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8597 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8598                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8599                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8600                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8601 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8602 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8603 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8604                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8605 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8606                                  
  8607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8608                                  
  8609                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8610                                  
  8611                                  ;************************************************************************
  8612                                  ;*									*
  8613                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8614                                  ;*									*
  8615                                  ;************************************************************************
  8616                                  
  8617                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8618                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8619                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8620                                  
  8621                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8622                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8623                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8624                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8625                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8626                                  ;
  8627                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8628                                  
  8629                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8630                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8631                                  
  8632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8633                                  
  8634                                  ;************************************************************************
  8635                                  ;*									*
  8636                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8637                                  ;*									*
  8638                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8639                                  ;*									*
  8640                                  ;************************************************************************
  8641                                  
  8642                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8643 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8644                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8645                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8646                                  prn_done:
  8647 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8648 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8649                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8650                                  
  8651                                  ;************************************************************************
  8652                                  ;*									*
  8653                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8654                                  ;*									*
  8655                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8656                                  ;*									*
  8657                                  ;************************************************************************
  8658                                  
  8659                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8660                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8661 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8662                                  prn_loop:				
  8663 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8664                                  prn_out:				
  8665 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8666 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8667 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8668 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8669 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8670 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8671 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8672 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8673 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8674 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8675 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8676                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8677                                  
  8678                                  _prnwf:					
  8679 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8680 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8681                                  TestPrnError:				
  8682 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8683 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8684                                  pmessg:					
  8685 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8687                                  
  8688                                  prn_con:				
  8689 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8690 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8691                                  ;prn_done:				
  8692                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8693                                  prn_done2:
  8694                                  		;clc
  8695                                  		; cf=0
  8696 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8697                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8698                                  
  8699                                  ;************************************************************************
  8700                                  ;*									*
  8701                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8702                                  ;*									*
  8703                                  ;************************************************************************
  8704                                  
  8705                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8706 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8707 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8708 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8709                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8710                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8711 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8712 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8713                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8714                                  
  8715                                  ;************************************************************************
  8716                                  ;*									*
  8717                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8718                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8719                                  ;*									*
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  
  8722                                  prnstat:				
  8723 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8724                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8725                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8726                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8727                                  
  8728                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8729                                  
  8730                                  ;************************************************************************
  8731                                  ;*									*
  8732                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8733                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8734                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8735                                  ;*									*
  8736                                  ;************************************************************************
  8737                                  
  8738                                  prnop:	
  8739 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8740 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8741                                  
  8742                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8743                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8744                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8745                                  
  8746 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8747 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8748 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8749 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8750 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8751 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8752 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8753                                  
  8754                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8755                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8756                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8757                                  
  8758                                  NextTest:				
  8759 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8760                                  					; i/o error?
  8761 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8762                                  
  8763                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8764                                  
  8765 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8766                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8767 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8768 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8769 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8770                                  ret1:					
  8771 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8773                                  
  8774                                  checknotready:				
  8775 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8776 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8777 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8778                                  
  8779                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8780                                  
  8781                                  ;************************************************************************
  8782                                  ;*									*
  8783                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8784                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8785                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8786                                  ;*									*
  8787                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8788                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8789                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8790                                  ;*									*
  8791                                  ;************************************************************************
  8792                                  
  8793                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8794                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8795 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8796                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8797 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8798 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8799 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8800 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8801 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8802                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8803 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8804 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8805                                  prn_getstat:				
  8806 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8807 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8808 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8809 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8810 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8811 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8812 000002A6 26                      		es
  8813 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8814                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8815                                  					; lodsb
  8816 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8817 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8818 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8819 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8820                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8821                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8822                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8823 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8824                                  
  8825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8826                                  
  8827                                  prn_bperr:				
  8828 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8829                                  prn_berr:				
  8830 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8832                                  
  8833                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8834                                  
  8835                                  ;************************************************************************
  8836                                  ;*									*
  8837                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8838                                  ;*									*
  8839                                  ;************************************************************************
  8840                                  
  8841                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8842                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8843                                  
  8844                                  ;********************************;*
  8845                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8846                                  ;********************************;*
  8847                                  
  8848                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8849                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8850                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8851                                  
  8852                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8853                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8854                                  ;;endstruc
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8857                                  
  8858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8859                                  
  8860                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8861                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  8862 000002B6 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8863 000002BA 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8864                                  					; ioc_pc
  8865 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8866                                  
  8867                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8868 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  8869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8870                                  
  8871                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  8872 000002C4 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8873 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8874 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8875                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8876 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8877 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8878                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  8879 000002D4 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8880 000002D8 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  8881 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8882 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  8883 000002DE 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  8884 000002E0 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  8885                                  prngetcount:				
  8886                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  8887 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8888 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8889                                  					; return current retry count
  8890                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8891                                  		; cf=0
  8892                                  		;clc
  8893 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8894                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8895                                  
  8896                                  ;************************************************************************
  8897                                  ;*									*
  8898                                  ;*  prn_ioctl_query							*
  8899                                  ;*									*
  8900                                  ;*  Added for 5.00							*
  8901                                  ;************************************************************************
  8902                                  
  8903                                  prn_ioctl_query:			; 2C7h:2F0h = 70h:2860h
  8904 000002EB C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  8905 000002EF 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  8906                                  					; ioc_pc
  8907 000002F4 750D                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8908 000002F6 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  8909 000002FA 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; GET_RETRY_COUNT
  8910 000002FC 7404                    		jz	short IOCtlSupported
  8911 000002FE 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; SET_RETRY_COUNT
  8912 00000300 7501                    		jnz	short prn_query_err
  8913                                  IOCtlSupported:	
  8914                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8915                                  		; cf=0		
  8916                                  		;clc
  8917 00000302 C3                      		retn
  8918                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8919                                  
  8920                                  prn_query_err:
  8921                                  		; 12/12/2022				
  8922                                  		;stc
  8923 00000303 E9CFFD                  		jmp	bc_cmderr ; (bc_cmderr sets cf to 1)
  8924                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8925                                  
  8926                                  ;************************************************************************
  8927                                  ;*									*
  8928                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8929                                  ;*									*
  8930                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8931                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8932                                  ;*									*
  8933                                  ;************************************************************************
  8934                                  
  8935                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8936                                  
  8937                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8938                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8939                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8940                                  
  8941                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8942                                  
  8943                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8944                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8945                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8946                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8947                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8948                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8949                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8950                                  
  8951                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8952                                  
  8953                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8954                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8955                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8956                                  
  8957                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8958                                  
  8959                                  ;************************************************************************
  8960                                  ;*									*
  8961                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8962                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8963                                  ;*									*
  8964                                  ;************************************************************************
  8965                                  
  8966                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8967                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8968 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8969 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8970 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8971 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8972 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8973 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8974                                  aux1:					
  8975 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8976                                  					; won't return if error
  8977                                  aux2:					
  8978 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8979 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8980                                  exvec2:					
  8981 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8982                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8983 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8984                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8985                                  
  8986                                  ;************************************************************************
  8987                                  ;*									*
  8988                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8989                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8990                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8991                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8992                                  ;*									*
  8993                                  ;************************************************************************
  8994                                  
  8995                                  auxin:					
  8996 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8997 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8998 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8999                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9000                                  		;retn
  9001                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9002 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9003                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9004                                  
  9005                                  arbad:					
  9006 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9007 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9008 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9009 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9010                                  
  9011                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9012                                  
  9013                                  ;************************************************************************
  9014                                  ;*									*
  9015                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9016                                  ;*									*
  9017                                  ;************************************************************************
  9018                                  
  9019                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9020 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  9021 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9022 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9023 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9024 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9025 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9026 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9027 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9028 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9029 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9030 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9031                                  auxdrx:					
  9032 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  9033                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9034                                  
  9035                                  auxbus:					
  9036 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9037                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9038                                  
  9039                                  ;************************************************************************
  9040                                  ;*									*

  9042                                  ;*									*

  9045                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  9047 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  9048 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9049 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9050 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9051                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9052                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  9053                                  		;clc
  9054 00000359 C3                      		retn
  9055                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9056                                  
  9057                                  ;************************************************************************
  9058                                  ;*									*
  9059                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9060                                  ;*									*
  9061                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9062                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9063                                  ;*									*
  9064                                  ;************************************************************************
  9065                                  
  9066                                  auxstat:				
  9067 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9068                                  
  9069                                  		; fall into auxop
  9070                                  
  9071                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9072                                  
  9073                                  ;************************************************************************
  9074                                  ;*									*
  9075                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9076                                  ;*									*
  9077                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9078                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9079                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
