 11089                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11090                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 11091                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 11092                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 11093                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 11094                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 11095                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 11096                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 11097                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11098                                  
 11099                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 11100                                  Disk:
 11101                                  
 11102                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 11103                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 11104                                  
 11105 00000A53 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 11106                                  					; set up retry count
 11107 00000A56 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 11108                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 11109 00000A5B 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 11110 00000A5D 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 11111 00000A60 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 11112 00000A62 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 11113                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 11114 00000A65 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 11115 00000A69 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 11116 00000A6D 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 11117                                  ;retry:
 11118                                  ; 09/12/2022
 11119                                  _retry:					
 11120 00000A71 50                      		push	ax
 11121 00000A72 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 11122 00000A76 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11123 00000A7B 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 11124 00000A7D 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 11125                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 11126 00000A82 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 11127 00000A84 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 11128                                  					; add hidden trks.
 11129                                  disk_not_mini:				
 11130 00000A88 D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11131 00000A8A D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 11132 00000A8C 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 11133 00000A90 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 11134 00000A92 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 11135 00000A94 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 11136 00000A98 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 11137                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11138 00000A9C 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 11139 00000AA1 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 11140                                  
 11141                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 11142                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 11143                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 11144                                  
 11145 00000AA3 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 11146 00000AA8 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 11147 00000AAA 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 11148 00000AAD 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 11149 00000AAF 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 11150 00000AB2 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 11151                                  do_writej:	
 11152                                  
 11153                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 11154                                  			
 11155 00000AB4 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 11156                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11157                                  
 11158                                  do_fast:				
 11159 00000AB6 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 11160                                  
 11161                                  testerr:				
 11162 00000AB9 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 11163                                  
 11164                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 11165                                  
 11166 00000ABB 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 11167 00000ABF 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11168                                  no_set:
 11169                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 11170 00000AC3 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 11171 00000AC9 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 11172                                  noverify:				
 11173 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 11174                                  
 11175                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 11176                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 11177                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 11178                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 11179                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 11180                                  
 11181 00000ACC 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11182                                  					; fnon_removable
 11183 00000AD1 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 11184 00000AD3 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 11185 00000AD8 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 11186                                  its_removable:				
 11187 00000ADA 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 11188 00000ADD 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 11189 00000ADF 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 11190 00000AE3 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 11191 00000AE5 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 11192 00000AE9 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11193                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 11194 00000AED 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 11195 00000AEF C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 11196 00000AF4 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 11197 00000AF8 FEC6                    		inc	dh
 11198 00000AFA 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 11199 00000AFE 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 11200 00000B00 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 11201 00000B02 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 11202                                  noxor:					
 11203 00000B06 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 11204                                  disk_ret:				
 11205 00000B0A F8                      		clc
 11206 00000B0B C3                      		retn
 11207                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11208                                  
 11209                                  ; 15/10/2022
 11210                                  
 11211                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11212                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 11213                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 11214                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11215                                  
 11216                                  do_write:				
 11217 00000B0C 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 11218 00000B10 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 11219 00000B12 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 11220 00000B16 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 11221                                  
 11222                                  do_norm:				
 11223 00000B18 E87500                  		call	normspeed
 11224 00000B1B EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 11225                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11226                                  
 11227                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11228                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 11229                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11230                                  
 11231                                  doverify:				
 11232 00000B1D 58                      		pop	ax
 11233 00000B1E 50                      		push	ax
 11234 00000B1F B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 11235 00000B21 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 11236 00000B24 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 11237                                  
 11238                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 11239                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 11240                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 11241                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 11242                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 11243                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 11244                                  
 11245 00000B26 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 11246 00000B29 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 11247 00000B2B FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 11248 00000B2F 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 11249 00000B31 E83705                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 11250 00000B34 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 11251                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11252                                  
 11253                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 11254 00000B36 E83205                  		call	ResetDisk
 11255 00000B39 FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 11256 00000B3D EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 11257                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11258                                  
 11259                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11260                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 11261                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 11262                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 11263                                  
 11264                                  dskerr:					
 11265 00000B3F 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 11266 00000B44 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 11267 00000B46 E8FE0C                  		call	checkio
 11268                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 11269 00000B49 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 11270 00000B4E 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 11271 00000B50 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 11272 00000B53 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 11273                                  dochkagain:				
 11274 00000B58 E8AA00                  		call	again
 11275                                  dskerr0:				
 11276 00000B5B 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 11277 00000B5D 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11278                                  					; fnon_removable
 11279 00000B62 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 11280 00000B64 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 11281 00000B67 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 11282                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 11283 00000B69 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 11284 00000B6C 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 11285 00000B6E C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 11286                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 11287                                  dskerr1:				
 11288 00000B74 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 11289                                  		;jmp	retry
 11290                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11291 00000B75 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 11292                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11293                                  
 11294                                  write_fault_err:			
 11295 00000B78 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 11296                                  					; for write fault error.
 11297 00000B7B EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 11298                                  
 11299                                  		; fall into harderr
 11300                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11301                                  
 11302                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 11303                                  
 11304                                  harderr:				
 11305 00000B7D E84D00                  		call	maperror
 11306                                  harderr2:				
 11307 00000B80 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 11308                                  					; force a media check through rom
 11309 00000B85 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 11310 00000B89 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 11311                                  
 11312                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 11313                                  
 11314                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 11315                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11316 00000B8D E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 11317                                  
 11318                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11319                                  
 11320                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 11321                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 11322                                  
 11323                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11324                                  normspeed:
 11325 00000B90 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 11326 00000B95 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 11327 00000B97 06                      		push	es
 11328 00000B98 50                      		push	ax
 11329 00000B99 A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 11330 00000B9C C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 11331 00000BA0 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11332 00000BA4 58                      		pop	ax
 11333 00000BA5 07                      		pop	es
 11334 00000BA6 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 11335 00000BA9 06                      		push	es
 11336 00000BAA C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 11337 00000BAE 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11338                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 11339 00000BB3 07                      		pop	es
 11340 00000BB4 C3                      		retn
 11341                                  
 11342                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11343                                  
 11344                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 11345                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 11346                                  
 11347                                  fastspeed:		
 11348 00000BB5 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 11349                                  					; ftoobig
 11350 00000BBA 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 11351 00000BBC 06                      		push	es
 11352 00000BBD 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 11353 00000BC1 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 11354 00000BC3 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 11355 00000BC7 07                      		pop	es
 11356 00000BC8 C3                      		retn
 11357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11358                                  
 11359                                  notready:				
 11360 00000BC9 F9                      		stc
 11361 00000BCA B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 11362 00000BCC C3                      		retn
 11363                                  
 11364                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11365                                  
 11366                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 11367                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 11368                                  
 11369                                  maperror:	
 11370 00000BCD 51                      		push	cx
 11371 00000BCE 06                      		push	es
 11372 00000BCF 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 11373 00000BD0 07                      		pop	es
 11374 00000BD1 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 11375 00000BD3 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 11376 00000BD6 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 11377                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 11378 00000BD9 BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 11379 00000BDC F2AE                    		repne scasb
 11380                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11381 00000BDE 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 11382                                  					; get translation
 11383                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 11384                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 11385 00000BE1 07                      		pop	es
 11386 00000BE2 59                      		pop	cx
 11387 00000BE3 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11388 00000BE4 C3                      		retn
 11389                                  
 11390                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11391                                  
 11392                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11393                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11394                                  
 11395                                  set_tim:		
 11396 00000BE5 50                      		push	ax
 11397 00000BE6 E891F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11398                                  
 11399                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11400                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11401                                  
 11402 00000BE9 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11403 00000BED 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11404 00000BEF 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11405                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11406                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11407 00000BF3 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11408                                  setaccess:				
 11409 00000BF5 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11410 00000BFA 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11411 00000BFE 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11412                                  done_set:				
 11413 00000C02 F8                      		clc
 11414                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11415 00000C03 58                      		pop	ax
 11416 00000C04 C3                      		retn
 11417                                  
 11418                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11419                                  
 11420                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11421                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11422                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11423                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11424                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11425                                  
 11426                                  again:	
 11427 00000C05 E86304                  		call	ResetDisk
 11428 00000C08 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11429 00000C0B 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11430                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11431 00000C0D 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11432 00000C0E C3                      		retn
 11433                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11434                                  
 11435                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11436 00000C0F 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11437 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11438

 11448                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11449                                  ;
 11450                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11451                                  ;
 11452                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11453                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11454                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11455                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11456                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11457                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11458                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11459                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11460                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11461                                  
 11462                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 11463                                  
 11464                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 11465

 11467 00000C12 00                      		db 0
 11468                                  
 11469                                  ; 09/12/2022 
 11470                                  %if 0
 11471                                  
 11472                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11473                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11474                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11475                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack

 11477                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11478                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11479                                  		dw 119Ah	; 66h	; GetMediaId
 11480                                  		dw 1269h	; 67h	; GetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11481                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11482                                  
 11483                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11484                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11485                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11486                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11487                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11488                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11490                                  		dw 11D2h	; 46h	; SetMediaId
 11491                                  		dw 1280h	; 47h	; SetAccessFlag ; unpublished function
 11492                                  
 11493                                  %endif

 11499 00000C18 [600E]                  		dw VerifyTrack		; 62h

 11518                                  ; IOC_DC_Table
 11519                                  ;
 11520                                  ; This table contains all of the valid generic IOCtl Minor codes for
 11521                                  ; major function 08 to be used by the Ioctl_Support_Query function.

 11543                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11544                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11545                                  ;
 11546                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11547                                  ;
 11548                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11549                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11550                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11551                                  ;
 11552                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11553                                  
 11554                                  ; 11/03/2019

 11556                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh

 11560 00000C4A 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11561                                  					; RAWIO

 11563 00000C53 07                      		pop	es

 11567                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive

 11569                                  		; 10/12/2022

 11572                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh

 11841                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11842                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11843                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11844                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11845                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11846                                  ;
 11847                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11848                                  ;
 11849                                  ; output:
 11850                                  ;	for status call:
 11851                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11852                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11853                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11854                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11855                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11856                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11857                                  ;
 11858                                  ;	for format track:
 11859                                  ;		carry set if error
 11860                                  ;
 11861                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11862                                  
 11863                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11864                                  
 11865                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11866                                  FormatTrack:
 11867 00000D9C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11868 00000DA0 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 11869 00000DA3 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11870                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11873                                  		; 17/10/2022

 11879 00000DB4 F8                      		clc
 11880 00000DB5 C3                      		retn
 11881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11882

 12014                                  
 12015                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 12016                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 12017                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 12018                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 12019                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 12020                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 12021                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 12022                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 12023                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 12024                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 12025                                  		; register.
 12026                                  
 12027                                  					; Special function requested?

 12034 00000E91 08E4                    		or	ah, ah

 12105                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register

 12128                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12129                                  
 12130                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12131                                  
 12132                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12133                                  ;
 12134                                  ; TrackIo:
 12135                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 12136                                  ;
 12137                                  ;   input:
 12138                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 12139                                  ;		  3 = write
 12140                                  ;		  4 = verify
 12141                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 12142                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 12143                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 12144                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 12145                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 12146                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 12147                                  ;
 12148                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12149                                  
 12150                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12151                                  		
 12152                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12153                                  TrackIo:	
 12154                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 12155 00000EF4 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 12156 00000EF8 E83FF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 12157 00000EFB 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12158                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 12159 00000F00 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 12160 00000F02 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 12161 00000F03 51                      		push	cx
 12162 00000F04 E88FFA                  		call	iosetup
 12163 00000F07 59                      		pop	cx
 12164 00000F08 58                      		pop	ax
 12165                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 12166 00000F09 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 12167 00000F0C D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12168 00000F0E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12169 00000F10 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 12170                                  
 12171                                  		; WE WANT:
 12172                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 12173                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 12174                                  		
 12175 00000F12 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 12176                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12177 00000F15 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 12178                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12179                                  					; good_tracklayout
 12180 00000F1A 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 12181                                  		
 12182 00000F1C 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 12183                                  ionextsector:				
 12184 00000F1E 51                      		push	cx
 12185 00000F1F 52                      		push	dx
 12186 00000F20 46                      		inc	si
 12187 00000F21 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 12188                                  					; the track table

 12190 00000F23 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 12191                                  
 12192                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 12193                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 12194                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 12195                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 12196                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 12197                                  		
 12198                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12206                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 12207 00000F32 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 12208 00000F34 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 12209 00000F38 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 12210 00000F3A E816FB                  		call	Disk
 12211 00000F3D 5A                      		pop	dx
 12212 00000F3E 59                      		pop	cx
 12213 00000F3F F8                      		clc
 12214 00000F40 C3                      		retn
 12215                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12216                                  
 12217                                  IoRemovable:				
 12218 00000F41 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 12219                                  					; table	and save it

 12222 00000F44 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 12223 00000F45 50                      		push	ax

 12228 00000F51 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12229 00000F54 58                      		pop	ax
 12230 00000F55 1F                      		pop	ds

 12232 00000F58 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 12233 00000F5B E8F5FA                  		call	Disk

 12235                                  					; sector size

 12239                                  		;call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize

 12242 00000F65 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 12243                                  
 12244 00000F67 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 12245 00000F69 5A                      		pop	dx

 12253                                  					; entries in Dpt.

 12259                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12260                                  
 12261                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12262                                  ;
 12263                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 12264                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 12265                                  ; are permissible.
 12266                                  ;
 12267                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 12268                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 12269                                  ; All other registers preserved

 12302                                  ; SetDASD

 12312                                  SetDasd:

 12314                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 12315 00000F7E 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 12316                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12317 00000F80 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h

 12319                                  					; set_dasd_true

 12323                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 12345                                  
 12346                                  GotBig:
 12347                                  		;mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 12348                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12349 00000FA8 40                      		inc	ax  ; mov al, 2
 12350 00000FA9 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 12351 00000FAE 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 12352                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 12353                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12354                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3

 12357 00000FB1 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h

 12359 00000FB6 1E                      		push	ds

 12369                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h
 12370                                  
 12371 00000FC0 C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 12372                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12373 00000FC4 5E                      		pop	si
 12374 00000FC5 1F                      		pop	ds
 12375 00000FC6 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 12376 00000FC8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 12377 00000FCC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 12378                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 12379                                  DasdHasBeenSet:
 12380 00000FCE 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12381 00000FD2 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 12382 00000FD6 C3                      		retn
 12383                                  
 12384                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12385                                  
 12386                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12387                                  
 12388                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12389                                  ;
 12390                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12391                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12392                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12393                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12394                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12395                                  ;
 12396                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12397                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12398                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12399                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12400                                  ;
 12401                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12402                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12403                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12404                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12405                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12406                                  ;
 12407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12408                                  
 12409                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12410                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12411 00000FD7 51                      		push	cx
 12412 00000FD8 52                      		push	dx
 12413                                  
 12414                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12415                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12416                                  
 12417 00000FD9 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12418 00000FDE 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12419 00000FE0 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12420 00000FE2 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12421 00000FE7 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12422 00000FE9 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12424                                  
 12425                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12426 00000FEB 06                      		push	es
 12427 00000FEC 56                      		push	si
 12428                                  
 12429                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12430                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12431 00000FED 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 12432 00000FEF 8EC6                    		mov	es, si
 12433                                  
 12434 00000FF1 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12435                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12436                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12437 00000FF6 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12438 00000FFA 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12439                                  
 12440                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12441                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12442                                  
 12443 00000FFE 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12444 00001003 5E                      		pop	si
 12445 00001004 07                      		pop	es
 12446                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12447 00001005 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12448 00001009 49                      		dec	cx
 12449 0000100A 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12450 0000100D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12451 0000100F D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12452 00001011 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12453 00001013 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12454 00001017 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12455 0000101B 06                      		push	es
 12456 0000101C 1E                      		push	ds
 12457 0000101D 56                      		push	si
 12458 0000101E 57                      		push	di
 12459 0000101F B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12460 00001021 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12461                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12462 00001023 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12463 00001025 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12464 0000102A 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12465 0000102C 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12466                                  		
 12467                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12468                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12469 0000102D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 12470 0000102F 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 12471 00001031 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 12472                                  
 12473 00001032 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12474                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12475                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12476 00001037 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 12478

 12481                                  		;xor	si, si ; 0
 12482                                  		;mov	es, si

 12546                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12547                                  ;
 12548                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12549                                  ;
 12550                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12551                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12552                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12553                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12554                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12555                                  ;
 12556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12564                                  		;cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12565                                  					; Reset while formatting?

 12567                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12568                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12569 00001075 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al ; 1
 12570                                  ResetDisk_cont:

 12572                                  		;xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12573 00001078 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12574                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12575 0000107A C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12576                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12577 0000107F 58                      		pop	ax

 12583                                  
 12584                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12585                                  ;
 12586                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12587                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12588                                  ;
 12589                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12590                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12591                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12592                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12593                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12594                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12595                                  ;
 12596                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12597                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12598                                  ;
 12599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12600                                  
 12601                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12602                                  ToRom:	
 12603 00001081 53                      		push	bx
 12604 00001082 56                      		push	si
 12605                                  
 12606                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12607                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12608                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12609                                  
 12610 00001083 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1

 12615                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?

 12653                                  
 12654                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12655                                  
 12656                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12657                                  
 12658                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12659                                  ;
 12660                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12661                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12662                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12663                                  ;
 12664                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12665                                  
 12666                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12667                                  ioctl_getown:
 12668 000010D9 E8EFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12669 000010DC 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12670                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12671 000010E0 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12672                                  ownloop:				
 12673 000010E4 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12674 000010E8 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12675                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12676 000010EA 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12677                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12678                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12679 000010EF 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 12680                                  getnextBDS:				
 12681 000010F1 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12682 000010F4 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12683                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12684                                  
 12685                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12686                                  ;
 12687                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12688                                  ; in al to al.
 12689                                  ;
 12690                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12691                                  
 12692                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12693                                  ioctl_setown:
 12694 000010F6 E8D2F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12695 000010F9 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12696                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12697 000010FE E839F7                  		call	checksingle
 12698                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12699 00001101 FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 12700                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12701                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12702                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12703                                  
 12704                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12705                                  ;
 12706                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12707                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12708                                  ;
 12709                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12710                                  
 12711                                  exitown:				
 12712 00001105 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12713                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12714 00001107 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12715                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12716                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12717 0000110C 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12718 0000110E 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12719                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12720                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12721 00001112 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12722                                  exitnomult:				
 12723 00001114 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12724 00001118 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12725                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12726                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12727                                  		; cf=0
 12728                                  		;clc
 12729 0000111B C3                      		retn
