 14561                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14562 00001707 F606[CE08]01            swpdsk:		test	byte [IsWin386], 1			
 14563                                  		;test	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Is win386 present?
 14564 0000170C 7405                    		jz	short no_win386	; no, skip SetFocus
 14565                                  		
 14566                                  		; set focus to the correct VM
 14567                                  		;;call	far 70h:8D1h	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:179Ah
 14568                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14569 0000170E 9A[CF08]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14570                                  		;call	far ptr	V86_Crit_SetFocus ; call far 70h:8D1h
 14571                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14572                                  no_win386:				
 14573 00001713 51                      		push	cx
 14574 00001714 52                      		push	dx
 14575 00001715 268A5505                		mov	dl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14576                                  					; get the drive	letter
 14577                                  
 14578                                  ; WARNING : next two instructions assume that if the new disk is for drive B
 14579                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa
 14580                                  
 14581 00001719 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
 14582 0000171B 80F601                  		xor	dh, 1
 14583 0000171E 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx		; nobody has handled swap disk
 14584 00001720 B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 14585                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk
 14586                                  					; Broadcast it
 14587 00001723 CD2F                    		int	2Fh	
 14588 00001725 41                      		inc	cx		; cx == -1 ?
 14589 00001726 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 14590                                  
 14591                                  ; using a different drive in a one drive system so request the user change disks
 14592                                  
 14593 00001728 80C241                  		add	dl, 'A'
 14594                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14595 0000172B 2E8816[6517]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl
 14596                                  		; 16/10/2022
 14597                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:drvlet], dl
 14598                                  		;mov	byte ptr cs:17E4h, dl ; [cs:drvlet]
 14599                                  					; 0070h:3D54h =	2C7h:17E4h
 14600 00001730 BE[4917]                		mov	si, SNGMSG
 14601                                  		;mov	si, 17C8h	; sngmsg
 14602                                  					; 0070h:3D38h =	2C7h:17C8h
 14603 00001733 53                      		push	bx
 14604 00001734 2E                      		cs
 14605 00001735 AC                      		lodsb			; get the next character of the message
 14606                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 14607                                  wrmsg_loop:				
 14608 00001736 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 14609                                  					; AL = character to display
 14610 00001738 2E                      		cs
 14611 00001739 AC                      		lodsb
 14612                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
 14613                                  					; get the next character of the	message
 14614 0000173A 08C0                    		or	al, al
 14615 0000173C 75F8                    		jnz	short wrmsg_loop
 14616 0000173E E8C6EA                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 14617                                  					; call rom-bios
 14618 00001741 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14619 00001743 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 14620                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 14621 00001745 5B                      		pop	bx
 14622                                  swpdsk9:				
 14623 00001746 5A                      		pop	dx
 14624 00001747 59                      		pop	cx
 14625 00001748 C3                      		retn

 14634                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14635                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14636                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14637                                  
 14638                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14639 00001749 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14640 0000174B 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14640 00001754 736B6574746520666F-
 14640 0000175D 7220647269766520   
 14641                                  
 14642                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14643 00001765 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14643 0000176E 65737320616E79206B-
 14643 00001777 6579207768656E2072-
 14643 00001780 656164790D0A       
 14644 00001786 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14645                                  
 14646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14647                                  
 14648                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14649                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14650                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14651                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14652                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14653                                  
 14654                                  chkopcnt:		
 14655 00001788 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14656 0000178D C3                      		retn
 14657                                  
 14658                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14659                                  
 14660                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14661                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14662                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14663                                  ;
 14664                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14665                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14666                                  
 14667                                  mediacheck:	
 14668 0000178E E8A9F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14669 00001791 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14670 00001793 E84D01                  		call	haschange
 14671 00001796 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14672 00001798 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 14673 0000179B 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14674 0000179D 50                      		push	ax
 14675 0000179E 52                      		push	dx
 14676 0000179F 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14677                                  					; set logical drive number
 14678 000017A3 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14679 000017A5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14680                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14681                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14682 000017A7 5A                      		pop	dx
 14683 000017A8 58                      		pop	ax
 14684 000017A9 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14685 000017AB BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14686                                  
 14687                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14688                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14689                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14690                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14691                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14692                                  ; status.
 14693                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14694 000017AE 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14695 000017B2 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14696                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14697                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14698                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14699                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14700 000017B6 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14701                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14702                                  
 14703                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14704                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14705                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14706                                  
 14707 000017B8 50                      		push	ax
 14708 000017B9 51                      		push	cx
 14709 000017BA 52                      		push	dx
 14710 000017BB E895ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14711 000017BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14712 000017BF 59                      		pop	cx
 14713 000017C0 58                      		pop	ax
 14714 000017C1 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14715 000017C3 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14716                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14717 000017C5 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14718                                  mediaret:				
 14719 000017C7 C3                      		retn
 14720                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14721                                  
 14722                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14723                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14724                                  ; or write.
 14725                                  
 14726                                  mediadovolid:				
 14727 000017C8 E82DEE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14728 000017CB 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14729 000017CD E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14730 000017D0 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14731 000017D2 E9F8F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14733                                  
 14734                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14735                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14736                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14737                                  ; dos.
 14738                                  ;
 14739                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14740                                  
 14741                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14742                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14743                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14744                                  
 14745                                  checklatchio:	
 14746                                  
 14747                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14748                                  			
 14749 000017D5 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14750 000017D8 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14751                                  
 14752                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14753                                  
 14754 000017DA E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 14755 000017DD 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14756                                  
 14757                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14758                                  ; expensive verification.
 14759                                  
 14760 000017DF E816EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14761 000017E2 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14762 000017E4 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14763 000017E7 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14764 000017E9 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14765 000017EB 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14766 000017ED E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 14767                                  checklatchret:				
 14768 000017F0 E8DAF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14769                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14770 000017F3 F9                      		stc
 14771 000017F4 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14772                                  checkret:				
 14773 000017F5 C3                      		retn
 14774                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14775                                  
 14776                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14777                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14778                                  ;
 14779                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14780                                  
 14781                                  checkfatvid:				
 14782 000017F6 E8BD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14783 000017F9 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14784 000017FB 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14785                                  
 14786                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14787                                  
 14788                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14789                                  
 14790                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14791                                  
 14792                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14793                                  ;
 14794                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14795                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14796                                  ;
 14797                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14798                                  ;
 14799                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14800                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14801                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14802                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14803                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14804                                  ;
 14805                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14806                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14807                                  ; routine.)
 14808                                  ;
 14809                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14810                                  
 14811                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14812                                  check_vid:
 14813                                  
 14814                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14815                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14816                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14817                                  
 14818 000017FD 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14819                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14820                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14821 00001802 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14822 00001804 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 14823 00001807 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14824 00001809 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14825 0000180B 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14826                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14827 00001810 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14828                                  					; if not fat system
 14829 00001812 E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 14830 00001815 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14831 00001817 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 14832 0000181A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14833                                  					; definitely changed
 14834 0000181D 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14835                                  
 14836 0000181F 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14837                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14838 00001820 E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 14839                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14840                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14841                                  		;clc
 14842                                  checkfatret:				
 14843 00001823 C3                      		retn
 14844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14845                                  
 14846                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14847                                  changed_drv:
 14848 00001824 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14849 00001825 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14850                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14851 0000182A C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14852                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14853                                  
 14854                                  ; extended id check
 14855                                  
 14856                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14857                                  
 14858                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14859                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14860                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14861                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14862                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14863                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14864                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14865                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14866                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14867                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14868                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14869                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14870                                  ;
 14871                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14872                                  
 14873                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14874                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14875 0000182B 50                      		push	ax
 14876                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14877                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14878 0000182C A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14879                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14880 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 14881 00001831 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14882 00001835 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14883 00001837 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14884 0000183A 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14885 0000183E 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14886                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 14887                                  					; don't know
 14888 00001840 58                      		pop	ax
 14889 00001841 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14890                                  					; reset the flag
 14891                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14892                                  
 14893                                  ext_changed:
 14894 00001843 58                      		pop	ax
 14895                                  		; 02/09/2023
 14896 00001844 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 14897                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14898                                  					; disk changed!
 14899                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14900                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14901                                  		;clc
 14902 00001845 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14903                                  
 14904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14905                                  
 14906                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14907                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14908                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14909                                  ;
 14910                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14911                                  
 14912                                  checkio:				
 14913 00001847 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14914 0000184A 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14915 0000184C E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14916 0000184F 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14917 00001851 E8A4ED                  		call	GetBp
 14918 00001854 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14919 00001856 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14920 00001859 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14921 0000185B 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14922 0000185D 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14923 0000185F 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14924 00001860 C3                      		retn
 14925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14926                                  
 14927                                  checkioerr:				
 14928 00001861 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14929                                  
 14930                                  checkioret:				
 14931 00001864 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14932 00001865 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr
 14933                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14934                                  
 14935                                  no_error_map:				
 14936 00001868 E915F3                  		jmp	harderr2
 14937                                  
 14938                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14941                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14942                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14943                                  
 14944                                  returnvid:		
 14945 0000186B BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14946                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14947 0000186E E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14948 00001871 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14949 00001873 F9                      		stc
 14950 00001874 C3                      		retn
 14951                                  
 14952                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14955                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14956                                  ;
 14957                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14958                                  ; **trashes si**
 14959                                  
 14960                                  media_set_vid:				
 14961 00001875 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14962                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14963                                  
 14964                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14965                                  
 14966                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14967                                  
 14968                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14969                                  
 14970                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14971                                  vid_into_packet:
 14972 00001878 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14973 00001879 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14974 0000187D 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14975 00001880 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14976 00001882 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14977 00001885 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14978 00001888 1F                      		pop	ds
 14979                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14980 00001889 C3                      		retn
 14981                                  
 14982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14983                                  
 14984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14985                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14986                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14987                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14988                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14989                                  ;
 14990                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14991                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14992                                  ;
 14993                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14994                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14995                                  ;		carry set
 14996                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14997                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14998                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14999                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 15000                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 15001                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 15002                                  ;
 15003                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15004                                  
 15005                                  hidensity:
 15006                                  
 15007                                  ; check for correct drive
 15008                                  		
 15009                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15010 0000188A 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15011                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 15012                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 15013 0000188F 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 15014                                  
 15015                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 15016                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 15017                                  
 15018 00001891 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 15019 00001896 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 15020                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 15021                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 15022 00001898 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 15023 0000189B 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 15024                                  
 15025                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 15026                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 15027                                  
 15028                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15029 0000189D 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15030 000018A1 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 15031                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15032                                  					; ffOther
 15033 000018A3 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 15034 000018A5 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 15035                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 15036                                  					; ff288
 15037 000018A7 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 15038 000018A9 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 15039 000018AB BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 15040                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 15041                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 15042 000018AE B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 15043                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 15044                                  					; 2 sides
 15045                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15046 000018B1 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 15047 000018B2 BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 15048                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 15049                                  					; & head max
 15050                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15051 000018B5 E9B2ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 15052                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15053                                  
 15054                                  Is720K:
 15055                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15056 000018B8 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 15057                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 15058 000018B9 E975ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 15059                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15060                                  
 15061                                  		; 18/12/2022
 15062                                  ;dofloppy:
 15063                                  		;retn
 15064                                  
 15065                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15068                                  
 15069                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15070                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 15071                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 15072                                  ;
 15073                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 15074                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 15075                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15076                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 15077                                  ;
 15078                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 15079                                  ;
 15080                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 15081                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15082                                  
 15083                                  set_changed_dl:	
 15084 000018BC 06                      		push	es
 15085 000018BD 57                      		push	di
 15086                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 15087                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15088 000018BE C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 15089                                  
 15090                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 15091                                  
 15092                                  scan_bds:				
 15093 000018C2 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15094 000018C6 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 15095                                  
 15096                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 15097                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 15098                                  
 15099 000018C8 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15100                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 15101                                  get_next_bds:				
 15102 000018CC 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 15103                                  					; go to	next bds
 15104 000018CF 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 15105 000018D2 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 15106 000018D4 5F                      		pop	di
 15107 000018D5 07                      		pop	es
 15108 000018D6 C3                      		retn
 15109                                  
 15110                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15111                                  
 15112                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15113                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 15114                                  ;
 15115                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 15116                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 15117                                  ;		zero reset - change
 15118                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15119                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15120                                  
 15121                                  checkromchange:	
 15122                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 15123                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15124 000018D7 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 15125                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15126                                  					; fchanged
 15127 000018DC C3                      		retn
 15128                                  
 15129                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15130                                  
 15131                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15132                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 15133                                  ;
 15134                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15135                                  ;   outputs:	none
 15136                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15137                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15138                                  
 15139                                  resetchanged:	
 15140                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 15141                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15142 000018DD 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 15143                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15144                                  					; ~fchanged
 15145 000018E2 C3                      		retn
 15146                                  
 15147                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15148                                  
 15149                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15150                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 15151                                  ;
 15152                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 15153                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 15154                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 15155                                  ;   registers modified: none
 15156                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15157                                  
 15158                                  haschange:
 15159                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 15160                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15161 000018E3 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 15162                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 15163                                  					; fchangeline
 15164 000018E8 C3                      		retn
 15165                                  
 15166                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15167                                  
 15168                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15169                                  
 15170                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15171                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 15172                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15173                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 15174                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 15175                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15176                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15177                                  
 15178                                  ; set_volume_id
 15179                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 15180                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 15181                                  ;
 15182                                  ;   on entry:
 15183                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 15184                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 15185                                  ;
 15186                                  ;   on exit:
 15187                                  ;	carry clear:
 15188                                  ;	   successful call
 15189                                  ;	carry set
 15190                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 15191                                  
 15192                                  set_volume_id:				
 15193 000018E9 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 15194 000018EA 50                      		push	ax
 15195 000018EB E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 15196 000018EE 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 15197 000018F0 E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 15198 000018F3 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 15199 000018F5 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 15200 000018F8 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 15201                                  setvret:				
 15202                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15203                                  		; cf = 0
 15204                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 15205 000018FB 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 15206 000018FC 5A                      		pop	dx
 15207 000018FD C3                      		retn
 15208                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15209                                  
 15210                                  seterr:					
 15211 000018FE 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 15212 000018FF 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 15213 00001900 C3                      		retn
 15214                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15215 00001901 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 15216                                  
 15217                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15218                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 15219                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15220                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 15221                                  
 15222                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15223                                  
 15224                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15225                                  
 15226                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 15227                                  ;
 15228                                  ;   on entry:
 15229                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15230                                  ;
 15231                                  ;   on exit:
 15232                                  ;	carry clear
 15233                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 15234                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 15235                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 15236                                  ;
 15237                                  ;	carry set:
 15238                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 15239                                  
 15240                                  read_volume_id:
 15241 00001903 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 15242 00001904 51                      		push	cx
 15243 00001905 53                      		push	bx
 15244 00001906 50                      		push	ax
 15245 00001907 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 15246 00001908 57                      		push	di
 15247 00001909 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 15248 0000190A 07                      		pop	es
 15249 0000190B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15250 0000190E BE[FD08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15251 00001911 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 15252 00001914 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15253 00001916 5F                      		pop	di
 15254 00001917 07                      		pop	es
 15255 00001918 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 15256                                  					; # of fats
 15257 0000191C 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 15258                                  					; sectors / fat
 15259 00001920 F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 15260 00001922 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 15261                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 15262                                  					;
 15263                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 15264                                  		; 17/10/2022
 15265 00001926 2EA3[0119]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 15266                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 15267                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 15268 0000192A 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 15269                                  					; # root dir entries
 15270 0000192E B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 15271 00001930 D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 15272                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15273                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 15274 00001932 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 15275                                  next_sec:				
 15276 00001933 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 15277 00001934 2EA1[0119]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15278                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 15279                                  					; get sector #
 15280 00001938 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 15281                                  					; sectors / track
 15282 0000193C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15283 0000193E F7F1                    		div	cx
 15284                                  
 15285                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 15286                                  
 15287 00001940 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 15288                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 15289 00001941 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 15290 00001943 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 15291 00001945 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 15292                                  					; # heads on this disc
 15293 00001949 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 15294 0000194B 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 15295 0000194D E828EE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 15296                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 15297 00001950 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 15298 00001952 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 15299 00001955 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 15300                                  fvid_loop:
 15301                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15302 00001957 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0
 15303                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 15304 00001959 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 15305 0000195B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 15306 0000195E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 15307 00001960 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 15308 00001963 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 15309                                  ent_loop:				
 15310 00001965 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 15311 00001968 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 15312 0000196A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 15313 0000196B 2EFF06[0119]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 15314                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 15315                                  					; next sector
 15316 00001970 E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 15317                                  notfound:
 15318                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15319                                  		;xor	si, si
 15320 00001972 EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15321                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15322                                  
 15323                                  found_vid:
 15324                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15325                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  				
 15326 00001974 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15327 00001975 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 15328 00001977 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 15329 00001978 57                      		push	di
 15330 00001979 1E                      		push	ds
 15331 0000197A 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 15332 0000197B BF[0909]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15333 0000197E B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 15334                                  					; length of string minus nul
 15335 00001981 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 15336                                  		;xor	al, al
 15337                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15338 00001983 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 15339 00001984 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 15340                                  		;;xor	si, si
 15341                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15342                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 15343 00001985 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 15344 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 15345                                  fvid_ret:
 15346                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15347 00001987 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15348                                  				
 15349 00001989 58                      		pop	ax
 15350                                  		; 10/12/2022
 15351                                  		; cf = 0
 15352                                  		;clc
 15353                                  rvidret:
 15354 0000198A 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 15355 0000198B 59                      		pop	cx
 15356 0000198C 5A                      		pop	dx
 15357 0000198D C3                      		retn
 15358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15359                                  
 15360                                  no_vid:
 15361 0000198E 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 15362                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 15363                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15364 0000198F EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 15365                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15366                                  
 15367                                  readviderr:				
 15368 00001991 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 15369 00001992 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 15370 00001993 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 15371                                  
 15372                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15373                                  
 15374                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 15375                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 15376                                  preset_volid_addr:
 15377 00001995 BE[0909]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 15378                                  		;
 15379                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 15380                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 15381                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 15382                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 15383 00001998 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15384 0000199B B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15385                                  		;
 15386 0000199E FC                      		cld
 15387 0000199F C3                      		retn
 15388                                  
 15389                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15390                                  
 15391                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15392                                  ;
 15393                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 15394                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 15395                                  
 15396                                  transfer_volume_id:
 15397 000019A0 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 15398 000019A1 56                      		push	si
 15399 000019A2 51                      		push	cx
 15400                                  		
 15401                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15402                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15403                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15404                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15405                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15406                                  		;cld
 15407                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15408 000019A3 E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15409                                  
 15410 000019A6 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 15411 000019A8 59                      		pop	cx
 15412 000019A9 5E                      		pop	si
 15413 000019AA 5F                      		pop	di
 15414 000019AB C3                      		retn
 15415                                  
 15416                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15417                                  
 15418                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 15419                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 15420                                  ;
 15421                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 15422                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 15423                                  
 15424                                  check_volume_id:
 15425 000019AC 57                      		push	di
 15426 000019AD 51                      		push	cx
 15427                                  		
 15428                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 15429                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 15430                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 15431                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 15432                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 15433                                  		;cld
 15434                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 15435 000019AE E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 15436                                  
 15437 000019B1 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 15438 000019B3 59                      		pop	cx
 15439 000019B4 5F                      		pop	di
 15440 000019B5 C3                      		retn
 15441                                  
 15442                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15443                                  
 15444                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 15445                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 15446                                  ;
 15447                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 15448                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 15449                                  ;
 15450                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 15451                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 15452                                  ;
 15453                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 15454                                  
 15455                                  fat_check:		
 15456 000019B6 50                      		push	ax
 15457 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 15458 000019B9 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 15459 000019BC 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 15460                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 15461 000019C0 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 15462 000019C2 4E                      		dec	si
 15463                                  okret1:					
 15464 000019C3 58                      		pop	ax
 15465 000019C4 C3                      		retn
 15466

 15470                                  		;times 7 db 0
 15471

 15473                                  
 15474                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15475                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 15476                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 15477                                  
 15478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15479                                  
 15480                                  		; 09/12/2022
 15481                                  		;db 0
 15482                                  
 15483                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 15484                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 15485                                  
 15486                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 15487 000019C5 00<rep Bh>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15488                                  %endif
 15489                                  
 15490                                  ;align 16
 15491
