 32048                                  ; 09/09/2023
 32049                                  %if 0
 32050                                  gufd_err:
 32051                                  	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 32052                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32053                                  	; ds = cs
 32054                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 32055                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 32056                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 32057                                  	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 32058                                  	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 32059                                  	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 32060                                  	stc
 32061                                  	retn
 32062                                  %endif
 32063                                  
 32064                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32065                                  ;
 32066                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32067                                  ;
 32068                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32069                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32070                                  ;
 32071                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32072                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32073                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32074                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32075                                  ;
 32076                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32077                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32080                                  
 32081                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32082                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32083                                  
 32084                                  DevSetMark:
 32085 00002801 06                      	push	es
 32086 00002802 57                      	push	di
 32087 00002803 1E                      	push	ds
 32088 00002804 56                      	push	si
 32089 00002805 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32090 00002807 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32091 0000280D 40                      	inc	ax
 32092 0000280E 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32093                                  
 32094                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32095                                  
 32096 00002812 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32097                                  	
 32098                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32099                                  	; ds = cs
 32100                                  	;lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32101 00002813 C536[F803]              	lds	si,[bpb_addr]
 32102                                  
 32103 00002817 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32104 00002819 FC                      	cld
 32105                                  dsm_again:
 32106 0000281A AC                      	lodsb

 32145                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32148                                  ;

 32150                                  ;
 32151                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32152                                  ;	in DevSize

 32154                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32155                                  
 32156                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 32158                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32159                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *

 32175 0000286B 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32176 0000286E F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32177 00002872 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no

 32179                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32180 0000287B EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32181                                  szdev1:

 32183 0000287F D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32184 00002881 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32185 00002883 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32186 00002885 09D0                    	or	ax,dx

 32575                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32576                                  ;
 32577                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32578                                  ;
 32579                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32580                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32581                                  ;
 32582                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32583                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32584                                  ;
 32585                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32586                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32587                                  ;
 32588                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32589                                  
 32590                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32591                                  
 32592                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32593                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32594                                  GetHexNum:
 32595 00002982 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32596 00002984 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32597                                  ghn_next:
 32598 00002986 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32599 00002989 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32600 0000298C 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32601 0000298E 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32602 00002991 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32603 00002993 50                      	push	ax
 32604 00002994 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32605 00002996 E82006                  	call	delim
 32606 00002999 58                      	pop	ax
 32607                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32608 0000299A B90400                  	mov	cx,4
 32609 0000299D 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32610 0000299F E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32611                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32612                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32613 000029A2 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32614                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32615                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32616                                  ghn_shift1:
 32617 000029A4 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32618 000029A6 D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32619 000029A8 E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32620 000029AA 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32621 000029AC 46                      	inc	si
 32622 000029AD EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32623                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32624 000029AF 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32625 000029B2 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32626 000029B5 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32627 000029B9 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32628                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32629                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32630                                  ghn_shift2:

 32636 000029C3 C3                      	retn

 32687                                  DOS_ARENA	equ 24h		; offset of arena_head var in DOS data segm.
 32688                                  UMB_ARENA	equ 8Ch		; offset of umb_head in DOS data
 32689

 32694                                  
 32695                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32696                                  ;
 32697                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32698                                  ;
 32699                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32700                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32701                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32702                                  ;			; DS = data
 32703                                  ;
 32704                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32705                                  ;
 32706                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32707                                  ;
 32708                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32709                                  
 32710                                  umb_insert:
 32711 000029E2 1E                      	push	ds
 32712                                  
 32713                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32714                                  	; ds = cs
 32715                                  
 32716                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32717 000029E3 8E1E[8C1E]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32718                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32719 000029E7 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32720 000029EB 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32721 000029ED 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32722                                  ui_next:
 32723 000029EF 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32724                                  					;    new block
 32725 000029F1 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32726                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32727                                  					;    last
 32728 000029F3 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32729 000029F9 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32730                                  					; N: get next block
 32731 000029FB 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32732                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32733 000029FD E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32734 00002A00 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32735                                  
 32736                                  ui_insert:
 32737 00002A02 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32738 00002A04 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32739                                  
 32740 00002A05 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32741 00002A07 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32742                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32743 00002A09 C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32744                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32745 00002A0E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32746                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32747 00002A14 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32748                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32749 00002A18 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32750                                  
 32751                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32752                                  
 32753 00002A1E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32754 00002A20 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32755 00002A26 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32756                                  					; mark as free
 32757 00002A2D 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32758                                  					; start & end of new block
 32759 00002A30 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32760                                  
 32761                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32762                                  	
 32763 00002A35 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32764 00002A37 43                      	inc	bx
 32765 00002A38 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32766 00002A3A 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32767                                  
 32768                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32769                                  					; this block
 32770 00002A3B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32771                                  	
 32772 00002A3D 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32773 00002A43 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32774 00002A4A 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32775 00002A4E 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32776                                  
 32777 00002A55 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32778                                  
 32779                                  ui_append:
 32780                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32781 00002A57 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32782 00002A5C 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32783                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32784                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32785                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32786 00002A62 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32787                                  
 32788 00002A68 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32789 00002A6A 40                      	inc	ax
 32790 00002A6B 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32791                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32792 00002A6D F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32793                                  
 32794 00002A6F 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32795                                  
 32796 00002A71 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32797 00002A77 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32798 00002A7E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32799 00002A82 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32800                                  
 32801                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32802 00002A89 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32803 00002A8B 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32804 00002A91 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32805                                  					; mark as free
 32806 00002A98 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32807 00002A99 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32808                                  ui_done:
 32809                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32810 00002A9E 1F                      	pop	ds
 32811                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32812                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32813                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 32814 00002A9F C3                      	retn
 32815

 32817                                  ;
 32818                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 32819                                  ;
 32820                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 32821                                  ;

 32823                                  
 32824                                  AllocUMB:
 32825                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32826                                  	; ds = cs
 32827 00002AA0 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 32828 00002AA3 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 32829                                  au_next:
 32830 00002AA5 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 32831 00002AA8 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 32832 00002AAA E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 32833 00002AAD EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 32834                                  au_coalesce:
 32835                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32836                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 32837                                  ;au_exit:
 32838                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 32839                                  ;	; ds = cs
 32840                                  ;	retn
 32841                                  
 32842                                  	; 09/09/2023
 32843                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 32844                                  
 32845                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 32846                                  
 32847                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32848                                  ;
 32849                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32850                                  ;
 32851                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32852                                  ;	iff it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32853                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32854                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32855                                  ;
 32856                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32857                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32858                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32859                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32860                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32861                                  ;
 32862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32863                                  
 32864                                  umb_coalesce:
 32865                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32866                                  	; ds = cs
 32867 00002AAF 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32868                                  
 32869 00002AB0 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32870                                  
 32871                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32872                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32873 00002AB2 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32874 00002AB6 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32875                                  uc_nextfree:
 32876 00002ABB 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32877 00002ABD 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32878                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32879 00002ABF 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32880 00002AC4 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32881                                  					; N: get next arena
 32882 00002AC6 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32883 00002AC9 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32884 00002ACB EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32885                                  uc_again:
 32886 00002ACD E86400                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32887 00002AD0 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32888                                  uc_check:
 32889 00002AD2 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32890 00002AD7 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32891                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32892 00002AD9 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32893 00002ADE 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32894                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32895 00002ADF 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32896 00002AE3 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32897 00002AE6 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32898 00002AE8 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32899                                  
 32900                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32901                                  ;uc_done:
 32902                                  	;retn
 32903

 32920 00002AF3 8C06[8C1E]              	mov	[DevDOSData],es		; & save it for later
 32921 00002AF7 B81043                  	mov	ax,4310h
 32922 00002AFA CD2F                    	int	2Fh
 32923                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr],bx	; get XMS driver address
 32924                                  	;mov	[cs:DevXMSAddr+2],es
 32925 00002AFC 891E[751E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr],bx		; get XMS driver address
 32926 00002B00 8C06[771E]              	mov	[DevXMSAddr+2],es	
 32927                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32928 00002B04 803E[8B1E]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0 
 32929                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0 ; have we already linked a UMB?
 32930                                  	;jne	short ia_1		; quit if we already did it
 32931                                  	; 12/12/2022

 32933 00002B0B E83900                  	call	LinkFirstUMB		; else link the first UMB
 32934                                  	;jc	short iau_err

 32951                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32952                                  ;
 32953                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32954                                  ;
 32955                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32956                                  ;
 32957                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32958                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32959                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32960                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32961                                  ;				NC
 32962                                  ;			  else 
 32963                                  ;				CY
 32964                                  ;
 32965                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32966                                  ;
 32967                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32968                                  
 32969                                  umb_allocate:
 32970                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32971                                  	; ds = cs
 32972 00002B18 50                      	push	ax
 32973 00002B19 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32974 00002B1B BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32975                                  					;   possible
 32976                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32977 00002B1E FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32978                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32979                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32980                                  					; the largest UMB
 32981 00002B22 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32982 00002B24 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 32983                                  	
 32984 00002B26 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32985                                  
 32986                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32987 00002B28 FF1E[751E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]

 32989

 32991                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32992                                  	; 14/08/2023
 32993 00002B2F 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 32994                                  ua_err:
 32995 00002B31 F9                      	stc	
 32996                                  
 32997                                  	;clc
 32998                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32999                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33000                                  	; cf=0
 33001                                  	;clc 
 33002                                  ua_done:
 33003 00002B32 58                      	pop	ax
 33004 00002B33 C3                      	retn
 33005                                  	; 14/08/2023
 33006                                  ;ua_err:
 33007                                  	;stc
 33008                                  	;jmp	short ua_done

 33012                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33013                                  ;
 33014                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 33015                                  ;
 33016                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head

 33018                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged

 33020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33021

 33023                                  get_next:
 33024 00002B34 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33025 00002B39 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 33026                                  _get_next_:
 33027 00002B3B 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 33028 00002B3D 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 33029 00002B41 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 33030 00002B42 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33031                                  	;clc
 33032                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33033                                  	; 11/12/2022
 33034                                  	; cf=0
 33035                                  	;clc
 33036 00002B44 C3                      	retn
 33037                                  gn_err:
 33038 00002B45 F9                      	stc
 33039                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 33040                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 33041 00002B46 C3                      	retn

 33043                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33044                                  ;
 33045                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 33046                                  ;
 33047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33048                                  
 33049                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33050                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 33051                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 33052                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33053                                  	; ds = cs

 33056

 33059                                  
 33060                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33061                                  	; ds = cs
 33062                                  
 33063 00002B4C CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 33064 00002B4E B106                    	mov	cl,6
 33065 00002B50 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 33066                                  
 33067 00002B52 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 33068 00002B54 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 33069

 33071                                  
 33072                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 33073                                  	; 09/09/2023
 33074 00002B58 49                      	dec	cx
 33075 00002B59 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 33076                                  	
 33077 00002B5B 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 33078 00002B61 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 33079                                  					
 33080 00002B68 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 33081 00002B6C 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 33082

 33084                                  
 33085 00002B73 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 33086 00002B75 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33087 00002B7B 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 33088                                  					; mark as free 
 33089 00002B82 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 33090 00002B83 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 33091                                  
 33092                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 33093                                  	; 31/12/2022
 33094 00002B88 8E06[8C1E]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 33095                                  	; 18/09/2023
 33096 00002B8C 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx
 33097                                  	;mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 33098                                  	;mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 33099                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 33100                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 33101                                  
 33102                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 33103                                  
 33104                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 33105                                  	;mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 33106                                  	; 18/09/2023

 33108 00002B96 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 33109                                  ;scan_next
 33110                                  ; 09/12/2022
 33111                                  scannext:

 33114                                  	
 33115 00002B9E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33116 00002BA0 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]

 33146                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33147                                  ;
 33148                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33149                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool

 33158 00002BBB 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 33159 00002BBD 06                      	push	es
 33160 00002BBE 53                      	push	bx
 33161                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33162                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33163                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33164                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33165 00002BBF 8B1E[731E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33166 00002BC3 2B1E[6F1E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33167 00002BC7 8E06[6F1E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33168                                  	
 33169 00002BCB B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33170 00002BCE CD21                    	int	21h
 33171                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33172                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33173                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs

 33175 00002BD2 48                      	dec	ax
 33176 00002BD3 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33177 00002BD5 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33178 00002BDC 5B                      	pop	bx
 33179 00002BDD 07                      	pop	es
 33180                                  su_exit:

 33205                                  ulu_next:

 33209 00002BFD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found

 33220                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33221                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33222                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33223                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33224                                  
 33225                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33226                                  ;
 33227                                  ; Summary:
 33228                                  ;
 33229                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33230                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33231                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33232                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33233                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33234                                  ;
 33235                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33236                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33237                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33238                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33239                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33240                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33241                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33242                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33243                                  ;
 33244                                  ; Example:
 33245                                  ;
 33246                                  ;   [menu]
 33247                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33248                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33249                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33250                                  ;
 33251                                  ;   [network]
 33252                                  ;   include misc
 33253                                  ;   device=foo
 33254                                  ;
 33255                                  ;   [misc]
 33256                                  ;   device=bar
 33257                                  ;   include alternate
 33258                                  ;
 33259                                  ;   [alternate]
 33260                                  ;   device=tar
 33261                                  ;
 33262                                  ;
 33263                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33264                                  ;
 33265                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33266                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33267                                  ;
 33268                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33269                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33270                                  ;   following order:
 33271                                  ;
 33272                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33273                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33274                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33275                                  ;
 33276                                  
 33277                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33278                                  
 33279                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33280                                  
 33281                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33282                                  
 33283                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33284                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33285                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33286                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33287                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33288                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33289                                  
 33290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33291                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33292                                  
 33293                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33294                                  
 33295                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33296                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33297                                  
 33298 00002C0B 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 33412                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33413                                  ;
 33414                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33415                                  ;
 33416                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 33417                                  ;
 33418                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33419                                  
 33420                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33421                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 33422                                  
 33423                                  parseline:
 33424                                  	push	ds
 33425                                  
 33426                                  	push	cs
 33427                                  	pop	ds
 33428                                  
 33429                                  nextswtch:
 33430                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 33431                                  	je	short done_line
 33432                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 33433                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33434                                  
 33435                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33436                                  
 33437                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 33438                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 33439                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 33440                                  	je	short getparm
 33441                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 33442                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33443                                  
 33444                                  getparm:
 33445                                  	call	check_switch
 33446                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 33447                                  	jc	short swterr
 33448                                  getnext:
 33449                                  	call	getchr
 33450                                  	jc	short done_line
 33451                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 33452                                  swterr:
 33453                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33454                                  
 33455                                  done_line:
 33456                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33457                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 33458                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 33459                                  	jnz	short okay
 33460                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 33461                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 33462                                  
 33463                                  okay:
 33464                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 33465                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 33466                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 33467                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 33468                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 33469                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33470                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33471                                  	; cf=0
 33472                                  	;clc
 33473                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 33474                                  exitpl:
 33475                                  	pop	ds
 33476                                  	retn
 33477                                  put_back:
 33478                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 33479                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33480                                  	jmp	short done_line
 33481                                  
 33482                                  %endif

 33485                                  ;
 33486                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33487                                  ;
 33488                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33489                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33490                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33491                                  ; error.
 33492                                  ;
 33493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33494                                  
 33495                                  ; 09/09/2023
 33496                                  
 33497                                  err_swtch:
 33498 00002C5F 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 33499                                  err_check:
 33500 00002C61 F9                      	stc
 33501                                  err_chk:
 33502                                  done_swtch:	; 09/09/2023 (cf=0)
 33503 00002C62 C3                      	retn
 33504                                  
 33505                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 33506                                  
 33507                                  check_switch:

 33509                                  	;jc	short err_check

 33512 00002C6A 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 33513                                  	;jb	short err_check
 33514 00002C6C 72F4                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 33516 00002C70 77EF                    	ja	short err_check

 33531

 33583                                  ;
 33584                                  ; procedure : process_num
 33585                                  ;
 33586                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 33587                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 33588                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 33589                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 33590                                  ;
 33591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33592                                  
 33593                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33594                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 33595                                  process_num:

 33598                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33599 00002CB4 F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 33600                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 33601 00002CB7 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 33602 00002CB9 A2[9535]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 33603                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33604                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33605                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33606                                  	; cf=0

 33608                                  try_f:
 33609                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33610 00002CBD F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 33611                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 33612 00002CC0 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 33613                                  
 33614                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 33615                                  
 33616                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 33617 00002CC2 A2[6E34]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 33618                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33619                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 33620                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33621                                  	; cf=0
 33622 00002CC5 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 33623                                  try_t:

 33625 00002CC8 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 33626                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33627 00002CCA F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 33628                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 33629 00002CCD 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 33630

 33669                                  ; procedure : parseline
 33670                                  ;
 33671                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.

 33690 00002CE6 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 33691                                  
 33692                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 33693

 33707 00002CF9 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 33708                                  getnext:
 33709 00002CFB E8E002                  	call	getchr
 33710                                  	;jc	short done_line
 33711                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 33712                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33713 00002CFE 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch

 33715                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 33716

 33730                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 33731                                  	;retn
 33732

 33735 00002D0D FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 33736 00002D11 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line

 33757                                  ;
 33758                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33759                                  ;
 33760                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33761                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33762                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33763                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33764                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33765                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33766                                  ;
 33767                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33768                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33769                                  ;
 33770                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33771                                  ;
 33772                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33773                                  
 33774                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33775                                  
 33776                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33777                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33778                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33779                                  	; ds = cs
 33780                                  	
 33781 00002D22 06                      	push	es
 33782                                  
 33783 00002D23 0E                      	push	cs
 33784 00002D24 07                      	pop	es
 33785                                  
 33786 00002D25 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33787 00002D27 8A1E[6E34]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 33788 00002D2B 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33789 00002D2E 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 33790                                  
 33791 00002D30 C706[7134]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33792                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 33793                                  got_80:

 33795 00002D38 8BB7[1636]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 33796

 33798                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33799 00002D3C BF[7434]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 33800 00002D3F B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31

 33802                                  	;repe	movsb

 33807                                  
 33808                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33809 00002D46 F606[9635]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 33810                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h

 33826

 33828                                  
 33829                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 33830                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 33831                                  
 33832                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 33833                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33834                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 33835                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33836 00002D60 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 33837 00002D63 A2[7634]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 33838                                  
 33839 00002D66 B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 33840                                  
 33841                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 33842                                  
 33843                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 33844                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33845 00002D68 8A3E[7E34]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 33846                                  
 33847                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33848                                  	; ax = 2
 33849 00002D6C 3906[8334]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 33850                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 33851 00002D70 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 33852                                  
 33853 00002D72 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 33854                                  
 33855                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 33856                                  
 33857 00002D74 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 33858                                  
 33859                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 33860                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33861                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33862                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33863                                  
 33864                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33865                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33866                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 33867                                  
 33868 00002D76 833E[8134]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 33869 00002D7B 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 33870 00002D7D 833E[7134]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33871 00002D82 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 33872                                  
 33873                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 33874                                  
 33875 00002D84 EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33876                                  
 33877                                  ;	check for 320K
 33878                                  
 33879                                  not_144m:
 33880 00002D86 833E[7134]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 33881 00002D8B 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33882 00002D8D 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33883 00002D92 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 33884                                  
 33885 00002D94 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 33886 00002D96 EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 33887                                  
 33888                                  only_one_head:
 33889                                  
 33890                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 33891                                  
 33892 00002D98 803E[6E34]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 33893 00002D9D 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33894                                  
 33895                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33896                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33897                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33898                                  
 33899 00002D9F B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 33900 00002DA1 833E[8134]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33901                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33902 00002DA6 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 33903                                  
 33904 00002DA8 B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33905                                  
 33906                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33907                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33908                                  
 33909                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 33910                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33911                                  	; ax = 2
 33912 00002DAA 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 33913 00002DAB A2[7634]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 33914                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33915                                  
 33916                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33917 00002DAE 881E[7E34]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33918                                  
 33919                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33920                                  
 33921 00002DB2 A1[7134]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33922 00002DB5 F726[8334]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33923 00002DB9 F726[8134]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33924 00002DBD A3[7C34]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33925 00002DC0 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33926                                  
 33927 00002DC1 C3                      	retn
 33928

 34385                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]

 34395 00002F73 59                      	pop	cx
 34396                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34397                                  	; ds = cs
 34398                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34399                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di

 34422                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34423                                  ;
 34424                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34425                                  ;
 34426                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34427                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34428                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34429                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34430                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34431                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34432                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34433                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34434                                  ;
 34435                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34436                                  
 34437                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34438                                  
 34439                                  skip_comment:
 34440 00002F83 E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34441                                  
 34442                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34443                                  	; ds = cs	
 34444                                  
 34445 00002F85 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34446                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34447 00002F8A 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34448                                  
 34449 00002F8C 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34450                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34451 00002F91 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34452                                  
 34453 00002F93 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34454                                  	
 34455 00002F96 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34456                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34457 00002F9A 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34458                                  
 34459 00002F9C 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34460                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34461 00002FA1 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34462                                  
 34463 00002FA3 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34464                                  	
 34465 00002FA7 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34466                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34467 00002FAB 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34468                                  skip_cmmt:
 34469 00002FAD E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34470 00002FAF 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34471 00002FB2 46                      	inc	si
 34472 00002FB3 49                      	dec	cx
 34473 00002FB4 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34474 00002FB6 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34475                                  no_commt:
 34476 00002FB8 C3                      	retn
 34477                                  
 34478                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34479                                  %if 0
 34480                                  
 34481                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34482                                  
 34483                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34484                                  ;
 34485                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34486                                  ;
 34487                                  ;   INPUT
 34488                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34489                                  ;
 34490                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34491                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34492                                  ;
 34493                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34494                                  ;       All
 34495                                  ;
 34496                                  ;   HISTORY
 34497                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34498                                  ;
 34499                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34500                                  
 34501                                  kbd_read:
 34502                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34503                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34504                                  
 34505                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34506                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34507                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34508                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34509                                  kbd_loop:
 34510                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 34511                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34512                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34513                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34514                                          int     16h             ;
 34515                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34516                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34517                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34518                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34519                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34520                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34521                                  
 34522                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 34523                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34524                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34525                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34526                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34527                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34528                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34529                                          int     16h             ;
 34530                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34531                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34532                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 34533                                          inc     bx
 34534                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34535                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34536                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34537                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34538                                          int     16h             ;
 34539                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34540                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34541                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34542                                  
 34543                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34544                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34545                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34546                                  	
 34547                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34548                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34549                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34550                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34551                                          call    print
 34552                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34553                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 34554                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34555                                  kbd_notf5:
 34556                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34557                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34558                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34559                                  
 34560                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34561                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34562                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34563                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34564                                          call    print           ;
 34565                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34566                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34567                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34568                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 34569                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34570                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34571                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 34572                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34573                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34574                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34575                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34576                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34577                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34578                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34579                                          retn			;
 34580                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34581                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34582                                          retn			;
 34583                                  
 34584                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34585                                  ;
 34586                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34587                                  ;
 34588                                  ;   INPUT
 34589                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34590                                  ;
 34591                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34592                                  ;       None
 34593                                  ;
 34594                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34595                                  ;       None
 34596                                  ;
 34597                                  ;   HISTORY
 34598                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34599                                  ;
 34600                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34601                                  
 34602                                  set_numlock:
 34603                                          push    ax
 34604                                          push    ds
 34605                                          sub     ax,ax
 34606                                          mov     ds,ax
 34607                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34608                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34609                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 34610                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34611                                          jmp     short set_done
 34612                                  not_off:
 34613                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34614                                          stc
 34615                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 34616                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 34617                                  set_done:
 34618                                          pop     ds
 34619                                          pop     ax
 34620                                          retn
 34621                                  
 34622                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34623                                  
 34624                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34625                                  ;
 34626                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34627                                  ;
 34628                                  ;   INPUT
 34629                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34630                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34631                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34632                                  ;
 34633                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34634                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34635                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34636                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34637                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34638                                  ;
 34639                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34640                                  ;       All
 34641                                  ;
 34642                                  ;   NOTES
 34643                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34644                                  ;
 34645                                  ;   HISTORY
 34646                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34647                                  ;
 34648                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34649                                  
 34650                                  menu_check:
 34651                                  
 34652                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 34653                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34654                                  
 34655                                          push    cx              ;
 34656                                          push    si              ;
 34657                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34658                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34659                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34660                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34661                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34662                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34663                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34664                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34665                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34666                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34667                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34668                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34669                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34670                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34671                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
