 34672                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34673                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34674                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34675                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34676                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34677                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34678                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34679                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34680                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34681                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34682                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34683                                          call    get_char        ;
 34684                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34685                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34686                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34687                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34688                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34689                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34690                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34691                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34692                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34693                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34694                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34695                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34696                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34697                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34698                                          pop     si              ;
 34699                                          pop     cx              ;
 34700                                  
 34701                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34702                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34703                                  
 34704                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34705                                          jnz	short menu_search
 34706                                  ;
 34707                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34708                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34709                                  ;
 34710                                          call    kbd_read
 34711                                          jnc	short menu_search
 34712                                          jmp	menu_abort
 34713                                  
 34714                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34715                                  
 34716                                  menu_search:
 34717                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34718                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 34719                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34720                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 34721                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34722                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34723                                  
 34724                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34725                                  
 34726                                  menu_color:
 34727                                          push    cx              ;
 34728                                          push    dx              ;
 34729                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34730                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34731                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34732                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34733                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34734                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34735                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34736                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34737                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34738                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34739                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34740                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34741                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34742                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 34743                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 34744                                  check_color:                    ;
 34745                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34746                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 34747                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34748                                  set_color:
 34749                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34750                                          pop     dx              ;
 34751                                          pop     cx              ;
 34752                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34753                                  
 34754                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34755                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34756                                  
 34757                                  menu_found:
 34758                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34759                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34760                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34761                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34762                                  
 34763                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34764                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34765                                  
 34766                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34767                                  
 34768                                  menu_process:
 34769                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34770                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34771                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34772                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34773                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34774                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34775                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34776                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34777                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34778                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34779                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34780                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34781                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34782                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34783                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 34784                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34785                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34786                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34787                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34788                                          stc                     ;
 34789                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34790                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34791                                  menu_numlock:
 34792                                          call    set_numlock
 34793                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34794                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34795                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34796                                  
 34797                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34798                                  
 34799                                  menu_default:
 34800                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34801                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34802                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34803                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34804                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34805                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34806                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34807                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 34808                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34809                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34810                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34811                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34812                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34813                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34814                                  timeout_skip:
 34815                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34816                                  
 34817                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34818                                  
 34819                                  menu_item:
 34820                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34821                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34822                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34823                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34824                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34825                                          stc                     ;
 34826                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34827                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34828                                  
 34829                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34830                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34831                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34832                                  
 34833                                  menu_itemfound:
 34834                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34835                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34836                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34837                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34838                                  
 34839                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34840                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34841                                  ;   description...
 34842                                  
 34843                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34844                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34845                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34846                                          call    skip_token      ;
 34847                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34848                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34849                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34850                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 34851                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34852                                  
 34853                                  menu_nextitem:
 34854                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34855                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34856                                  
 34857                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34858                                  
 34859                                  menu_getdefault:
 34860                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34861                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34862                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34863                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34864                                  menu_valid:
 34865                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 34866                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 34867                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 34868                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 34869                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 34870                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 34871                                  menu_chkdefault:
 34872                                          push    bx              ;
 34873                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34874                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34875                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 34876                                          push    ds              ;
 34877                                          push    es              ;
 34878                                          pop     ds              ;
 34879                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 34880                                          pop     ds              ;
 34881                                          pop     bx              ;
 34882                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 34883                                          inc     bx              ;
 34884                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 34885                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 34886                                  menu_nodefault:
 34887                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 34888                                  menu_setdefault:
 34889                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 34890                                  
 34891                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 34892                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 34893                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 34894                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 34895                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 34896                                  ;   with no timeout)
 34897                                  
 34898                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 34899                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 34900                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 34901                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 34902                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 34903                                  
 34904                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 34905                                  
 34906                                  menu_display:
 34907                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 34908                                          int     10h             ;
 34909                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 34910                                          int     10h             ;
 34911                                          push    es              ;
 34912                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 34913                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 34914                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 34915                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 34916                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 34917                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 34918                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 34919                                          int     10h             ;
 34920                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 34921                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 34922                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 34923                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 34924                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 34925                                  	dec     dl              ;
 34926                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 34927                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 34928                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 34929                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 34930                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 34931                                  menu_clear:
 34932                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 34933                                          pop     es              ;
 34934                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 34935                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 34936                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34937                                  
 34938                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34939                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34940                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34941                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34942                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34943                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34944                                          int     10h             ;
 34945                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34946                                          call    print           ;
 34947                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34948                                          int     10h             ;
 34949                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34950                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34951                                  
 34952                                  menu_nostatus:
 34953                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34954                                  menu_disploop:
 34955                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34956                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34957                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34958                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34959                                  
 34960                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34961                                  
 34962                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34963                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34964                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34965                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34966                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34967                                          int     10h             ;
 34968                                  
 34969                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34970                                          call    print           ;
 34971                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34972                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 34973                                          call    print           ;
 34974                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 34975                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34976                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34977                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34978                                  
 34979                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34980                                  
 34981                                  menu_autoselect:
 34982                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34983                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34984                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34985                                  menu_abort:
 34986                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34987                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34988                                  
 34989                                  normal_boot:
 34990                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34991                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34992                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34993                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34994                                          jmp     menu_search
 34995                                  
 34996                                  not_topmenu:
 34997                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34998                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34999                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35000                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35001                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 35002                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35003                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 35004                                          jmp     menu_found
 35005                                  
 35006                                  not_submenu:
 35007                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 35008                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 35009                                  
 35010                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 35011                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 35012                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 35013                                  
 35014                                  no_selection:
 35015                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 35016                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 35017                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35018                                          push    ds              ;
 35019                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 35020                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35021                                  
 35022                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 35023                                  ;
 35024                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 35025                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 35026                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 35027                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 35028                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 35029                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 35030                                  ;
 35031                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 35032                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 35033                                  
 35034                                  copyblock_loop:
 35035                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 35036                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 35037                                          pop     bx              ;
 35038                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35039                                  
 35040                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 35041                                  
 35042                                  copyblock_begin:
 35043                                          push    ax              ;
 35044                                          push    cx              ;
 35045                                          push    si              ;
 35046                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 35047                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35048                                          push    ds              ;
 35049                                          push    cs              ;
 35050                                          pop     ds              ;
 35051                                          call    comp_names      ;
 35052                                          pop     ds              ;
 35053                                          pop     di              ;
 35054                                          pop     si              ;
 35055                                          pop     cx              ;
 35056                                          pop     ax              ;
 35057                                          je	short copyblock_check
 35058                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 35059                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 35060                                          push    di              ;
 35061                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 35062                                          push    ds              ;
 35063                                          push    es              ;
 35064                                          pop     ds              ;
 35065                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 35066                                          pop     ds              ;
 35067                                          pop     di              ;
 35068                                  copyblock_check:
 35069                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35070                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 35071                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35072                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 35073                                  
 35074                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 35075                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 35076                                          call    get_char        ;
 35077                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 35078                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35079                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 35080                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 35081                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 35082                                  ;
 35083                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 35084                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 35085                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 35086                                  ;
 35087                                  move_config:
 35088                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 35089                                          push    cx              ;
 35090                                  ;
 35091                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 35092                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 35093                                  ;
 35094                                   	;mov	cx,7
 35095                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 35096                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 35097                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 35098                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 35099                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 35100                                  copy_boot: 
 35101                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 35102                                          cs
 35103                                  	lodsb
 35104                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 35105                                          inc     di              ;
 35106                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 35107                                  
 35108                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 35109                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 35110                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 35111                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 35112                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 35113                                          push    cs              ;
 35114                                          pop     es              ;
 35115                                          mov     si,szCommon
 35116                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 35117                                          call    any_delim       ;
 35118                                          je	short l2	;
 35119                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35120                                          inc     si              ;
 35121                                          inc     di              ;
 35122                                          loop    l1              ;
 35123                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 35124                                          pop     es              ;
 35125                                  
 35126                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 35127                                  
 35128                                          sub     di,di           ;
 35129                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35130                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35131                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 35132                                  
 35133                                          push    cx              ;
 35134                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 35135                                          pop     cx              ;
 35136                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 35137                                          pop     ds              ;
 35138                                  
 35139                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 35140                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 35141                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 35142                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 35143                                  ;   is empty.
 35144                                  
 35145                                          push    es              ;
 35146                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35147                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 35148                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 35149                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35150                                          pop     es
 35151                                  
 35152                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 35153                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 35154                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 35155                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 35156                                  
 35157                                  menu_done:
 35158                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 35159                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 35160                                          push    es              ;
 35161                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 35162                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 35163                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 35164                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 35165                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 35166                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 35167                                          pop     es              ;
 35168                                  menu_exit:
 35169                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 35170                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 35171                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 35172                                          retn
 35173                                  
 35174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35175                                  ;
 35176                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 35177                                  ;
 35178                                  ;   INPUT
 35179                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 35180                                  ;
 35181                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35182                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 35183                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35186                                  ;       None
 35187                                  ;
 35188                                  ;   NOTES
 35189                                  ;       None
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;   HISTORY
 35192                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35193                                  ;
 35194                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35195                                  
 35196                                  copy_envvar:
 35197                                          push    cx              ;
 35198                                          push    si              ;
 35199                                          push    ds              ;
 35200                                          push    es              ;
 35201                                          push    es              ;
 35202                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 35203                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 35204                                  
 35205                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 35206                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 35207                                  ;   config.sys line)
 35208                                  ;
 35209                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 35210                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 35211                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 35212                                  
 35213                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 35214                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 35215                                          lodsb                   ;
 35216                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 35217                                          stc                     ;
 35218                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 35219                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 35220                                          stc                     ;
 35221                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35222                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 35223                                          stc                     ;
 35224                                          je	short copy_envexit
 35225                                          inc     cx              ;
 35226                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 35227                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 35228                                          mov     al,0            ;
 35229                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 35230                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 35231                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 35232                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 35233                                  copy_varsrch:
 35234                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 35235                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 35236                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 35237                                          push    cx              ;
 35238                                          push    si              ;
 35239                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 35240                                          pop     si              ;
 35241                                          pop     cx              ;
 35242                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 35243                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 35244                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 35245                                  
 35246                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 35247                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 35248                                  
 35249                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35250                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 35251                                          push    si              ;
 35252                                          mov     si,di           ;
 35253                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 35254                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 35255                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 35256                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 35257                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 35258                                  
 35259                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 35260                                  	es	; 26h
 35261                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 35262                                  
 35263                                  	pop     si
 35264                                  copy_envprep:
 35265                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 35266                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 35267                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 35268                                          je	short copy_envdel
 35269                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35270                                  
 35271                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 35272                                          push    cx              ;
 35273                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 35274                                          repne   scasb           ;
 35275                                          pop     cx              ;
 35276                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 35277                                  
 35278                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 35279                                          lodsb                   ;
 35280                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 35281                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35282                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 35283                                          je	short copy_envdone
 35284                                          stosb                   ;
 35285                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 35286                                  
 35287                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 35288                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 35289                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 35290                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 35291                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 35292                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 35293                                  
 35294                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 35295                                          pop     es              ;
 35296                                          pop     ds              ;
 35297                                          pop     si              ;
 35298                                          pop     cx              ;
 35299                                  
 35300                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35301                                          retn
 35302                                  
 35303                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35304                                  ;
 35305                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 35306                                  ;
 35307                                  ;   INPUT
 35308                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35309                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 35310                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 35311                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 35312                                  ;
 35313                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35314                                  ;       Same as above
 35315                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 35316                                  ;
 35317                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35318                                  ;       All
 35319                                  ;
 35320                                  ;   NOTES
 35321                                  ;       None
 35322                                  ;
 35323                                  ;   HISTORY
 35324                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35325                                  ;
 35326                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35327                                  
 35328                                  copy_block:
 35329                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 35330                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 35331                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35332                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 35333                                          je	short copy_done ;
 35334                                  
 35335                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 35336                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 35337                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 35338                                  
 35339                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 35340                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 35341                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 35342                                  
 35343                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 35344                                          push    di              ;
 35345                                  
 35346                                          mov     di,szMenu
 35347                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 35348                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35349                                  
 35350                                          mov     di,szCommon
 35351                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 35352                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 35353                                  
 35354                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 35355                                          call    srch_block      ;
 35356                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 35357                                          pop     di              ;
 35358                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 35359                                          push    cx              ;
 35360                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 35361                                          push    si              ;
 35362                                          dec     dx              ;
 35363                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 35364                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 35365                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 35366                                          pop     si              ;
 35367                                          pop     cx              ;
 35368                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 35369                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35370                                  
 35371                                  copy_skip:
 35372                                          pop     di
 35373                                  copy_error:
 35374                                          clc                     ;
 35375                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 35376                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 35377                                  
 35378                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 35379                                  
 35380                                  copy_line:
 35381                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35382                                          inc     di              ;
 35383                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 35384                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 35385                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 35386                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 35387                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 35388                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 35389                                          inc     di              ;
 35390                                          inc     di              ;
 35391                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 35392                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 35393                                          call    get_char        ;
 35394                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 35395                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 35396                                          inc     di              ;
 35397                                  copy_next:
 35398                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 35399                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 35400                                  
 35401                                  copy_nextline:
 35402                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 35403                                          jmp     short copy_block
 35404                                  
 35405                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35406                                  ;copy_done:
 35407                                          ;retn
 35408                                  
 35409                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35410                                  ;
 35411                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 35412                                  ;
 35413                                  ;   INPUT
 35414                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 35415                                  ;
 35416                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35417                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 35418                                  ;
 35419                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35420                                  ;       DX
 35421                                  ;
 35422                                  ;   NOTES
 35423                                  ;       None
 35424                                  ;
 35425                                  ;   HISTORY
 35426                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35427                                  ;
 35428                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35429                                  
 35430                                  get_linenum:
 35431                                          push    ax              ;
 35432                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 35433                                          push    cx              ;
 35434                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 35435                                          push    si              ;
 35436                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35437                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 35438                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 35439                                          call    skip_line       ;
 35440                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 35441                                          inc     bx              ;
 35442                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 35443                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 35444                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 35445                                          pop     si              ;
 35446                                          pop     cx              ;
 35447                                          pop     ax              ;
 35448                                          retn
 35449                                  
 35450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35451                                  ;
 35452                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 35453                                  ;
 35454                                  ;   INPUT
 35455                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 35456                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 35457                                  ;
 35458                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35459                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 35460                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 35461                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 35462                                  ;
 35463                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35464                                  ;       None
 35465                                  ;
 35466                                  ;   NOTES
 35467                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 35468                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 35469                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 35470                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 35471                                  ;
 35472                                  ;   HISTORY
 35473                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35474                                  ;
 35475                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35476                                  
 35477                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 35478                                          push    ax              ;
 35479                                          push    cx              ;
 35480                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 35481                                          push    si              ;
 35482                                          sub     si,si           ;
 35483                                          push    ds              ;
 35484                                          push    es              ;
 35485                                          pop     ds              ;
 35486                                          call    find_block      ;
 35487                                          mov     di,si           ;
 35488                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 35489                                          pop     ds              ;
 35490                                          pop     si              ;
 35491                                          pop     cx              ;
 35492                                          pop     ax              ;
 35493                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 35494                                          retn			;
 35495                                  
 35496                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35497                                  ;
 35498                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 35499                                  ;
 35500                                  ;   INPUT
 35501                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 35502                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 35503                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 35504                                  ;
 35505                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35506                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 35507                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35508                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35509                                  ;
 35510                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35511                                  ;       AX
 35512                                  ;
 35513                                  ;   NOTES
 35514                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 35515                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 35516                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 35517                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 35518                                  ;
 35519                                  ;   HISTORY
 35520                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35521                                  ;
 35522                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35523                                  
 35524                                  find_block:
 35525                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 35526                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 35527                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 35528                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 35529                                          je	short check_line ; no
 35530                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 35531                                          jne	short next_line	;
 35532                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35533                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 35534                                  check_line:
 35535                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 35536                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 35537                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 35538                                  next_line:
 35539                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 35540                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 35541                                  ;find_exit:
 35542                                  ;	retn
 35543                                  
 35544                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35545                                  ;
 35546                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 35547                                  ;
 35548                                  ;   INPUT
 35549                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 35550                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35551                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35552                                  ;
 35553                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35554                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 35555                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 35556                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35557                                  ;
 35558                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35559                                  ;       AX
 35560                                  ;
 35561                                  ;   NOTES
 35562                                  ;       None
 35563                                  ;
 35564                                  ;   HISTORY
 35565                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35566                                  ;
 35567                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35568                                  
 35569                                  comp_names:
 35570                                          push    di              ;
 35571                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 35572                                          call    get_char        ;
 35573                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 35574                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 35575                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 35576                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 35577                                          inc     di              ;
 35578                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 35579                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 35580                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 35581                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 35582                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 35583                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 35584                                          pop     di              ;
 35585                                          retn			;
 35586                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 35587                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 35588                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 35589                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 35590                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 35591                                  
 35592                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35593                                  
 35594                                  comp_names_safe:
 35595                                          push    ax
 35596                                          push    cx
 35597                                          push	si
 35598                                          push    ds
 35599                                          push    cs
 35600                                          pop     ds
 35601                                          call    comp_names
 35602                                          pop     ds
 35603                                  	pop	si
 35604                                          pop     cx
 35605                                          pop     ax
 35606                                          retn
 35607                                  
 35608                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35609                                  ;
 35610                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 35611                                  ;
 35612                                  ;   INPUT
 35613                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 35614                                  ;
 35615                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35616                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 35617                                  ;
 35618                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35619                                  ;       None
 35620                                  ;
 35621                                  ;   NOTES
 35622                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 35623                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 35624                                  ;
 35625                                  ;   HISTORY
 35626                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35627                                  ;
 35628                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35629                                  
 35630                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 35631                                          push    ax              ;
 35632                                          push    bx              ;
 35633                                          push    cx              ;
 35634                                          push    dx              ;
 35635                                          push    si              ;
 35636                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35637                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 35638                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 35639                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35640                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35641                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 35642                                          add     dh,3            ;
 35643                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 35644                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 35645                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35646                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 35647                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 35648                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 35649                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35650                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 35651                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 35652                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 35653                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 35654                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 35655                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 35656                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 35657                                  print_other:                    ;
 35658                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 35659                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 35660                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 35661                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 35662                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 35663                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 35664                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 35665                                          int     10h             ;
 35666                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35667                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35668                                          int     10h             ;
 35669                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 35670                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 35671                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 35672                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35673                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35674                                          int     10h             ;
 35675                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 35676                                          mov	ax,0920h
 35677                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 35678                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35679                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35680                                          int     10h             ;
 35681                                          push    es              ;
 35682                                  print_loop:                     ;
 35683                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 35684                                          inc     di              ;
 35685                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 35686                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 35687                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 35688                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 35689                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 35690                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 35691                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 35692                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 35693                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 35694                                          int     10h             ;
 35695                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 35696                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 35697                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 35698                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35699                                          int     10h             ;
 35700                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 35701                                  print_done:                     ;
 35702                                          pop     es              ;
