 35703                                          pop     dx              ;
 35704                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35705                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 35706                                          pop     si              ;
 35707                                          pop     dx              ;
 35708                                          pop     cx              ;
 35709                                          pop     bx              ;
 35710                                          pop     ax              ;
 35711                                          retn			;
 35712                                  
 35713                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35714                                  ;
 35715                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 35716                                  ;
 35717                                  ;   INPUT
 35718                                  ;       None
 35719                                  ;
 35720                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35721                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 35722                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 35723                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 35724                                  ;
 35725                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35726                                  ;       None
 35727                                  ;
 35728                                  ;   NOTES
 35729                                  ;       None
 35730                                  ;
 35731                                  ;   HISTORY
 35732                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35733                                  ;
 35734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35735                                  
 35736                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 35737                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 35738                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35739                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35740                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 35741                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 35742                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 35743                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 35744                                          int     21h             ;
 35745                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 35746                                  check_time:
 35747                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 35748                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 35749                                          jae	short show_time	;
 35750                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 35751                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 35752                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 35753                                  show_time:
 35754                                          push    bx              ;
 35755                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 35756                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 35757                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35758                                          int     10h             ;
 35759                                          push    dx              ;
 35760                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 35761                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35762                                          int     10h             ;
 35763                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 35764                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 35765                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 35766                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 35767                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 35768                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 35769                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 35770                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35771                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35772                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 35773                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 35774                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 35775                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 35776                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 35777                                          pop     dx
 35778                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 35779                                          int     10h             ;
 35780                                          pop     bx              ;
 35781                                  input_key:
 35782                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 35783                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 35784                                          int     21h             ;
 35785                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 35786                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 35787                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 35788                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 35789                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 35790                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 35791                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 35792                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 35793                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 35794                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 35795                                  got_time:
 35796                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 35797                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 35798                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 35799                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 35800                                  got_key:
 35801                                          push    ax              ;
 35802                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 35803                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 35804                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 35805                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 35806                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 35807                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35808                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35809                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 35810                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 35811                                          pop     bx   		;
 35812                                  
 35813                                  timeout_disabled:
 35814                                          pop     ax              ;
 35815                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 35816                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 35817                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 35818                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 35819                                  
 35820                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 35821                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 35822                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 35823                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 35824                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35825                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35826                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 35827                                          jmp     short print1
 35828                                  not_up:
 35829                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 35830                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 35831                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 35832                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 35833                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 35834                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 35835                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 35836                                  print1: 
 35837                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 35838                                  print2: 
 35839                                  	call    print_item      ;
 35840                                          call    disp_num        ;
 35841                                  to_input_key:
 35842                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 35843                                  not_down:
 35844                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35845                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 35846                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 35847                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 35848                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35849                                          call    show_status     ;
 35850                                          jmp     input_key	;
 35851                                  not_f8:
 35852                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 35853                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 35854                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 35855                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 35856                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 35857                                  
 35858                                  normal_key:
 35859                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 35860                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 35861                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 35862                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 35863                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 35864                                          retn			;
 35865                                  not_backspace:
 35866                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 35867                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 35868                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 35869                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 35870                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 35871                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 35872                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 35873                                          jmp	short print2
 35874                                  
 35875                                  select_done:
 35876                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 35877                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 35878                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 35879                                  
 35880                                  	; fall into disp_input
 35881                                  
 35882                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35883                                  
 35884                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35885                                  ;
 35886                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35887                                  ;
 35888                                  ;   INPUT
 35889                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35890                                  ;
 35891                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35892                                  ;       None
 35893                                  ;
 35894                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35895                                  ;       None
 35896                                  ;
 35897                                  ;   NOTES
 35898                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35899                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35900                                  ;
 35901                                  ;   HISTORY
 35902                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35903                                  ;
 35904                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35905                                  
 35906                                  disp_input:
 35907                                          push    ax
 35908                                          cmp     al,' '
 35909                                          jae	short disp_ok
 35910                                          mov     al,' '
 35911                                  disp_ok:
 35912                                          mov     dl,al
 35913                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35914                                          int     21h
 35915                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 35916                                          call    print
 35917                                          pop     ax
 35918                                          retn
 35919                                  
 35920                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35921                                  
 35922                                  disp_num:
 35923                                          push    bx
 35924                                          add     al,'0'
 35925                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 35926                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35927                                          mov     cx,1
 35928                                          int     10h
 35929                                          pop     bx
 35930                                          retn
 35931                                  
 35932                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35933                                  ;
 35934                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35935                                  ;
 35936                                  ;   INPUT
 35937                                  ;       None
 35938                                  ;
 35939                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35940                                  ;       None
 35941                                  ;
 35942                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35943                                  ;       None
 35944                                  ;
 35945                                  ;   NOTES
 35946                                  ;       None
 35947                                  ;
 35948                                  ;   HISTORY
 35949                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35950                                  ;
 35951                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35952                                  
 35953                                  show_status:
 35954                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35955                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35956                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35957                                          int     10h             ;
 35958                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35959                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35960                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35961                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35962                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35963                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35964                                          int     10h             ;
 35965                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35966                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35967                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35968                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35969                                  show_onoff: 
 35970                                          int     10h
 35971                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35972                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35973                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35974                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35975                                  
 35976                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35977                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35978                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35979                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35980                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35981                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35982                                          int     10h             ;
 35983                                  show_done:                      ;
 35984                                          pop     dx              ;
 35985                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35986                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35987                                          pop     bx              ;
 35988                                          retn			;
 35989                                  
 35990                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35991                                  
 35992                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35993                                  ;
 35994                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35995                                  ;
 35996                                  ;   INPUT
 35997                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35998                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35999                                  ;
 36000                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36001                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 36002                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 36003                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 36004                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36005                                  ;
 36006                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36007                                  ;       AX
 36008                                  ;
 36009                                  ;   NOTES
 36010                                  ;       None
 36011                                  ;
 36012                                  ;   HISTORY
 36013                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36014                                  ;
 36015                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36016                                  
 36017                                  skip_token:
 36018                                          call    get_char
 36019                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 36020                                          call    any_delim
 36021                                          jne	short skip_token
 36022                                  skip_check_eol:
 36023                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 36024                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36025                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36026                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 36027                                          clc
 36028                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 36029                                  	retn
 36030                                  skip_token_eol:
 36031                                          stc
 36032                                  skip_token_done:
 36033                                          retn
 36034                                  
 36035                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36036                                  ;
 36037                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 36038                                  ;
 36039                                  ;   INPUT
 36040                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36041                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36042                                  ;
 36043                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36044                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36045                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 36046                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 36047                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36048                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 36049                                  ;
 36050                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36051                                  ;       AX
 36052                                  ;
 36053                                  ;   NOTES
 36054                                  ;       None
 36055                                  ;
 36056                                  ;   HISTORY
 36057                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36058                                  ;
 36059                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36060                                  
 36061                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 36062                                          call    get_char        ;
 36063                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 36064                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 36065                                          call    delim           ;
 36066                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 36067                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 36068                                  
 36069                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36070                                  ;
 36071                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 36072                                  ;
 36073                                  ;   INPUT
 36074                                  ;       AL == last character read
 36075                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36076                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36077                                  ;
 36078                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36079                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36080                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 36081                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36082                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36083                                  ;
 36084                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36085                                  ;       AX
 36086                                  ;
 36087                                  ;   NOTES
 36088                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36089                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36090                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36091                                  ;
 36092                                  ;   HISTORY
 36093                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36094                                  ;
 36095                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36096                                  
 36097                                  skip_opt_line:
 36098                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36099                                          je	short skip_line_done
 36100                                       
 36101                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36102                                  
 36103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36106                                  ;
 36107                                  ;   INPUT
 36108                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36109                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36110                                  ;
 36111                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36112                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36113                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36114                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36115                                  ;
 36116                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36117                                  ;       AX
 36118                                  ;
 36119                                  ;   NOTES
 36120                                  ;       None
 36121                                  ;
 36122                                  ;   HISTORY
 36123                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36124                                  ;
 36125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36126                                  
 36127                                  skip_line:
 36128                                          call    get_char
 36129                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 36130                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36131                                          jne	short skip_line
 36132                                  skip_line_done:
 36133                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36134                                          retn
 36135                                  
 36136                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36137                                  ;
 36138                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36139                                  ;
 36140                                  ;   INPUT
 36141                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36142                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36143                                  ;
 36144                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36145                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36146                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36147                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36148                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36149                                  ;
 36150                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36151                                  ;       AX
 36152                                  ;
 36153                                  ;   NOTES
 36154                                  ;       None
 36155                                  ;
 36156                                  ;   HISTORY
 36157                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36158                                  ;
 36159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36160                                  
 36161                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36162                                  
 36163                                  get_number:
 36164                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36165                                  num_loop:
 36166                                          call    get_char        ;
 36167                                          jc	short num_done	;
 36168                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 36169                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 36170                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 36171                                          ja	short num_done	;
 36172                                          push    ax              ;
 36173                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 36174                                          push    dx              ;
 36175                                          mul     bx              ;
 36176                                          pop     dx              ;
 36177                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 36178                                          pop     ax              ;
 36179                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 36180                                          cbw                     ;
 36181                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 36182                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 36183                                  
 36184                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36185                                  ;num_done:
 36186                                          ;retn
 36187                                  
 36188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36189                                  ;
 36190                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36191                                  ;
 36192                                  ;   INPUT
 36193                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36194                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36195                                  ;
 36196                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36197                                  ;       AL == next character
 36198                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36199                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36200                                  ;
 36201                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36202                                  ;       AX
 36203                                  ;
 36204                                  ;   NOTES
 36205                                  ;       None
 36206                                  ;
 36207                                  ;   HISTORY
 36208                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36209                                  ;
 36210                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36211                                  
 36212                                  get_char:
 36213                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36214                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36215                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36216                                  	es	
 36217                                  	lodsb
 36218                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 36219                                          retn			;
 36220                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36221                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36222                                  nearby_ret:
 36223                                          retn
 36224                                  
 36225                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36226                                  ;
 36227                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36228                                  ;
 36229                                  ;   INPUT
 36230                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36231                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36232                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36233                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36234                                  ;
 36235                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36236                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36237                                  ;
 36238                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36239                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36240                                  ;
 36241                                  ;   NOTES
 36242                                  ;       None
 36243                                  ;
 36244                                  ;   HISTORY
 36245                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36246                                  ;
 36247                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36248                                  
 36249                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36250                                  query_user:
 36251                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36252                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 36253                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36254                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36255                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 36256                                  qu_1:
 36257                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 36258                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 36259                                          push    ax                      ;
 36260                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 36261                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 36262                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 36263                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 36264                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 36265                                          ; 12/12/2022
 36266                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 36267                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 36268                                  query_all:
 36269                                  
 36270                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36271                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36272                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36273                                  
 36274                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36275                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36276                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36277                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36278                                  
 36279                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36280                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36281                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 36282                                  find_match:                             ;
 36283                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36284                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 36285                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36286                                          inc     di                      ;
 36287                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36288                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36289                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36290                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36291                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36292                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36293                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36294                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 36295                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36296                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36297                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36298                                          inc     di                      ;
 36299                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36300                                          int     21h                     ;
 36301                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 36302                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36303                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36304                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36305                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36306                                  cmd_notset:
 36307                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36308                                  line_print:                             ;
 36309                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36310                                          es
 36311                                  	lodsb
 36312                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 36313                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 36314                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 36315                                  non_null:                               ;
 36316                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 36317                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 36318                                          jne	short non_space		;
 36319                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 36320                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 36321                                  non_space:                              ;
 36322                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 36323                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 36324                                          int     21h                     ;
 36325                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 36326                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 36327                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36328                                  
 36329                                  generic_prompt:
 36330                                          call    print                   ;
 36331                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36332                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36333                                          int     16h                     ;
 36334                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36335                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 36336                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36337                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 36338                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 36339                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36340                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36341                                  not_func:
 36342                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 36343                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36344                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36345                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 36346                                          je	short legal_char	;
 36347                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 36348                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 36349                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 36350                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 36351                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 36352                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 36353                                  legal_char:                             ;
 36354                                          call    disp_input              ;
 36355                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36356                                  
 36357                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 36358                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 36359                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36360                                  	clc
 36361                                  do_cmd:
 36362                                  	pop     ax			;
 36363                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36364                                  	; cf=0
 36365                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 36366                                  	retn
 36367                                  
 36368                                  skip_cmd:
 36369                                  	pop     ax			;
 36370                                  skip_all:
 36371                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 36372                                  	stc
 36373                                  	retn
 36374                                  
 36375                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36376                                  ;
 36377                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 36378                                  ;
 36379                                  ;   INPUT
 36380                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 36381                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36382                                  ;
 36383                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36384                                  ;       None
 36385                                  ;
 36386                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36387                                  ;       None
 36388                                  ;
 36389                                  ;   NOTES
 36390                                  ;       None
 36391                                  ;
 36392                                  ;   HISTORY
 36393                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36394                                  ;
 36395                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36396                                  
 36397                                  print_error:
 36398                                          push    ax
 36399                                          push    bx
 36400                                          push    cx
 36401                                          push    dx
 36402                                          push    ds
 36403                                          push    cs
 36404                                          pop     ds
 36405                                          pushf
 36406                                          call    get_linenum
 36407                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 36408                                          call    error_line
 36409                                          popf
 36410                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 36411                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 36412                                          call    print
 36413                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 36414                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 36415                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 36416                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 36417                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 36418                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 36419                                  pe_1:     
 36420                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 36421                                          call    print
 36422                                  pe_ret: 
 36423                                  	pop     ds
 36424                                          pop     dx
 36425                                          pop     cx
 36426                                          pop     bx
 36427                                          pop     ax
 36428                                  	retn
 36429                                  
 36430                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36431                                  
 36432                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36433                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 36434                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36435                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36436                                  
 36437                                  disable_autoexec:
 36438                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36439                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36440                                  
 36441                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36442                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 36443                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36444                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 36445                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36446                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36447                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36448                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36449                                  dae_1:
 36450                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36451                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36452                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36453                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36454                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36455                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36456                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 36457                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 36458                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36459                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 36460                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36461                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36462                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36463                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 36464                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 36465                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 36466                                          dec     bx                      ;
 36467                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 36468                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 36469                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 36470                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 36471                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 36472                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 36473                                          retn
 36474                                  
 36475                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 36476                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 36477                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36478                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 36479                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 36480                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 36481                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 36482                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 36483                                  
 36484                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36485                                  
 36486                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 36487                                  
 36488                                  
 36489                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 36492                                  ;
 36493                                  ; procedure : delim
 36494                                  ;
 36495                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36496                                  
 36497                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36498                                  ;
 36499                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36500                                  ;
 36501                                  ;any_delim:
 36502                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36503                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36504                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36505                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36506                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 36507                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36508                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 36509                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 36510                                  ;
 36511                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36512                                  
 36513                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36514                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36515                                  delim:
 36516 00002FB9 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36517 00002FBB 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36518                                  
 36519 00002FBD 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36520 00002FBF 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36521                                  
 36522                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36523 00002FC1 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36524 00002FC3 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36525 00002FC5 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36526 00002FC7 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36527 00002FC9 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36528 00002FCB 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36529 00002FCD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36530 00002FCF 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36531 00002FD1 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36532                                  
 36533                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36534                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36535                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36536 00002FD3 F8                      	clc	; 09/09/2023 ('SkipDelim' must not be return with cf=1)
 36537                                  ;endif
 36538                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36539                                  delim_ret:
 36540                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 36541 00002FD4 C3                      	retn

 36604                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36605                                  ;
 36606                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36607                                  
 36608                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36609                                  mapcase:
 36610 00002FF5 51                      	push	cx
 36611 00002FF6 56                      	push	si
 36612 00002FF7 1E                      	push	ds
 36613                                  
 36614 00002FF8 06                      	push	es
 36615 00002FF9 1F                      	pop	ds
 36616                                  
 36617                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36618                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36619                                  ;
 36620                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 36621                                  ;;else
 36622                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 36623                                  ;;endif
 36624                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36625 00002FFA 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 36626                                  
 36627                                  convloop:
 36628 00002FFC AC                      	lodsb
 36629 00002FFD 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36630 00002FFF 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36631 00003001 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36632 00003003 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36633 00003005 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36634 00003007 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36635                                  noconv:
 36636                                  
 36637                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36638                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36639                                  ;;
 36640                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36641                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36642                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36643                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36644                                  ;;
 36645                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36646                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36647                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36648                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 36649                                  ;check_eol:
 36650                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 36651                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36652                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 36653                                  ;       je	short convdone
 36654                                  ;;endif
 36655                                  	
 36656                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36657 0000300A E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 36658                                  convdone:
 36659 0000300C 1F                      	pop	ds
 36660 0000300D 5E                      	pop	si
 36661 0000300E 59                      	pop	cx
 36662 0000300F C3                      	retn

 36666                                  ; procedure : round
 36667                                  ;
 36668                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36669                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36670                                  ;
 36671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36672                                  
 36673                                  round:
 36674                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36675 00003010 1E                      	push	ds
 36676 00003011 0E                      	push	cs
 36677 00003012 1F                      	pop	ds
 36678                                  
 36679 00003013 50                      	push	ax
 36680                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36681 00003014 A1[DE03]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 36682                                  
 36683 00003017 E88AE0                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36684                                  
 36685                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36686 0000301A 0106[E003]              	add	[memhi],ax
 36687                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36688 0000301E C706[DE03]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0
 36689                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36690 00003024 A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 36691                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36692 00003027 3B06[A302]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]
 36693                                  	;jae	short mem_err
 36694                                  	; 17/09/2023
 36695 0000302B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err2 ; ds = cs
 36696                                  	;test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36697 0000302D F606[1014]02            	test	byte [setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 36698 00003032 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 36699 00003034 06                      	push	es
 36700 00003035 56                      	push	si
 36701                                  	;mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 36702 00003036 8B36[0E14]              	mov	si,[devmark_addr]
 36703 0000303A 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 36704 0000303C 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 36705 0000303E 48                      	dec	ax
 36706                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36707 0000303F 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36708                                  	;and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36709 00003043 8026[1014]FD            	and	byte [setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36710 00003048 5E                      	pop	si
 36711 00003049 07                      	pop	es
 36712                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36713 0000304A 58                      	pop	ax
 36714                                  
 36715                                  	; 10/09/2023
 36716 0000304B 1F                      	pop	ds
 36717                                  
 36718                                  	; 11/12/2022
 36719                                  	; cf = 0
 36720                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36721                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 36722 0000304C C3                      	retn

 36780                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36781                                  ;
 36782                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36783                                  ;
 36784                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36785                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36786                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36787                                  ;
 36788                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36789                                  
 36790                                  getnum:
 36791 00003083 53                      	push	bx
 36792 00003084 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36793                                  b2:
 36794 00003086 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36795 00003089 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36796                                  
 36797 0000308B 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36798 0000308C 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36799                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36800                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36801 0000308D B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36802 0000308F F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36803 00003091 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36804 00003092 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36805 00003094 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36806 00003097 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36807                                  
 36808 00003099 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36809                                  
 36810 0000309A E841FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36811 0000309D 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36812 0000309F 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36813 000030A1 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36814 000030A3 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36815 000030A5 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36816 000030A7 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36817 000030A9 7417                    	je	short b15
 36818 000030AB 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36819 000030B0 7410                    	je	short b15
 36820 000030B2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36821                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36822                                  	;nop
 36823                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36824                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36825                                  	;nop
 36826                                  	;nop
 36827 000030B4 740C                    	je	short b15
 36828 000030B6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36829 000030B8 7408                    	je	short b15
 36830 000030BA 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36831 000030BC 7404                    	je	short b15
 36832 000030BE 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36833 000030C0 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36834                                  b15:
 36835 000030C2 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36836 000030C7 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36837                                  b1:
 36838 000030CC 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36839 000030CE 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36840 000030D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 36841 000030D1 C3                      	retn
 36842                                  badnum:
 36843                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36844                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36845 000030D2 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36846                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36847 000030D4 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36848 000030D8 5B                      	pop	bx
 36849 000030D9 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36850 000030DA C3                      	retn
 36851                                  
 36852                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36853                                  
 36854                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36855                                  
 36856                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36857                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36858                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36859                                  ;	si = 0
 36860                                  ;	ax = country id
 36861                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36862                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36863                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36864                                  ;
 36865                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36866                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36867                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36868                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36869                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36870                                  
 36871                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 & v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36872                                  
 36873 000030DB 57                      	push	di
 36874 000030DC 50                      	push	ax
 36875 000030DD 52                      	push	dx
 36876                                  
 36877 000030DE 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36878 000030E0 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36879 000030E2 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36880 000030E5 E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36881 000030E8 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 37180                                  
 37181                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37182                                  
 37183                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37184                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37185                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37186                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37187                                  ;
 37188                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37189                                  ;	 be moved.
 37190                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37191                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37192                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37193                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37194                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37195                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37196                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37197                                  
 37198 0000322B 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37199 0000322C B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37200 0000322F F9                      	stc
 37201 00003230 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37202 00003232 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37203 00003233 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37204                                  
 37205 00003235 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37206 00003237 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37207 00003239 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37208 0000323B F9                      	stc
 37209 0000323C CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37210                                  ricb_exit:
 37211 0000323E C3                      	retn
