 37215                                  ;! set_country_path procedure is not called from anywhere !
 37216                                  ; Erdogan Tan - 04/08/2023 (Retro DOS v4.2)
 37217                                  %if 0
 37218                                  
 37219                                  set_country_path:
 37220                                  
 37221                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37222                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37223                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37224                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37225                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37226                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37227                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37228                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37229                                  
 37230                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37231                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37232                                  
 37233                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.1 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 37234                                  	; (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:36DDh)
 37235                                  
 37236                                  	push	si
 37237                                  
 37238                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37239                                  	push	es
 37240                                  	pop	ds
 37241                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37242                                  
 37243                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37244                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37245                                  
 37246                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37247                                  	inc	si
 37248                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37249                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37250                                  
 37251                                  scp_default_drv:
 37252                                  	mov	ah,19h
 37253                                  	int	21h
 37254                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37255                                  
 37256                                  scp_setdrv:
 37257                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37258                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 37259                                  	mov	al,[si]
 37260                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 37261                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 37262                                  
 37263                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37264                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37265                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37266                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37267                                  	jne	short scp_path
 37268                                  
 37269                                  scp_root_dir:
 37270                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37271                                  scp_path:
 37272                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37273                                  
 37274                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37275                                  scpath_exit:
 37276                                  
 37277                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37278                                  	push	es
 37279                                  	pop	ds
 37280                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37281                                  
 37282                                  	pop	si
 37283                                  	retn
 37284                                  
 37285                                  %endif
 37286
